12186 /* start documentation of inline functions */
12187 
12209 /* end documentation of inline functions */
12210 
12216 QCPItemPosition::QCPItemPosition(QCustomPlot *parentPlot, QCPAbstractItem *parentItem, const QString &name) :
12217  QCPItemAnchor(parentPlot, parentItem, name),
12218  mPositionTypeX(ptAbsolute),
12219  mPositionTypeY(ptAbsolute),
12220  mKey(0),
12221  mValue(0),
12222  mParentAnchorX(nullptr),
12223  mParentAnchorY(nullptr)
12224 {
12225 }
12226 
12227 QCPItemPosition::~QCPItemPosition()
12228 {
12229  // unregister as parent at children:
12230  // Note: this is done in ~QCPItemAnchor again, but it's important QCPItemPosition does it itself, because only then
12231  // the setParentAnchor(0) call the correct QCPItemPosition::pixelPosition function instead of QCPItemAnchor::pixelPosition
12232  foreach (QCPItemPosition *child, mChildrenX.values())
12233  {
12234  if (child->parentAnchorX() == this)
12235  child->setParentAnchorX(nullptr); // this acts back on this anchor and child removes itself from mChildrenX
12236  }
12237  foreach (QCPItemPosition *child, mChildrenY.values())
12238  {
12239  if (child->parentAnchorY() == this)
12240  child->setParentAnchorY(nullptr); // this acts back on this anchor and child removes itself from mChildrenY
12241  }
12242  // unregister as child in parent:
12243  if (mParentAnchorX)
12244  mParentAnchorX->removeChildX(this);
12245  if (mParentAnchorY)
12246  mParentAnchorY->removeChildY(this);
12247 }
12248 
12249 /* can't make this a header inline function, because QPointer breaks with forward declared types, see QTBUG-29588 */
12250 QCPAxisRect *QCPItemPosition::axisRect() const
12251 {
12252  return mAxisRect.data();
12253 }
12254 
12280 void QCPItemPosition::setType(QCPItemPosition::PositionType type)
12281 {
12282  setTypeX(type);
12283  setTypeY(type);
12284 }
12285 
12293 void QCPItemPosition::setTypeX(QCPItemPosition::PositionType type)
12294 {
12295  if (mPositionTypeX != type)
12296  {
12297  // if switching from or to coordinate type that isn't valid (e.g. because axes or axis rect
12298  // were deleted), don't try to recover the pixelPosition() because it would output a qDebug warning.
12299  bool retainPixelPosition = true;
12300  if ((mPositionTypeX == ptPlotCoords || type == ptPlotCoords) && (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis))
12301  retainPixelPosition = false;
12302  if ((mPositionTypeX == ptAxisRectRatio || type == ptAxisRectRatio) && (!mAxisRect))
12303  retainPixelPosition = false;
12304 
12305  QPointF pixel;
12306  if (retainPixelPosition)
12307  pixel = pixelPosition();
12308 
12309  mPositionTypeX = type;
12310 
12311  if (retainPixelPosition)
12312  setPixelPosition(pixel);
12313  }
12314 }
12315 
12323 void QCPItemPosition::setTypeY(QCPItemPosition::PositionType type)
12324 {
12325  if (mPositionTypeY != type)
12326  {
12327  // if switching from or to coordinate type that isn't valid (e.g. because axes or axis rect
12328  // were deleted), don't try to recover the pixelPosition() because it would output a qDebug warning.
12329  bool retainPixelPosition = true;
12330  if ((mPositionTypeY == ptPlotCoords || type == ptPlotCoords) && (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis))
12331  retainPixelPosition = false;
12332  if ((mPositionTypeY == ptAxisRectRatio || type == ptAxisRectRatio) && (!mAxisRect))
12333  retainPixelPosition = false;
12334 
12335  QPointF pixel;
12336  if (retainPixelPosition)
12337  pixel = pixelPosition();
12338 
12339  mPositionTypeY = type;
12340 
12341  if (retainPixelPosition)
12342  setPixelPosition(pixel);
12343  }
12344 }
12345 
12364 bool QCPItemPosition::setParentAnchor(QCPItemAnchor *parentAnchor, bool keepPixelPosition)
12365 {
12366  bool successX = setParentAnchorX(parentAnchor, keepPixelPosition);
12367  bool successY = setParentAnchorY(parentAnchor, keepPixelPosition);
12368  return successX && successY;
12369 }
12370 
12378 bool QCPItemPosition::setParentAnchorX(QCPItemAnchor *parentAnchor, bool keepPixelPosition)
12379 {
12380  // make sure self is not assigned as parent:
12381  if (parentAnchor == this)
12382  {
12383  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't set self as parent anchor" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(parentAnchor);
12384  return false;
12385  }
12386  // make sure no recursive parent-child-relationships are created:
12387  QCPItemAnchor *currentParent = parentAnchor;
12388  while (currentParent)
12389  {
12390  if (QCPItemPosition *currentParentPos = currentParent->toQCPItemPosition())
12391  {
12392  // is a QCPItemPosition, might have further parent, so keep iterating
12393  if (currentParentPos == this)
12394  {
12395  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't create recursive parent-child-relationship" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(parentAnchor);
12396  return false;
12397  }
12398  currentParent = currentParentPos->parentAnchorX();
12399  } else
12400  {
12401  // is a QCPItemAnchor, can't have further parent. Now make sure the parent items aren't the
12402  // same, to prevent a position being child of an anchor which itself depends on the position,
12403  // because they're both on the same item:
12404  if (currentParent->mParentItem == mParentItem)
12405  {
12406  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't set parent to be an anchor which itself depends on this position" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(parentAnchor);
12407  return false;
12408  }
12409  break;
12410  }
12411  }
12412 
12413  // if previously no parent set and PosType is still ptPlotCoords, set to ptAbsolute:
12414  if (!mParentAnchorX && mPositionTypeX == ptPlotCoords)
12415  setTypeX(ptAbsolute);
12416 
12417  // save pixel position:
12418  QPointF pixelP;
12419  if (keepPixelPosition)
12420  pixelP = pixelPosition();
12421  // unregister at current parent anchor:
12422  if (mParentAnchorX)
12423  mParentAnchorX->removeChildX(this);
12424  // register at new parent anchor:
12425  if (parentAnchor)
12426  parentAnchor->addChildX(this);
12427  mParentAnchorX = parentAnchor;
12428  // restore pixel position under new parent:
12429  if (keepPixelPosition)
12430  setPixelPosition(pixelP);
12431  else
12432  setCoords(0, coords().y());
12433  return true;
12434 }
12435 
12443 bool QCPItemPosition::setParentAnchorY(QCPItemAnchor *parentAnchor, bool keepPixelPosition)
12444 {
12445  // make sure self is not assigned as parent:
12446  if (parentAnchor == this)
12447  {
12448  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't set self as parent anchor" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(parentAnchor);
12449  return false;
12450  }
12451  // make sure no recursive parent-child-relationships are created:
12452  QCPItemAnchor *currentParent = parentAnchor;
12453  while (currentParent)
12454  {
12455  if (QCPItemPosition *currentParentPos = currentParent->toQCPItemPosition())
12456  {
12457  // is a QCPItemPosition, might have further parent, so keep iterating
12458  if (currentParentPos == this)
12459  {
12460  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't create recursive parent-child-relationship" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(parentAnchor);
12461  return false;
12462  }
12463  currentParent = currentParentPos->parentAnchorY();
12464  } else
12465  {
12466  // is a QCPItemAnchor, can't have further parent. Now make sure the parent items aren't the
12467  // same, to prevent a position being child of an anchor which itself depends on the position,
12468  // because they're both on the same item:
12469  if (currentParent->mParentItem == mParentItem)
12470  {
12471  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't set parent to be an anchor which itself depends on this position" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(parentAnchor);
12472  return false;
12473  }
12474  break;
12475  }
12476  }
12477 
12478  // if previously no parent set and PosType is still ptPlotCoords, set to ptAbsolute:
12479  if (!mParentAnchorY && mPositionTypeY == ptPlotCoords)
12480  setTypeY(ptAbsolute);
12481 
12482  // save pixel position:
12483  QPointF pixelP;
12484  if (keepPixelPosition)
12485  pixelP = pixelPosition();
12486  // unregister at current parent anchor:
12487  if (mParentAnchorY)
12488  mParentAnchorY->removeChildY(this);
12489  // register at new parent anchor:
12490  if (parentAnchor)
12491  parentAnchor->addChildY(this);
12492  mParentAnchorY = parentAnchor;
12493  // restore pixel position under new parent:
12494  if (keepPixelPosition)
12495  setPixelPosition(pixelP);
12496  else
12497  setCoords(coords().x(), 0);
12498  return true;
12499 }
12500 
12518 void QCPItemPosition::setCoords(double key, double value)
12519 {
12520  mKey = key;
12521  mValue = value;
12522 }
12523 
12529 void QCPItemPosition::setCoords(const QPointF &pos)
12530 {
12531  setCoords(pos.x(), pos.y());
12532 }
12533 
12540 QPointF QCPItemPosition::pixelPosition() const
12541 {
12542  QPointF result;
12543 
12544  // determine X:
12545  switch (mPositionTypeX)
12546  {
12547  case ptAbsolute:
12548  {
12549  result.rx() = mKey;
12550  if (mParentAnchorX)
12551  result.rx() += mParentAnchorX->pixelPosition().x();
12552  break;
12553  }
12554  case ptViewportRatio:
12555  {
12556  result.rx() = mKey*mParentPlot->viewport().width();
12557  if (mParentAnchorX)
12558  result.rx() += mParentAnchorX->pixelPosition().x();
12559  else
12560  result.rx() += mParentPlot->viewport().left();
12561  break;
12562  }
12563  case ptAxisRectRatio:
12564  {
12565  if (mAxisRect)
12566  {
12567  result.rx() = mKey*mAxisRect.data()->width();
12568  if (mParentAnchorX)
12569  result.rx() += mParentAnchorX->pixelPosition().x();
12570  else
12571  result.rx() += mAxisRect.data()->left();
12572  } else
12573  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Item position type x is ptAxisRectRatio, but no axis rect was defined";
12574  break;
12575  }
12576  case ptPlotCoords:
12577  {
12578  if (mKeyAxis && mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
12579  result.rx() = mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mKey);
12580  else if (mValueAxis && mValueAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
12581  result.rx() = mValueAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mValue);
12582  else
12583  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Item position type x is ptPlotCoords, but no axes were defined";
12584  break;
12585  }
12586  }
12587 
12588  // determine Y:
12589  switch (mPositionTypeY)
12590  {
12591  case ptAbsolute:
12592  {
12593  result.ry() = mValue;
12594  if (mParentAnchorY)
12595  result.ry() += mParentAnchorY->pixelPosition().y();
12596  break;
12597  }
12598  case ptViewportRatio:
12599  {
12600  result.ry() = mValue*mParentPlot->viewport().height();
12601  if (mParentAnchorY)
12602  result.ry() += mParentAnchorY->pixelPosition().y();
12603  else
12604  result.ry() += mParentPlot->viewport().top();
12605  break;
12606  }
12607  case ptAxisRectRatio:
12608  {
12609  if (mAxisRect)
12610  {
12611  result.ry() = mValue*mAxisRect.data()->height();
12612  if (mParentAnchorY)
12613  result.ry() += mParentAnchorY->pixelPosition().y();
12614  else
12615  result.ry() += mAxisRect.data()->top();
12616  } else
12617  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Item position type y is ptAxisRectRatio, but no axis rect was defined";
12618  break;
12619  }
12620  case ptPlotCoords:
12621  {
12622  if (mKeyAxis && mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
12623  result.ry() = mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mKey);
12624  else if (mValueAxis && mValueAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
12625  result.ry() = mValueAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mValue);
12626  else
12627  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Item position type y is ptPlotCoords, but no axes were defined";
12628  break;
12629  }
12630  }
12631 
12632  return result;
12633 }
12634 
12640 void QCPItemPosition::setAxes(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis)
12641 {
12642  mKeyAxis = keyAxis;
12643  mValueAxis = valueAxis;
12644 }
12645 
12651 void QCPItemPosition::setAxisRect(QCPAxisRect *axisRect)
12652 {
12653  mAxisRect = axisRect;
12654 }
12655 
12666 void QCPItemPosition::setPixelPosition(const QPointF &pixelPosition)
12667 {
12668  double x = pixelPosition.x();
12669  double y = pixelPosition.y();
12670 
12671  switch (mPositionTypeX)
12672  {
12673  case ptAbsolute:
12674  {
12675  if (mParentAnchorX)
12676  x -= mParentAnchorX->pixelPosition().x();
12677  break;
12678  }
12679  case ptViewportRatio:
12680  {
12681  if (mParentAnchorX)
12682  x -= mParentAnchorX->pixelPosition().x();
12683  else
12684  x -= mParentPlot->viewport().left();
12685  x /= double(mParentPlot->viewport().width());
12686  break;
12687  }
12688  case ptAxisRectRatio:
12689  {
12690  if (mAxisRect)
12691  {
12692  if (mParentAnchorX)
12693  x -= mParentAnchorX->pixelPosition().x();
12694  else
12695  x -= mAxisRect.data()->left();
12696  x /= double(mAxisRect.data()->width());
12697  } else
12698  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Item position type x is ptAxisRectRatio, but no axis rect was defined";
12699  break;
12700  }
12701  case ptPlotCoords:
12702  {
12703  if (mKeyAxis && mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
12704  x = mKeyAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(x);
12705  else if (mValueAxis && mValueAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
12706  y = mValueAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(x);
12707  else
12708  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Item position type x is ptPlotCoords, but no axes were defined";
12709  break;
12710  }
12711  }
12712 
12713  switch (mPositionTypeY)
12714  {
12715  case ptAbsolute:
12716  {
12717  if (mParentAnchorY)
12718  y -= mParentAnchorY->pixelPosition().y();
12719  break;
12720  }
12721  case ptViewportRatio:
12722  {
12723  if (mParentAnchorY)
12724  y -= mParentAnchorY->pixelPosition().y();
12725  else
12726  y -= mParentPlot->viewport().top();
12727  y /= double(mParentPlot->viewport().height());
12728  break;
12729  }
12730  case ptAxisRectRatio:
12731  {
12732  if (mAxisRect)
12733  {
12734  if (mParentAnchorY)
12735  y -= mParentAnchorY->pixelPosition().y();
12736  else
12737  y -= mAxisRect.data()->top();
12738  y /= double(mAxisRect.data()->height());
12739  } else
12740  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Item position type y is ptAxisRectRatio, but no axis rect was defined";
12741  break;
12742  }
12743  case ptPlotCoords:
12744  {
12745  if (mKeyAxis && mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
12746  x = mKeyAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(y);
12747  else if (mValueAxis && mValueAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
12748  y = mValueAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(y);
12749  else
12750  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Item position type y is ptPlotCoords, but no axes were defined";
12751  break;
12752  }
12753  }
12754 
12755  setCoords(x, y);
12756 }
12757 
12758 
12762 
12888 /* start of documentation of inline functions */
12889 
12905 /* end of documentation of inline functions */
12906 /* start documentation of pure virtual functions */
12907

12919 /* start documentation of signals */
12920 
12926 /* end documentation of signals */

12931 QCPAbstractItem::QCPAbstractItem(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
12932  QCPLayerable(parentPlot),
12933  mClipToAxisRect(false),
12934  mSelectable(true),
12935  mSelected(false)
12936 {
12937  parentPlot->registerItem(this);
12938 
12939  QList<QCPAxisRect*> rects = parentPlot->axisRects();
12940  if (!rects.isEmpty())
12941  {
12942  setClipToAxisRect(true);
12943  setClipAxisRect(rects.first());
12944  }
12945 }
12946 
12947 QCPAbstractItem::~QCPAbstractItem()
12948 {
12949  // don't delete mPositions because every position is also an anchor and thus in mAnchors
12950  qDeleteAll(mAnchors);
12951 }
12952 
12953 /* can't make this a header inline function, because QPointer breaks with forward declared types, see QTBUG-29588 */
12954 QCPAxisRect *QCPAbstractItem::clipAxisRect() const
12955 {
12956  return mClipAxisRect.data();
12957 }
12958 
12965 void QCPAbstractItem::setClipToAxisRect(bool clip)
12966 {
12967  mClipToAxisRect = clip;
12968  if (mClipToAxisRect)
12969  setParentLayerable(mClipAxisRect.data());
12970 }
12971 
12978 void QCPAbstractItem::setClipAxisRect(QCPAxisRect *rect)
12979 {
12980  mClipAxisRect = rect;
12981  if (mClipToAxisRect)
12982  setParentLayerable(mClipAxisRect.data());
12983 }

12994 void QCPAbstractItem::setSelectable(bool selectable)
12995 {
12996  if (mSelectable != selectable)
12997  {
12998  mSelectable = selectable;
12999  emit selectableChanged(mSelectable);
13000  }
13001 }
13002 
13017 void QCPAbstractItem::setSelected(bool selected)
13018 {
13019  if (mSelected != selected)
13020  {
13021  mSelected = selected;
13022  emit selectionChanged(mSelected);
13023  }
13024 }

13036 QCPItemPosition *QCPAbstractItem::position(const QString &name) const
13037 {
13038  foreach (QCPItemPosition *position, mPositions)
13039  {
13040  if (position->name() == name)
13041  return position;
13042  }
13043  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "position with name not found:" << name;
13044  return nullptr;
13045 }
13046 
13057 QCPItemAnchor *QCPAbstractItem::anchor(const QString &name) const
13058 {
13059  foreach (QCPItemAnchor *anchor, mAnchors)
13060  {
13061  if (anchor->name() == name)
13062  return anchor;
13063  }
13064  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "anchor with name not found:" << name;
13065  return nullptr;
13066 }
13067 
13076 bool QCPAbstractItem::hasAnchor(const QString &name) const
13077 {
13078  foreach (QCPItemAnchor *anchor, mAnchors)
13079  {
13080  if (anchor->name() == name)
13081  return true;
13082  }
13083  return false;
13084 }
13085 
13095 QRect QCPAbstractItem::clipRect() const
13096 {
13097  if (mClipToAxisRect && mClipAxisRect)
13098  return mClipAxisRect.data()->rect();
13099  else
13100  return mParentPlot->viewport();
13101 }
13102 
13116 void QCPAbstractItem::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
13117 {
13118  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeItems);
13119 }
13120 
13134 double QCPAbstractItem::rectDistance(const QRectF &rect, const QPointF &pos, bool filledRect) const
13135 {
13136  double result = -1;
13137 
13138  // distance to border:
13139  const QList<QLineF> lines = QList<QLineF>() << QLineF(rect.topLeft(), rect.topRight()) << QLineF(rect.bottomLeft(), rect.bottomRight())
13140  << QLineF(rect.topLeft(), rect.bottomLeft()) << QLineF(rect.topRight(), rect.bottomRight());
13141  const QCPVector2D posVec(pos);
13142  double minDistSqr = (std::numeric_limits<double>::max)();
13143  foreach (const QLineF &line, lines)
13144  {
13145  double distSqr = posVec.distanceSquaredToLine(line.p1(), line.p2());
13146  if (distSqr < minDistSqr)
13147  minDistSqr = distSqr;
13148  }
13149  result = qSqrt(minDistSqr);
13150 
13151  // filled rect, allow click inside to count as hit:
13152  if (filledRect && result > mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99)
13153  {
13154  if (rect.contains(pos))
13155  result = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
13156  }
13157  return result;
13158 }
13159 
13170 QPointF QCPAbstractItem::anchorPixelPosition(int anchorId) const
13171 {
13172  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "called on item which shouldn't have any anchors (this method not reimplemented). anchorId" << anchorId;
13173  return {};
13174 }
13175 
13190 QCPItemPosition *QCPAbstractItem::createPosition(const QString &name)
13191 {
13192  if (hasAnchor(name))
13193  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "anchor/position with name exists already:" << name;
13194  QCPItemPosition *newPosition = new QCPItemPosition(mParentPlot, this, name);
13195  mPositions.append(newPosition);
13196  mAnchors.append(newPosition); // every position is also an anchor
13197  newPosition->setAxes(mParentPlot->xAxis, mParentPlot->yAxis);
13198  newPosition->setType(QCPItemPosition::ptPlotCoords);
13199  if (mParentPlot->axisRect())
13200  newPosition->setAxisRect(mParentPlot->axisRect());
13201  newPosition->setCoords(0, 0);
13202  return newPosition;
13203 }
13204 
13224 QCPItemAnchor *QCPAbstractItem::createAnchor(const QString &name, int anchorId)
13225 {
13226  if (hasAnchor(name))
13227  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "anchor/position with name exists already:" << name;
13228  QCPItemAnchor *newAnchor = new QCPItemAnchor(mParentPlot, this, name, anchorId);
13229  mAnchors.append(newAnchor);
13230  return newAnchor;
13231 }
13232 
13233 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13234 void QCPAbstractItem::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
13235 {
13236  Q_UNUSED(event)
13237  Q_UNUSED(details)
13238  if (mSelectable)
13239  {
13240  bool selBefore = mSelected;
13241  setSelected(additive ? !mSelected : true);
13242  if (selectionStateChanged)
13243  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
13244  }
13245 }
13246 
13247 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13248 void QCPAbstractItem::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
13249 {
13250  if (mSelectable)
13251  {
13252  bool selBefore = mSelected;
13253  setSelected(false);
13254  if (selectionStateChanged)
13255  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
13256  }
13257 }
13258 
13259 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13260 QCP::Interaction QCPAbstractItem::selectionCategory() const
13261 {
13262  return QCP::iSelectItems;
13263 }

13593 
13597 QCustomPlot::QCustomPlot(QWidget *parent) :
13598  QWidget(parent),
13599  xAxis(nullptr),
13600  yAxis(nullptr),
13601  xAxis2(nullptr),
13602  yAxis2(nullptr),
13603  legend(nullptr),
13604  mBufferDevicePixelRatio(1.0), // will be adapted to true value below
13605  mPlotLayout(nullptr),
13606  mAutoAddPlottableToLegend(true),
13607  mAntialiasedElements(QCP::aeNone),
13608  mNotAntialiasedElements(QCP::aeNone),
13609  mInteractions(QCP::iNone),
13610  mSelectionTolerance(8),
13611  mNoAntialiasingOnDrag(false),
13612  mBackgroundBrush(Qt::white, Qt::SolidPattern),
13613  mBackgroundScaled(true),
13614  mBackgroundScaledMode(Qt::KeepAspectRatioByExpanding),
13615  mCurrentLayer(nullptr),
13616  mPlottingHints(QCP::phCacheLabels|QCP::phImmediateRefresh),
13617  mMultiSelectModifier(Qt::ControlModifier),
13618  mSelectionRectMode(QCP::srmNone),
13619  mSelectionRect(nullptr),
13620  mOpenGl(false),
13621  mMouseHasMoved(false),
13622  mMouseEventLayerable(nullptr),
13623  mMouseSignalLayerable(nullptr),
13624  mReplotting(false),
13625  mReplotQueued(false),
13626  mReplotTime(0),
13627  mReplotTimeAverage(0),
13628  mOpenGlMultisamples(16),
13629  mOpenGlAntialiasedElementsBackup(QCP::aeNone),
13630  mOpenGlCacheLabelsBackup(true)
13631 {
13632  setAttribute(Qt::WA_NoMousePropagation);
13633  setFocusPolicy(Qt::ClickFocus);
13634  setMouseTracking(true);
13635  QLocale currentLocale = locale();
13636  currentLocale.setNumberOptions(QLocale::OmitGroupSeparator);
13637  setLocale(currentLocale);
13638 #ifdef QCP_DEVICEPIXELRATIO_SUPPORTED
13639 # ifdef QCP_DEVICEPIXELRATIO_FLOAT
13640  setBufferDevicePixelRatio(QWidget::devicePixelRatioF());
13641 # else
13642  setBufferDevicePixelRatio(QWidget::devicePixelRatio());
13643 # endif
13644 #endif
13645 
13646  mOpenGlAntialiasedElementsBackup = mAntialiasedElements;
13647  mOpenGlCacheLabelsBackup = mPlottingHints.testFlag(QCP::phCacheLabels);
13648  // create initial layers:
13649  mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, QLatin1String("background")));
13650  mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, QLatin1String("grid")));
13651  mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, QLatin1String("main")));
13652  mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, QLatin1String("axes")));
13653  mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, QLatin1String("legend")));
13654  mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, QLatin1String("overlay")));
13655  updateLayerIndices();
13656  setCurrentLayer(QLatin1String("main"));
13657  layer(QLatin1String("overlay"))->setMode(QCPLayer::lmBuffered);
13658 
13659  // create initial layout, axis rect and legend:
13660  mPlotLayout = new QCPLayoutGrid;
13661  mPlotLayout->initializeParentPlot(this);
13662  mPlotLayout->setParent(this); // important because if parent is QWidget, QCPLayout::sizeConstraintsChanged will call QWidget::updateGeometry
13663  mPlotLayout->setLayer(QLatin1String("main"));
13664  QCPAxisRect *defaultAxisRect = new QCPAxisRect(this, true);
13665  mPlotLayout->addElement(0, 0, defaultAxisRect);
13666  xAxis = defaultAxisRect->axis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
13667  yAxis = defaultAxisRect->axis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
13668  xAxis2 = defaultAxisRect->axis(QCPAxis::atTop);
13669  yAxis2 = defaultAxisRect->axis(QCPAxis::atRight);
13670  legend = new QCPLegend;
13671  legend->setVisible(false);
13672  defaultAxisRect->insetLayout()->addElement(legend, Qt::AlignRight|Qt::AlignTop);
13673  defaultAxisRect->insetLayout()->setMargins(QMargins(12, 12, 12, 12));
13674 
13675  defaultAxisRect->setLayer(QLatin1String("background"));
13676  xAxis->setLayer(QLatin1String("axes"));
13677  yAxis->setLayer(QLatin1String("axes"));
13678  xAxis2->setLayer(QLatin1String("axes"));
13679  yAxis2->setLayer(QLatin1String("axes"));
13680  xAxis->grid()->setLayer(QLatin1String("grid"));
13681  yAxis->grid()->setLayer(QLatin1String("grid"));
13682  xAxis2->grid()->setLayer(QLatin1String("grid"));
13683  yAxis2->grid()->setLayer(QLatin1String("grid"));
13684  legend->setLayer(QLatin1String("legend"));
13685 
13686  // create selection rect instance:
13687  mSelectionRect = new QCPSelectionRect(this);
13688  mSelectionRect->setLayer(QLatin1String("overlay"));
13689 
13690  setViewport(rect()); // needs to be called after mPlotLayout has been created
13691 
13692  replot(rpQueuedReplot);
13693 }
13694 
13695 QCustomPlot::~QCustomPlot()
13696 {
13697  clearPlottables();
13698  clearItems();
13699 
13700  if (mPlotLayout)
13701  {
13702  delete mPlotLayout;
13703  mPlotLayout = nullptr;
13704  }
13705 
13706  mCurrentLayer = nullptr;
13707  qDeleteAll(mLayers); // don't use removeLayer, because it would prevent the last layer to be removed
13708  mLayers.clear();
13709 }
13710 
13728 void QCustomPlot::setAntialiasedElements(const QCP::AntialiasedElements &antialiasedElements)
13729 {
13730  mAntialiasedElements = antialiasedElements;
13731 
13732  // make sure elements aren't in mNotAntialiasedElements and mAntialiasedElements simultaneously:
13733  if ((mNotAntialiasedElements & mAntialiasedElements) != 0)
13734  mNotAntialiasedElements |= ~mAntialiasedElements;
13735 }
13736 
13744 void QCustomPlot::setAntialiasedElement(QCP::AntialiasedElement antialiasedElement, bool enabled)
13745 {
13746  if (!enabled && mAntialiasedElements.testFlag(antialiasedElement))
13747  mAntialiasedElements &= ~antialiasedElement;
13748  else if (enabled && !mAntialiasedElements.testFlag(antialiasedElement))
13749  mAntialiasedElements |= antialiasedElement;
13750 
13751  // make sure elements aren't in mNotAntialiasedElements and mAntialiasedElements simultaneously:
13752  if ((mNotAntialiasedElements & mAntialiasedElements) != 0)
13753  mNotAntialiasedElements |= ~mAntialiasedElements;
13754 }
13755 
13774 void QCustomPlot::setNotAntialiasedElements(const QCP::AntialiasedElements &notAntialiasedElements)
13775 {
13776  mNotAntialiasedElements = notAntialiasedElements;
13777 
13778  // make sure elements aren't in mNotAntialiasedElements and mAntialiasedElements simultaneously:
13779  if ((mNotAntialiasedElements & mAntialiasedElements) != 0)
13780  mAntialiasedElements |= ~mNotAntialiasedElements;
13781 }
13782 
13790 void QCustomPlot::setNotAntialiasedElement(QCP::AntialiasedElement notAntialiasedElement, bool enabled)
13791 {
13792  if (!enabled && mNotAntialiasedElements.testFlag(notAntialiasedElement))
13793  mNotAntialiasedElements &= ~notAntialiasedElement;
13794  else if (enabled && !mNotAntialiasedElements.testFlag(notAntialiasedElement))
13795  mNotAntialiasedElements |= notAntialiasedElement;
13796 
13797  // make sure elements aren't in mNotAntialiasedElements and mAntialiasedElements simultaneously:
13798  if ((mNotAntialiasedElements & mAntialiasedElements) != 0)
13799  mAntialiasedElements |= ~mNotAntialiasedElements;
13800 }
13801 
13808 void QCustomPlot::setAutoAddPlottableToLegend(bool on)
13809 {
13810  mAutoAddPlottableToLegend = on;
13811 }
13812 
13867 void QCustomPlot::setInteractions(const QCP::Interactions &interactions)
13868 {
13869  mInteractions = interactions;
13870 }
13871 
13879 void QCustomPlot::setInteraction(const QCP::Interaction &interaction, bool enabled)
13880 {
13881  if (!enabled && mInteractions.testFlag(interaction))
13882  mInteractions &= ~interaction;
13883  else if (enabled && !mInteractions.testFlag(interaction))
13884  mInteractions |= interaction;
13885 }
13886 
13900 void QCustomPlot::setSelectionTolerance(int pixels)
13901 {
13902  mSelectionTolerance = pixels;
13903 }
13904 
13914 void QCustomPlot::setNoAntialiasingOnDrag(bool enabled)
13915 {
13916  mNoAntialiasingOnDrag = enabled;
13917 }
13918 
13924 void QCustomPlot::setPlottingHints(const QCP::PlottingHints &hints)
13925 {
13926  mPlottingHints = hints;
13927 }
13928 
13934 void QCustomPlot::setPlottingHint(QCP::PlottingHint hint, bool enabled)
13935 {
13936  QCP::PlottingHints newHints = mPlottingHints;
13937  if (!enabled)
13938  newHints &= ~hint;
13939  else
13940  newHints |= hint;
13941 
13942  if (newHints != mPlottingHints)
13943  setPlottingHints(newHints);
13944 }
13945 
13956 void QCustomPlot::setMultiSelectModifier(Qt::KeyboardModifier modifier)
13957 {
13958  mMultiSelectModifier = modifier;
13959 }
13960 
13981 void QCustomPlot::setSelectionRectMode(QCP::SelectionRectMode mode)
13982 {
13983  if (mSelectionRect)
13984  {
13985  if (mode == QCP::srmNone)
13986  mSelectionRect->cancel(); // when switching to none, we immediately want to abort a potentially active selection rect
13987 
13988  // disconnect old connections:
13989  if (mSelectionRectMode == QCP::srmSelect)
13990  disconnect(mSelectionRect, SIGNAL(accepted(QRect,QMouseEvent*)), this, SLOT(processRectSelection(QRect,QMouseEvent*)));
13991  else if (mSelectionRectMode == QCP::srmZoom)
13992  disconnect(mSelectionRect, SIGNAL(accepted(QRect,QMouseEvent*)), this, SLOT(processRectZoom(QRect,QMouseEvent*)));
13993 
13994  // establish new ones:
13995  if (mode == QCP::srmSelect)
13996  connect(mSelectionRect, SIGNAL(accepted(QRect,QMouseEvent*)), this, SLOT(processRectSelection(QRect,QMouseEvent*)));
13997  else if (mode == QCP::srmZoom)
13998  connect(mSelectionRect, SIGNAL(accepted(QRect,QMouseEvent*)), this, SLOT(processRectZoom(QRect,QMouseEvent*)));
13999  }
14000 
14001  mSelectionRectMode = mode;
14002 }
14003 
14014 void QCustomPlot::setSelectionRect(QCPSelectionRect *selectionRect)
14015 {
14016  delete mSelectionRect;
14017 
14018  mSelectionRect = selectionRect;
14019 
14020  if (mSelectionRect)
14021  {
14022  // establish connections with new selection rect:
14023  if (mSelectionRectMode == QCP::srmSelect)
14024  connect(mSelectionRect, SIGNAL(accepted(QRect,QMouseEvent*)), this, SLOT(processRectSelection(QRect,QMouseEvent*)));
14025  else if (mSelectionRectMode == QCP::srmZoom)
14026  connect(mSelectionRect, SIGNAL(accepted(QRect,QMouseEvent*)), this, SLOT(processRectZoom(QRect,QMouseEvent*)));
14027  }
14028 }
14029 
14066 void QCustomPlot::setOpenGl(bool enabled, int multisampling)
14067 {
14068  mOpenGlMultisamples = qMax(0, multisampling);
14069 #ifdef QCUSTOMPLOT_USE_OPENGL
14070  mOpenGl = enabled;
14071  if (mOpenGl)
14072  {
14073  if (setupOpenGl())
14074  {
14075  // backup antialiasing override and labelcaching setting so we can restore upon disabling OpenGL
14076  mOpenGlAntialiasedElementsBackup = mAntialiasedElements;
14077  mOpenGlCacheLabelsBackup = mPlottingHints.testFlag(QCP::phCacheLabels);
14078  // set antialiasing override to antialias all (aligns gl pixel grid properly), and disable label caching (would use software rasterizer for pixmap caches):
14079  setAntialiasedElements(QCP::aeAll);
14080  setPlottingHint(QCP::phCacheLabels, false);
14081  } else
14082  {
14083  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Failed to enable OpenGL, continuing plotting without hardware acceleration.";
14084  mOpenGl = false;
14085  }
14086  } else
14087  {
14088  // restore antialiasing override and labelcaching to what it was before enabling OpenGL, if nobody changed it in the meantime:
14089  if (mAntialiasedElements == QCP::aeAll)
14090  setAntialiasedElements(mOpenGlAntialiasedElementsBackup);
14091  if (!mPlottingHints.testFlag(QCP::phCacheLabels))
14092  setPlottingHint(QCP::phCacheLabels, mOpenGlCacheLabelsBackup);
14093  freeOpenGl();
14094  }
14095  // recreate all paint buffers:
14096  mPaintBuffers.clear();
14097  setupPaintBuffers();
14098 #else
14099  Q_UNUSED(enabled)
14100  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "QCustomPlot can't use OpenGL because QCUSTOMPLOT_USE_OPENGL was not defined during compilation (add 'DEFINES += QCUSTOMPLOT_USE_OPENGL' to your qmake .pro file)";
14101 #endif
14102 }
14103 
14120 void QCustomPlot::setViewport(const QRect &rect)
14121 {
14122  mViewport = rect;
14123  if (mPlotLayout)
14124  mPlotLayout->setOuterRect(mViewport);
14125 }
14126 
14138 void QCustomPlot::setBufferDevicePixelRatio(double ratio)
14139 {
14140  if (!qFuzzyCompare(ratio, mBufferDevicePixelRatio))
14141  {
14142 #ifdef QCP_DEVICEPIXELRATIO_SUPPORTED
14143  mBufferDevicePixelRatio = ratio;
14144  foreach (QSharedPointer<QCPAbstractPaintBuffer> buffer, mPaintBuffers)
14145  buffer->setDevicePixelRatio(mBufferDevicePixelRatio);
14146  // Note: axis label cache has devicePixelRatio as part of cache hash, so no need to manually clear cache here
14147 #else
14148  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Device pixel ratios not supported for Qt versions before 5.4";
14149  mBufferDevicePixelRatio = 1.0;
14150 #endif
14151  }
14152 }
14153

14204  mBackgroundScaled = scaled;

14233 
14242 QCPAbstractPlottable *QCustomPlot::plottable(int index)
14243 {
14244  if (index >= 0 && index < mPlottables.size())
14245  {
14246  return mPlottables.at(index);
14247  } else
14248  {
14249  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
14250  return nullptr;
14251  }
14252 }
14253 
14261 QCPAbstractPlottable *QCustomPlot::plottable()
14262 {
14263  if (!mPlottables.isEmpty())
14264  {
14265  return mPlottables.last();
14266  } else
14267  return nullptr;
14268 }
14269 
14278 bool QCustomPlot::removePlottable(QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable)
14279 {
14280  if (!mPlottables.contains(plottable))
14281  {
14282  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "plottable not in list:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(plottable);
14283  return false;
14284  }
14285 
14286  // remove plottable from legend:
14287  plottable->removeFromLegend();
14288  // special handling for QCPGraphs to maintain the simple graph interface:
14289  if (QCPGraph *graph = qobject_cast<QCPGraph*>(plottable))
14290  mGraphs.removeOne(graph);
14291  // remove plottable:
14292  delete plottable;
14293  mPlottables.removeOne(plottable);
14294  return true;
14295 }
14296 
14301 bool QCustomPlot::removePlottable(int index)
14302 {
14303  if (index >= 0 && index < mPlottables.size())
14304  return removePlottable(mPlottables[index]);
14305  else
14306  {
14307  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
14308  return false;
14309  }
14310 }
14311 
14320 int QCustomPlot::clearPlottables()
14321 {
14322  int c = mPlottables.size();
14323  for (int i=c-1; i >= 0; --i)
14324  removePlottable(mPlottables[i]);
14325  return c;
14326 }
14327 
14333 int QCustomPlot::plottableCount() const
14334 {
14335  return mPlottables.size();
14336 }
14337 
14345 QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> QCustomPlot::selectedPlottables() const
14346 {
14347  QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> result;
14348  foreach (QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable, mPlottables)
14349  {
14350  if (plottable->selected())
14351  result.append(plottable);
14352  }
14353  return result;
14354 }

14366 {
14367  return plottableAt<QCPAbstractPlottable>(pos, onlySelectable, dataIndex);
14368 }

14374 {
14375  return mPlottables.contains(plottable);

14386 QCPGraph *QCustomPlot::graph(int index) const
14387 {
14388  if (index >= 0 && index < mGraphs.size())
14389  {
14390  return mGraphs.at(index);
14391  } else
14392  {
14393  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
14394  return nullptr;
14395  }
14396 }
14397 
14405 QCPGraph *QCustomPlot::graph() const
14406 {
14407  if (!mGraphs.isEmpty())
14408  {
14409  return mGraphs.last();
14410  } else
14411  return nullptr;
14412 }
14413 
14426 QCPGraph *QCustomPlot::addGraph(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis)
14427 {
14428  if (!keyAxis) keyAxis = xAxis;
14429  if (!valueAxis) valueAxis = yAxis;
14430  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis)
14431  {
14432  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't use default QCustomPlot xAxis or yAxis, because at least one is invalid (has been deleted)";
14433  return nullptr;
14434  }
14435  if (keyAxis->parentPlot() != this || valueAxis->parentPlot() != this)
14436  {
14437  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "passed keyAxis or valueAxis doesn't have this QCustomPlot as parent";
14438  return nullptr;
14439  }
14440 
14441  QCPGraph *newGraph = new QCPGraph(keyAxis, valueAxis);
14442  newGraph->setName(QLatin1String("Graph ")+QString::number(mGraphs.size()));
14443  return newGraph;
14444 }
14445 
14456 bool QCustomPlot::removeGraph(QCPGraph *graph)
14457 {
14458  return removePlottable(graph);
14459 }
14460 
14465 bool QCustomPlot::removeGraph(int index)
14466 {
14467  if (index >= 0 && index < mGraphs.size())
14468  return removeGraph(mGraphs[index]);
14469  else
14470  return false;
14471 }
14472 
14481 int QCustomPlot::clearGraphs()
14482 {
14483  int c = mGraphs.size();
14484  for (int i=c-1; i >= 0; --i)
14485  removeGraph(mGraphs[i]);
14486  return c;
14487 }

14495 {

14508 {
14509  QList<QCPGraph*> result;
14510  foreach (QCPGraph *graph, mGraphs)
14511  {
14512  if (graph->selected())
14513  result.append(graph);
14514  }
14515  return result;
14516 }

14530  return mItems.at(index);
14531  } else

14533  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
14534  return nullptr;
14535  }
14536 }

14548  {
14549  return mItems.last();
14550  } else
14551  return nullptr;
14552 }
14553 
14561 bool QCustomPlot::removeItem(QCPAbstractItem *item)
14562 {
14563  if (mItems.contains(item))
14564  {
14565  delete item;
14566  mItems.removeOne(item);
14567  return true;
14568  } else
14569  {
14570  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "item not in list:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(item);
14571  return false;
14572  }
14573 }
14574 
14579 bool QCustomPlot::removeItem(int index)
14580 {
14581  if (index >= 0 && index < mItems.size())
14582  return removeItem(mItems[index]);
14583  else
14584  {
14585  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
14586  return false;
14587  }
14588 }

14597 int QCustomPlot::clearItems()
14598 {
14599  int c = mItems.size();
14600  for (int i=c-1; i >= 0; --i)
14601  removeItem(mItems[i]);
14602  return c;
14603 }

14624  {

14627  }
