14654 
14663 QCPLayer *QCustomPlot::layer(const QString &name) const
14664 {
14665  foreach (QCPLayer *layer, mLayers)
14666  {
14667  if (layer->name() == name)
14668  return layer;
14669  }
14670  return nullptr;
14671 }
14672 
14679 QCPLayer *QCustomPlot::layer(int index) const
14680 {
14681  if (index >= 0 && index < mLayers.size())
14682  {
14683  return mLayers.at(index);
14684  } else
14685  {
14686  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
14687  return nullptr;
14688  }
14689 }
14690 
14694 QCPLayer *QCustomPlot::currentLayer() const
14695 {
14696  return mCurrentLayer;
14697 }
14698 
14709 bool QCustomPlot::setCurrentLayer(const QString &name)
14710 {
14711  if (QCPLayer *newCurrentLayer = layer(name))
14712  {
14713  return setCurrentLayer(newCurrentLayer);
14714  } else
14715  {
14716  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "layer with name doesn't exist:" << name;
14717  return false;
14718  }
14719 }
14720 
14729 bool QCustomPlot::setCurrentLayer(QCPLayer *layer)
14730 {
14731  if (!mLayers.contains(layer))
14732  {
14733  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "layer not a layer of this QCustomPlot:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(layer);
14734  return false;
14735  }
14736 
14737  mCurrentLayer = layer;
14738  return true;
14739 }
14740 
14746 int QCustomPlot::layerCount() const
14747 {
14748  return mLayers.size();
14749 }
14750 
14764 bool QCustomPlot::addLayer(const QString &name, QCPLayer *otherLayer, QCustomPlot::LayerInsertMode insertMode)
14765 {
14766  if (!otherLayer)
14767  otherLayer = mLayers.last();
14768  if (!mLayers.contains(otherLayer))
14769  {
14770  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "otherLayer not a layer of this QCustomPlot:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(otherLayer);
14771  return false;
14772  }
14773  if (layer(name))
14774  {
14775  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "A layer exists already with the name" << name;
14776  return false;
14777  }
14778 
14779  QCPLayer *newLayer = new QCPLayer(this, name);
14780  mLayers.insert(otherLayer->index() + (insertMode==limAbove ? 1:0), newLayer);
14781  updateLayerIndices();
14782  setupPaintBuffers(); // associates new layer with the appropriate paint buffer
14783  return true;
14784 }
14785 
14800 bool QCustomPlot::removeLayer(QCPLayer *layer)
14801 {
14802  if (!mLayers.contains(layer))
14803  {
14804  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "layer not a layer of this QCustomPlot:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(layer);
14805  return false;
14806  }
14807  if (mLayers.size() < 2)
14808  {
14809  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't remove last layer";
14810  return false;
14811  }
14812 
14813  // append all children of this layer to layer below (if this is lowest layer, prepend to layer above)
14814  int removedIndex = layer->index();
14815  bool isFirstLayer = removedIndex==0;
14816  QCPLayer *targetLayer = isFirstLayer ? mLayers.at(removedIndex+1) : mLayers.at(removedIndex-1);
14817  QList<QCPLayerable*> children = layer->children();
14818  if (isFirstLayer) // prepend in reverse order (such that relative order stays the same)
14819  std::reverse(children.begin(), children.end());
14820  foreach (QCPLayerable *child, children)
14821  child->moveToLayer(targetLayer, isFirstLayer); // prepend if isFirstLayer, otherwise append
14822 
14823  // if removed layer is current layer, change current layer to layer below/above:
14824  if (layer == mCurrentLayer)
14825  setCurrentLayer(targetLayer);
14826 
14827  // invalidate the paint buffer that was responsible for this layer:
14828  if (QSharedPointer<QCPAbstractPaintBuffer> pb = layer->mPaintBuffer.toStrongRef())
14829  pb->setInvalidated();
14830 
14831  // remove layer:
14832  delete layer;
14833  mLayers.removeOne(layer);
14834  updateLayerIndices();
14835  return true;
14836 }
14837 
14847 bool QCustomPlot::moveLayer(QCPLayer *layer, QCPLayer *otherLayer, QCustomPlot::LayerInsertMode insertMode)
14848 {
14849  if (!mLayers.contains(layer))
14850  {
14851  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "layer not a layer of this QCustomPlot:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(layer);
14852  return false;
14853  }
14854  if (!mLayers.contains(otherLayer))
14855  {
14856  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "otherLayer not a layer of this QCustomPlot:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(otherLayer);
14857  return false;
14858  }
14859 
14860  if (layer->index() > otherLayer->index())
14861  mLayers.move(layer->index(), otherLayer->index() + (insertMode==limAbove ? 1:0));
14862  else if (layer->index() < otherLayer->index())
14863  mLayers.move(layer->index(), otherLayer->index() + (insertMode==limAbove ? 0:-1));
14864 
14865  // invalidate the paint buffers that are responsible for the layers:
14866  if (QSharedPointer<QCPAbstractPaintBuffer> pb = layer->mPaintBuffer.toStrongRef())
14867  pb->setInvalidated();
14868  if (QSharedPointer<QCPAbstractPaintBuffer> pb = otherLayer->mPaintBuffer.toStrongRef())
14869  pb->setInvalidated();
14870 
14871  updateLayerIndices();
14872  return true;
14873 }
14874 
14884 int QCustomPlot::axisRectCount() const
14885 {
14886  return axisRects().size();
14887 }
14888 
14908 QCPAxisRect *QCustomPlot::axisRect(int index) const
14909 {
14910  const QList<QCPAxisRect*> rectList = axisRects();
14911  if (index >= 0 && index < rectList.size())
14912  {
14913  return rectList.at(index);
14914  } else
14915  {
14916  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid axis rect index" << index;
14917  return nullptr;
14918  }
14919 }
14920 
14932 QList<QCPAxisRect*> QCustomPlot::axisRects() const
14933 {
14934  QList<QCPAxisRect*> result;
14935  QStack<QCPLayoutElement*> elementStack;
14936  if (mPlotLayout)
14937  elementStack.push(mPlotLayout);
14938 
14939  while (!elementStack.isEmpty())
14940  {
14941  foreach (QCPLayoutElement *element, elementStack.pop()->elements(false))
14942  {
14943  if (element)
14944  {
14945  elementStack.push(element);
14946  if (QCPAxisRect *ar = qobject_cast<QCPAxisRect*>(element))
14947  result.append(ar);
14948  }
14949  }
14950  }
14951 
14952  return result;
14953 }
14954 
14964 QCPLayoutElement *QCustomPlot::layoutElementAt(const QPointF &pos) const
14965 {
14966  QCPLayoutElement *currentElement = mPlotLayout;
14967  bool searchSubElements = true;
14968  while (searchSubElements && currentElement)
14969  {
14970  searchSubElements = false;
14971  foreach (QCPLayoutElement *subElement, currentElement->elements(false))
14972  {
14973  if (subElement && subElement->realVisibility() && subElement->selectTest(pos, false) >= 0)
14974  {
14975  currentElement = subElement;
14976  searchSubElements = true;
14977  break;
14978  }
14979  }
14980  }
14981  return currentElement;
14982 }
14983 
14994 QCPAxisRect *QCustomPlot::axisRectAt(const QPointF &pos) const
14995 {
14996  QCPAxisRect *result = nullptr;
14997  QCPLayoutElement *currentElement = mPlotLayout;
14998  bool searchSubElements = true;
14999  while (searchSubElements && currentElement)
15000  {
15001  searchSubElements = false;
15002  foreach (QCPLayoutElement *subElement, currentElement->elements(false))
15003  {
15004  if (subElement && subElement->realVisibility() && subElement->selectTest(pos, false) >= 0)
15005  {
15006  currentElement = subElement;
15007  searchSubElements = true;
15008  if (QCPAxisRect *ar = qobject_cast<QCPAxisRect*>(currentElement))
15009  result = ar;
15010  break;
15011  }
15012  }
15013  }
15014  return result;
15015 }
15016 
15024 QList<QCPAxis*> QCustomPlot::selectedAxes() const
15025 {
15026  QList<QCPAxis*> result, allAxes;
15027  foreach (QCPAxisRect *rect, axisRects())
15028  allAxes << rect->axes();
15029 
15030  foreach (QCPAxis *axis, allAxes)
15031  {
15032  if (axis->selectedParts() != QCPAxis::spNone)
15033  result.append(axis);
15034  }
15035 
15036  return result;
15037 }
15038 
15046 QList<QCPLegend*> QCustomPlot::selectedLegends() const
15047 {
15048  QList<QCPLegend*> result;
15049 
15050  QStack<QCPLayoutElement*> elementStack;
15051  if (mPlotLayout)
15052  elementStack.push(mPlotLayout);
15053 
15054  while (!elementStack.isEmpty())
15055  {
15056  foreach (QCPLayoutElement *subElement, elementStack.pop()->elements(false))
15057  {
15058  if (subElement)
15059  {
15060  elementStack.push(subElement);
15061  if (QCPLegend *leg = qobject_cast<QCPLegend*>(subElement))
15062  {
15063  if (leg->selectedParts() != QCPLegend::spNone)
15064  result.append(leg);
15065  }
15066  }
15067  }
15068  }
15069 
15070  return result;
15071 }
15072 
15082 void QCustomPlot::deselectAll()
15083 {
15084  foreach (QCPLayer *layer, mLayers)
15085  {
15086  foreach (QCPLayerable *layerable, layer->children())
15087  layerable->deselectEvent(nullptr);
15088  }
15089 }
15090 
15118 void QCustomPlot::replot(QCustomPlot::RefreshPriority refreshPriority)
15119 {
15120  if (refreshPriority == QCustomPlot::rpQueuedReplot)
15121  {
15122  if (!mReplotQueued)
15123  {
15124  mReplotQueued = true;
15125  QTimer::singleShot(0, this, SLOT(replot()));
15126  }
15127  return;
15128  }
15129 
15130  if (mReplotting) // incase signals loop back to replot slot
15131  return;
15132  mReplotting = true;
15133  mReplotQueued = false;
15134  emit beforeReplot();
15135 
15136 # if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(4, 8, 0)
15137  QTime replotTimer;
15138  replotTimer.start();
15139 # else
15140  QElapsedTimer replotTimer;
15141  replotTimer.start();
15142 # endif
15143 
15144  updateLayout();
15145  // draw all layered objects (grid, axes, plottables, items, legend,...) into their buffers:
15146  setupPaintBuffers();
15147  foreach (QCPLayer *layer, mLayers)
15148  layer->drawToPaintBuffer();
15149  foreach (QSharedPointer<QCPAbstractPaintBuffer> buffer, mPaintBuffers)
15150  buffer->setInvalidated(false);
15151 
15152  if ((refreshPriority == rpRefreshHint && mPlottingHints.testFlag(QCP::phImmediateRefresh)) || refreshPriority==rpImmediateRefresh)
15153  repaint();
15154  else
15155  update();
15156 
15157 # if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(4, 8, 0)
15158  mReplotTime = replotTimer.elapsed();
15159 # else
15160  mReplotTime = replotTimer.nsecsElapsed()*1e-6;
15161 # endif
15162  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(mReplotTimeAverage))
15163  mReplotTimeAverage = mReplotTimeAverage*0.9 + mReplotTime*0.1; // exponential moving average with a time constant of 10 last replots
15164  else
15165  mReplotTimeAverage = mReplotTime; // no previous replots to average with, so initialize with replot time
15166 
15167  emit afterReplot();
15168  mReplotting = false;
15169 }
15170 
15177 double QCustomPlot::replotTime(bool average) const
15178 {
15179  return average ? mReplotTimeAverage : mReplotTime;
15180 }
15181 
15190 void QCustomPlot::rescaleAxes(bool onlyVisiblePlottables)
15191 {
15192  QList<QCPAxis*> allAxes;
15193  foreach (QCPAxisRect *rect, axisRects())
15194  allAxes << rect->axes();
15195 
15196  foreach (QCPAxis *axis, allAxes)
15197  axis->rescale(onlyVisiblePlottables);
15198 }
15199 
15237 bool QCustomPlot::savePdf(const QString &fileName, int width, int height, QCP::ExportPen exportPen, const QString &pdfCreator, const QString &pdfTitle)
15238 {
15239  bool success = false;
15240 #ifdef QT_NO_PRINTER
15241  Q_UNUSED(fileName)
15242  Q_UNUSED(exportPen)
15243  Q_UNUSED(width)
15244  Q_UNUSED(height)
15245  Q_UNUSED(pdfCreator)
15246  Q_UNUSED(pdfTitle)
15247  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Qt was built without printer support (QT_NO_PRINTER). PDF not created.";
15248 #else
15249  int newWidth, newHeight;
15250  if (width == 0 || height == 0)
15251  {
15252  newWidth = this->width();
15253  newHeight = this->height();
15254  } else
15255  {
15256  newWidth = width;
15257  newHeight = height;
15258  }
15259 
15260  QPrinter printer(QPrinter::ScreenResolution);
15261  printer.setOutputFileName(fileName);
15262  printer.setOutputFormat(QPrinter::PdfFormat);
15263  printer.setColorMode(QPrinter::Color);
15264  printer.printEngine()->setProperty(QPrintEngine::PPK_Creator, pdfCreator);
15265  printer.printEngine()->setProperty(QPrintEngine::PPK_DocumentName, pdfTitle);
15266  QRect oldViewport = viewport();
15267  setViewport(QRect(0, 0, newWidth, newHeight));
15268 #if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(5, 3, 0)
15269  printer.setFullPage(true);
15270  printer.setPaperSize(viewport().size(), QPrinter::DevicePixel);
15271 #else
15272  QPageLayout pageLayout;
15273  pageLayout.setMode(QPageLayout::FullPageMode);
15274  pageLayout.setOrientation(QPageLayout::Portrait);
15275  pageLayout.setMargins(QMarginsF(0, 0, 0, 0));
15276  pageLayout.setPageSize(QPageSize(viewport().size(), QPageSize::Point, QString(), QPageSize::ExactMatch));
15277  printer.setPageLayout(pageLayout);
15278 #endif
15279  QCPPainter printpainter;
15280  if (printpainter.begin(&printer))
15281  {
15282  printpainter.setMode(QCPPainter::pmVectorized);
15283  printpainter.setMode(QCPPainter::pmNoCaching);
15284  printpainter.setMode(QCPPainter::pmNonCosmetic, exportPen==QCP::epNoCosmetic);
15285  printpainter.setWindow(mViewport);
15286  if (mBackgroundBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush &&
15287  mBackgroundBrush.color() != Qt::white &&
15288  mBackgroundBrush.color() != Qt::transparent &&
15289  mBackgroundBrush.color().alpha() > 0) // draw pdf background color if not white/transparent
15290  printpainter.fillRect(viewport(), mBackgroundBrush);
15291  draw(&printpainter);
15292  printpainter.end();
15293  success = true;
15294  }
15295  setViewport(oldViewport);
15296 #endif // QT_NO_PRINTER
15297  return success;
15298 }
15299 
15345 bool QCustomPlot::savePng(const QString &fileName, int width, int height, double scale, int quality, int resolution, QCP::ResolutionUnit resolutionUnit)
15346 {
15347  return saveRastered(fileName, width, height, scale, "PNG", quality, resolution, resolutionUnit);
15348 }
15349 
15392 bool QCustomPlot::saveJpg(const QString &fileName, int width, int height, double scale, int quality, int resolution, QCP::ResolutionUnit resolutionUnit)
15393 {
15394  return saveRastered(fileName, width, height, scale, "JPG", quality, resolution, resolutionUnit);
15395 }
15396 
15436 bool QCustomPlot::saveBmp(const QString &fileName, int width, int height, double scale, int resolution, QCP::ResolutionUnit resolutionUnit)
15437 {
15438  return saveRastered(fileName, width, height, scale, "BMP", -1, resolution, resolutionUnit);
15439 }
15440 
15449 QSize QCustomPlot::minimumSizeHint() const
15450 {
15451  return mPlotLayout->minimumOuterSizeHint();
15452 }
15453 
15459 QSize QCustomPlot::sizeHint() const
15460 {
15461  return mPlotLayout->minimumOuterSizeHint();
15462 }
15463 
15469 void QCustomPlot::paintEvent(QPaintEvent *event)
15470 {
15471  Q_UNUSED(event)
15472 
15473  // detect if the device pixel ratio has changed (e.g. moving window between different DPI screens), and adapt buffers if necessary:
15474 #ifdef QCP_DEVICEPIXELRATIO_SUPPORTED
15475 # ifdef QCP_DEVICEPIXELRATIO_FLOAT
15476  double newDpr = devicePixelRatioF();
15477 # else
15478  double newDpr = devicePixelRatio();
15479 # endif
15480  if (!qFuzzyCompare(mBufferDevicePixelRatio, newDpr))
15481  {
15482  setBufferDevicePixelRatio(newDpr);
15483  replot(QCustomPlot::rpQueuedRefresh);
15484  return;
15485  }
15486 #endif
15487 
15488  QCPPainter painter(this);
15489  if (painter.isActive())
15490  {
15491 #if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(6, 0, 0)
15492  painter.setRenderHint(QPainter::HighQualityAntialiasing); // to make Antialiasing look good if using the OpenGL graphicssystem
15493 #endif
15494  if (mBackgroundBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush)
15495  painter.fillRect(mViewport, mBackgroundBrush);
15496  drawBackground(&painter);
15497  foreach (QSharedPointer<QCPAbstractPaintBuffer> buffer, mPaintBuffers)
15498  buffer->draw(&painter);
15499  }
15500 }
15501 
15507 void QCustomPlot::resizeEvent(QResizeEvent *event)
15508 {
15509  Q_UNUSED(event)
15510  // resize and repaint the buffer:
15511  setViewport(rect());
15512  replot(rpQueuedRefresh); // queued refresh is important here, to prevent painting issues in some contexts (e.g. MDI subwindow)
15513 }
15514 
15524 void QCustomPlot::mouseDoubleClickEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
15525 {
15526  emit mouseDoubleClick(event);
15527  mMouseHasMoved = false;
15528  mMousePressPos = event->pos();
15529 
15530  // determine layerable under the cursor (this event is called instead of the second press event in a double-click):
15531  QList<QVariant> details;
15532  QList<QCPLayerable*> candidates = layerableListAt(mMousePressPos, false, &details);
15533  for (int i=0; i<candidates.size(); ++i)
15534  {
15535  event->accept(); // default impl of QCPLayerable's mouse events ignore the event, in that case propagate to next candidate in list
15536  candidates.at(i)->mouseDoubleClickEvent(event, details.at(i));
15537  if (event->isAccepted())
15538  {
15539  mMouseEventLayerable = candidates.at(i);
15540  mMouseEventLayerableDetails = details.at(i);
15541  break;
15542  }
15543  }
15544 
15545  // emit specialized object double click signals:
15546  if (!candidates.isEmpty())
15547  {
15548  if (QCPAbstractPlottable *ap = qobject_cast<QCPAbstractPlottable*>(candidates.first()))
15549  {
15550  int dataIndex = 0;
15551  if (!details.first().value<QCPDataSelection>().isEmpty())
15552  dataIndex = details.first().value<QCPDataSelection>().dataRange().begin();
15553  emit plottableDoubleClick(ap, dataIndex, event);
15554  } else if (QCPAxis *ax = qobject_cast<QCPAxis*>(candidates.first()))
15555  emit axisDoubleClick(ax, details.first().value<QCPAxis::SelectablePart>(), event);
15556  else if (QCPAbstractItem *ai = qobject_cast<QCPAbstractItem*>(candidates.first()))
15557  emit itemDoubleClick(ai, event);
15558  else if (QCPLegend *lg = qobject_cast<QCPLegend*>(candidates.first()))
15559  emit legendDoubleClick(lg, nullptr, event);
15560  else if (QCPAbstractLegendItem *li = qobject_cast<QCPAbstractLegendItem*>(candidates.first()))
15561  emit legendDoubleClick(li->parentLegend(), li, event);
15562  }
15563 
15564  event->accept(); // in case QCPLayerable reimplementation manipulates event accepted state. In QWidget event system, QCustomPlot wants to accept the event.
15565 }
15566 
15576 void QCustomPlot::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
15577 {
15578  emit mousePress(event);
15579  // save some state to tell in releaseEvent whether it was a click:
15580  mMouseHasMoved = false;
15581  mMousePressPos = event->pos();
15582 
15583  if (mSelectionRect && mSelectionRectMode != QCP::srmNone)
15584  {
15585  if (mSelectionRectMode != QCP::srmZoom || qobject_cast<QCPAxisRect*>(axisRectAt(mMousePressPos))) // in zoom mode only activate selection rect if on an axis rect
15586  mSelectionRect->startSelection(event);
15587  } else
15588  {
15589  // no selection rect interaction, prepare for click signal emission and forward event to layerable under the cursor:
15590  QList<QVariant> details;
15591  QList<QCPLayerable*> candidates = layerableListAt(mMousePressPos, false, &details);
15592  if (!candidates.isEmpty())
15593  {
15594  mMouseSignalLayerable = candidates.first(); // candidate for signal emission is always topmost hit layerable (signal emitted in release event)
15595  mMouseSignalLayerableDetails = details.first();
15596  }
15597  // forward event to topmost candidate which accepts the event:
15598  for (int i=0; i<candidates.size(); ++i)
15599  {
15600  event->accept(); // default impl of QCPLayerable's mouse events call ignore() on the event, in that case propagate to next candidate in list
15601  candidates.at(i)->mousePressEvent(event, details.at(i));
15602  if (event->isAccepted())
15603  {
15604  mMouseEventLayerable = candidates.at(i);
15605  mMouseEventLayerableDetails = details.at(i);
15606  break;
15607  }
15608  }
15609  }
15610 
15611  event->accept(); // in case QCPLayerable reimplementation manipulates event accepted state. In QWidget event system, QCustomPlot wants to accept the event.
15612 }
15613 
15626 void QCustomPlot::mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
15627 {
15628  emit mouseMove(event);
15629 
15630  if (!mMouseHasMoved && (mMousePressPos-event->pos()).manhattanLength() > 3)
15631  mMouseHasMoved = true; // moved too far from mouse press position, don't handle as click on mouse release
15632 
15633  if (mSelectionRect && mSelectionRect->isActive())
15634  mSelectionRect->moveSelection(event);
15635  else if (mMouseEventLayerable) // call event of affected layerable:
15636  mMouseEventLayerable->mouseMoveEvent(event, mMousePressPos);
15637 
15638  event->accept(); // in case QCPLayerable reimplementation manipulates event accepted state. In QWidget event system, QCustomPlot wants to accept the event.
15639 }
15640 
15655 void QCustomPlot::mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
15656 {
15657  emit mouseRelease(event);
15658 
15659  if (!mMouseHasMoved) // mouse hasn't moved (much) between press and release, so handle as click
15660  {
15661  if (mSelectionRect && mSelectionRect->isActive()) // a simple click shouldn't successfully finish a selection rect, so cancel it here
15662  mSelectionRect->cancel();
15663  if (event->button() == Qt::LeftButton)
15664  processPointSelection(event);
15665 
15666  // emit specialized click signals of QCustomPlot instance:
15667  if (QCPAbstractPlottable *ap = qobject_cast<QCPAbstractPlottable*>(mMouseSignalLayerable))
15668  {
15669  int dataIndex = 0;
15670  if (!mMouseSignalLayerableDetails.value<QCPDataSelection>().isEmpty())
15671  dataIndex = mMouseSignalLayerableDetails.value<QCPDataSelection>().dataRange().begin();
15672  emit plottableClick(ap, dataIndex, event);
15673  } else if (QCPAxis *ax = qobject_cast<QCPAxis*>(mMouseSignalLayerable))
15674  emit axisClick(ax, mMouseSignalLayerableDetails.value<QCPAxis::SelectablePart>(), event);
15675  else if (QCPAbstractItem *ai = qobject_cast<QCPAbstractItem*>(mMouseSignalLayerable))
15676  emit itemClick(ai, event);
15677  else if (QCPLegend *lg = qobject_cast<QCPLegend*>(mMouseSignalLayerable))
15678  emit legendClick(lg, nullptr, event);
15679  else if (QCPAbstractLegendItem *li = qobject_cast<QCPAbstractLegendItem*>(mMouseSignalLayerable))
15680  emit legendClick(li->parentLegend(), li, event);
15681  mMouseSignalLayerable = nullptr;
15682  }
15683 
15684  if (mSelectionRect && mSelectionRect->isActive()) // Note: if a click was detected above, the selection rect is canceled there
15685  {
15686  // finish selection rect, the appropriate action will be taken via signal-slot connection:
15687  mSelectionRect->endSelection(event);
15688  } else
15689  {
15690  // call event of affected layerable:
15691  if (mMouseEventLayerable)
15692  {
15693  mMouseEventLayerable->mouseReleaseEvent(event, mMousePressPos);
15694  mMouseEventLayerable = nullptr;
15695  }
15696  }
15697 
15698  if (noAntialiasingOnDrag())
15699  replot(rpQueuedReplot);
15700 
15701  event->accept(); // in case QCPLayerable reimplementation manipulates event accepted state. In QWidget event system, QCustomPlot wants to accept the event.
15702 }
15703 
15709 void QCustomPlot::wheelEvent(QWheelEvent *event)
15710 {
15711  emit mouseWheel(event);
15712 
15713 #if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(5, 14, 0)
15714  const QPointF pos = event->pos();
15715 #else
15716  const QPointF pos = event->position();
15717 #endif
15718 
15719  // forward event to layerable under cursor:
15720  foreach (QCPLayerable *candidate, layerableListAt(pos, false))
15721  {
15722  event->accept(); // default impl of QCPLayerable's mouse events ignore the event, in that case propagate to next candidate in list
15723  candidate->wheelEvent(event);
15724  if (event->isAccepted())
15725  break;
15726  }
15727  event->accept(); // in case QCPLayerable reimplementation manipulates event accepted state. In QWidget event system, QCustomPlot wants to accept the event.
15728 }
15729 
15740 void QCustomPlot::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
15741 {
15742  updateLayout();
15743 
15744  // draw viewport background pixmap:
15745  drawBackground(painter);
15746 
15747  // draw all layered objects (grid, axes, plottables, items, legend,...):
15748  foreach (QCPLayer *layer, mLayers)
15749  layer->draw(painter);
15750 
15751  /* Debug code to draw all layout element rects
15752  foreach (QCPLayoutElement *el, findChildren<QCPLayoutElement*>())
15753  {
15754  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
15755  painter->setPen(QPen(QColor(0, 0, 0, 100), 0, Qt::DashLine));
15756  painter->drawRect(el->rect());
15757  painter->setPen(QPen(QColor(255, 0, 0, 100), 0, Qt::DashLine));
15758  painter->drawRect(el->outerRect());
15759  }
15760  */
15761 }
15762 
15771 void QCustomPlot::updateLayout()
15772 {
15773  // run through layout phases:
15774  mPlotLayout->update(QCPLayoutElement::upPreparation);
15775  mPlotLayout->update(QCPLayoutElement::upMargins);
15776  mPlotLayout->update(QCPLayoutElement::upLayout);
15777 
15778  emit afterLayout();
15779 }
15780 
15798 void QCustomPlot::drawBackground(QCPPainter *painter)
15799 {
15800  // Note: background color is handled in individual replot/save functions
15801 
15802  // draw background pixmap (on top of fill, if brush specified):
15803  if (!mBackgroundPixmap.isNull())
15804  {
15805  if (mBackgroundScaled)
15806  {
15807  // check whether mScaledBackground needs to be updated:
15808  QSize scaledSize(mBackgroundPixmap.size());
15809  scaledSize.scale(mViewport.size(), mBackgroundScaledMode);
15810  if (mScaledBackgroundPixmap.size() != scaledSize)
15811  mScaledBackgroundPixmap = mBackgroundPixmap.scaled(mViewport.size(), mBackgroundScaledMode, Qt::SmoothTransformation);
15812  painter->drawPixmap(mViewport.topLeft(), mScaledBackgroundPixmap, QRect(0, 0, mViewport.width(), mViewport.height()) & mScaledBackgroundPixmap.rect());
15813  } else
15814  {
15815  painter->drawPixmap(mViewport.topLeft(), mBackgroundPixmap, QRect(0, 0, mViewport.width(), mViewport.height()));
15816  }
15817  }
15818 }
15819 
15839 void QCustomPlot::setupPaintBuffers()
15840 {
15841  int bufferIndex = 0;
15842  if (mPaintBuffers.isEmpty())
15843  mPaintBuffers.append(QSharedPointer<QCPAbstractPaintBuffer>(createPaintBuffer()));
15844 
15845  for (int layerIndex = 0; layerIndex < mLayers.size(); ++layerIndex)
15846  {
15847  QCPLayer *layer = mLayers.at(layerIndex);
15848  if (layer->mode() == QCPLayer::lmLogical)
15849  {
15850  layer->mPaintBuffer = mPaintBuffers.at(bufferIndex).toWeakRef();
15851  } else if (layer->mode() == QCPLayer::lmBuffered)
15852  {
15853  ++bufferIndex;
15854  if (bufferIndex >= mPaintBuffers.size())
15855  mPaintBuffers.append(QSharedPointer<QCPAbstractPaintBuffer>(createPaintBuffer()));
15856  layer->mPaintBuffer = mPaintBuffers.at(bufferIndex).toWeakRef();
15857  if (layerIndex < mLayers.size()-1 && mLayers.at(layerIndex+1)->mode() == QCPLayer::lmLogical) // not last layer, and next one is logical, so prepare another buffer for next layerables
15858  {
15859  ++bufferIndex;
15860  if (bufferIndex >= mPaintBuffers.size())
15861  mPaintBuffers.append(QSharedPointer<QCPAbstractPaintBuffer>(createPaintBuffer()));
15862  }
15863  }
15864  }
15865  // remove unneeded buffers:
15866  while (mPaintBuffers.size()-1 > bufferIndex)
15867  mPaintBuffers.removeLast();
15868  // resize buffers to viewport size and clear contents:
15869  foreach (QSharedPointer<QCPAbstractPaintBuffer> buffer, mPaintBuffers)
15870  {
15871  buffer->setSize(viewport().size()); // won't do anything if already correct size
15872  buffer->clear(Qt::transparent);
15873  buffer->setInvalidated();
15874  }
15875 }
15876 
15885 QCPAbstractPaintBuffer *QCustomPlot::createPaintBuffer()
15886 {
15887  if (mOpenGl)
15888  {
15889 #if defined(QCP_OPENGL_FBO)
15890  return new QCPPaintBufferGlFbo(viewport().size(), mBufferDevicePixelRatio, mGlContext, mGlPaintDevice);
15891 #elif defined(QCP_OPENGL_PBUFFER)
15892  return new QCPPaintBufferGlPbuffer(viewport().size(), mBufferDevicePixelRatio, mOpenGlMultisamples);
15893 #else
15894  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "OpenGL enabled even though no support for it compiled in, this shouldn't have happened. Falling back to pixmap paint buffer.";
15895  return new QCPPaintBufferPixmap(viewport().size(), mBufferDevicePixelRatio);
15896 #endif
15897  } else
15898  return new QCPPaintBufferPixmap(viewport().size(), mBufferDevicePixelRatio);
15899 }
15900 
15912 bool QCustomPlot::hasInvalidatedPaintBuffers()
15913 {
15914  foreach (QSharedPointer<QCPAbstractPaintBuffer> buffer, mPaintBuffers)
15915  {
15916  if (buffer->invalidated())
15917  return true;
15918  }
15919  return false;
15920 }
15921 
15935 bool QCustomPlot::setupOpenGl()
15936 {
15937 #ifdef QCP_OPENGL_FBO
15938  freeOpenGl();
15939  QSurfaceFormat proposedSurfaceFormat;
15940  proposedSurfaceFormat.setSamples(mOpenGlMultisamples);
15941 #ifdef QCP_OPENGL_OFFSCREENSURFACE
15942  QOffscreenSurface *surface = new QOffscreenSurface;
15943 #else
15944  QWindow *surface = new QWindow;
15945  surface->setSurfaceType(QSurface::OpenGLSurface);
15946 #endif
15947  surface->setFormat(proposedSurfaceFormat);
15948  surface->create();
15949  mGlSurface = QSharedPointer<QSurface>(surface);
15950  mGlContext = QSharedPointer<QOpenGLContext>(new QOpenGLContext);
15951  mGlContext->setFormat(mGlSurface->format());
15952  if (!mGlContext->create())
15953  {
15954  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Failed to create OpenGL context";
15955  mGlContext.clear();
15956  mGlSurface.clear();
15957  return false;
15958  }
15959  if (!mGlContext->makeCurrent(mGlSurface.data())) // context needs to be current to create paint device
15960  {
15961  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Failed to make opengl context current";
15962  mGlContext.clear();
15963  mGlSurface.clear();
15964  return false;
15965  }
15966  if (!QOpenGLFramebufferObject::hasOpenGLFramebufferObjects())
15967  {
15968  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "OpenGL of this system doesn't support frame buffer objects";
15969  mGlContext.clear();
15970  mGlSurface.clear();
15971  return false;
15972  }
15973  mGlPaintDevice = QSharedPointer<QOpenGLPaintDevice>(new QOpenGLPaintDevice);
15974  return true;
15975 #elif defined(QCP_OPENGL_PBUFFER)
15976  return QGLFormat::hasOpenGL();
15977 #else
15978  return false;
15979 #endif
15980 }
15981 
15993 void QCustomPlot::freeOpenGl()
15994 {
15995 #ifdef QCP_OPENGL_FBO
15996  mGlPaintDevice.clear();
15997  mGlContext.clear();
15998  mGlSurface.clear();
15999 #endif
16000 }
16001 
16007 void QCustomPlot::axisRemoved(QCPAxis *axis)
16008 {
16009  if (xAxis == axis)
16010  xAxis = nullptr;
16011  if (xAxis2 == axis)
16012  xAxis2 = nullptr;
16013  if (yAxis == axis)
16014  yAxis = nullptr;
16015  if (yAxis2 == axis)
16016  yAxis2 = nullptr;
16017 
16018  // Note: No need to take care of range drag axes and range zoom axes, because they are stored in smart pointers
16019 }
16020 
16026 void QCustomPlot::legendRemoved(QCPLegend *legend)
16027 {
16028  if (this->legend == legend)
16029  this->legend = nullptr;
16030 }
16031 
16049 void QCustomPlot::processRectSelection(QRect rect, QMouseEvent *event)
16050 {
16051  typedef QPair<QCPAbstractPlottable*, QCPDataSelection> SelectionCandidate;
16052  typedef QMultiMap<int, SelectionCandidate> SelectionCandidates; // map key is number of selected data points, so we have selections sorted by size
16053 
16054  bool selectionStateChanged = false;
16055 
16056  if (mInteractions.testFlag(QCP::iSelectPlottables))
16057  {
16058  SelectionCandidates potentialSelections;
16059  QRectF rectF(rect.normalized());
16060  if (QCPAxisRect *affectedAxisRect = axisRectAt(rectF.topLeft()))
16061  {
16062  // determine plottables that were hit by the rect and thus are candidates for selection:
16063  foreach (QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable, affectedAxisRect->plottables())
16064  {
16065  if (QCPPlottableInterface1D *plottableInterface = plottable->interface1D())
16066  {
16067  QCPDataSelection dataSel = plottableInterface->selectTestRect(rectF, true);
16068  if (!dataSel.isEmpty())
16069  potentialSelections.insert(dataSel.dataPointCount(), SelectionCandidate(plottable, dataSel));
16070  }
16071  }
16072 
16073  if (!mInteractions.testFlag(QCP::iMultiSelect))
16074  {
16075  // only leave plottable with most selected points in map, since we will only select a single plottable:
16076  if (!potentialSelections.isEmpty())
16077  {
16078  SelectionCandidates::iterator it = potentialSelections.begin();
16079  while (it != std::prev(potentialSelections.end())) // erase all except last element
16080  it = potentialSelections.erase(it);
16081  }
16082  }
16083 
16084  bool additive = event->modifiers().testFlag(mMultiSelectModifier);
16085  // deselect all other layerables if not additive selection:
16086  if (!additive)
16087  {
16088  // emit deselection except to those plottables who will be selected afterwards:
16089  foreach (QCPLayer *layer, mLayers)
16090  {
16091  foreach (QCPLayerable *layerable, layer->children())
16092  {
16093  if ((potentialSelections.isEmpty() || potentialSelections.constBegin()->first != layerable) && mInteractions.testFlag(layerable->selectionCategory()))
16094  {
16095  bool selChanged = false;
16096  layerable->deselectEvent(&selChanged);
16097  selectionStateChanged |= selChanged;
16098  }
16099  }
16100  }
16101  }
16102 
16103  // go through selections in reverse (largest selection first) and emit select events:
16104  SelectionCandidates::const_iterator it = potentialSelections.constEnd();
16105  while (it != potentialSelections.constBegin())
16106  {
16107  --it;
16108  if (mInteractions.testFlag(it.value().first->selectionCategory()))
16109  {
16110  bool selChanged = false;
16111  it.value().first->selectEvent(event, additive, QVariant::fromValue(it.value().second), &selChanged);
16112  selectionStateChanged |= selChanged;
16113  }
16114  }
16115  }
16116  }
16117 
16118  if (selectionStateChanged)
16119  {
16120  emit selectionChangedByUser();
16121  replot(rpQueuedReplot);
16122  } else if (mSelectionRect)
16123  mSelectionRect->layer()->replot();
16124 }
16125 
16137 void QCustomPlot::processRectZoom(QRect rect, QMouseEvent *event)
16138 {
16139  Q_UNUSED(event)
16140  if (QCPAxisRect *axisRect = axisRectAt(rect.topLeft()))
16141  {
16142  QList<QCPAxis*> affectedAxes = QList<QCPAxis*>() << axisRect->rangeZoomAxes(Qt::Horizontal) << axisRect->rangeZoomAxes(Qt::Vertical);
16143  affectedAxes.removeAll(static_cast<QCPAxis*>(nullptr));
16144  axisRect->zoom(QRectF(rect), affectedAxes);
16145  }
16146  replot(rpQueuedReplot); // always replot to make selection rect disappear
16147 }
16148 
16166 void QCustomPlot::processPointSelection(QMouseEvent *event)
16167 {
16168  QVariant details;
16169  QCPLayerable *clickedLayerable = layerableAt(event->pos(), true, &details);
16170  bool selectionStateChanged = false;
16171  bool additive = mInteractions.testFlag(QCP::iMultiSelect) && event->modifiers().testFlag(mMultiSelectModifier);
16172  // deselect all other layerables if not additive selection:
16173  if (!additive)
16174  {
16175  foreach (QCPLayer *layer, mLayers)
16176  {
16177  foreach (QCPLayerable *layerable, layer->children())
16178  {
16179  if (layerable != clickedLayerable && mInteractions.testFlag(layerable->selectionCategory()))
16180  {
16181  bool selChanged = false;
16182  layerable->deselectEvent(&selChanged);
16183  selectionStateChanged |= selChanged;
16184  }
16185  }
16186  }
16187  }
16188  if (clickedLayerable && mInteractions.testFlag(clickedLayerable->selectionCategory()))
16189  {
16190  // a layerable was actually clicked, call its selectEvent:
16191  bool selChanged = false;
16192  clickedLayerable->selectEvent(event, additive, details, &selChanged);
16193  selectionStateChanged |= selChanged;
16194  }
16195  if (selectionStateChanged)
16196  {
16197  emit selectionChangedByUser();
16198  replot(rpQueuedReplot);
16199  }
16200 }
16201 
16213 bool QCustomPlot::registerPlottable(QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable)
16214 {
16215  if (mPlottables.contains(plottable))
16216  {
16217  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "plottable already added to this QCustomPlot:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(plottable);
16218  return false;
16219  }
16220  if (plottable->parentPlot() != this)
16221  {
16222  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "plottable not created with this QCustomPlot as parent:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(plottable);
16223  return false;
16224  }
16225 
16226  mPlottables.append(plottable);
16227  // possibly add plottable to legend:
16228  if (mAutoAddPlottableToLegend)
16229  plottable->addToLegend();
16230  if (!plottable->layer()) // usually the layer is already set in the constructor of the plottable (via QCPLayerable constructor)
16231  plottable->setLayer(currentLayer());
16232  return true;
16233 }
16234 
16244 bool QCustomPlot::registerGraph(QCPGraph *graph)
16245 {
16246  if (!graph)
16247  {
16248  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "passed graph is zero";
16249  return false;
16250  }
16251  if (mGraphs.contains(graph))
16252  {
16253  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "graph already registered with this QCustomPlot";
16254  return false;
16255  }
16256 
16257  mGraphs.append(graph);
16258  return true;
16259 }
16260 
16261 
16271 bool QCustomPlot::registerItem(QCPAbstractItem *item)
16272 {
16273  if (mItems.contains(item))
16274  {
16275  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "item already added to this QCustomPlot:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(item);
16276  return false;
16277  }
16278  if (item->parentPlot() != this)
16279  {
16280  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "item not created with this QCustomPlot as parent:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(item);
16281  return false;
16282  }
16283 
16284  mItems.append(item);
16285  if (!item->layer()) // usually the layer is already set in the constructor of the item (via QCPLayerable constructor)
16286  item->setLayer(currentLayer());
16287  return true;
16288 }
16289 
16296 void QCustomPlot::updateLayerIndices() const
16297 {
16298  for (int i=0; i<mLayers.size(); ++i)
16299  mLayers.at(i)->mIndex = i;
16300 }
16301 
16317 QCPLayerable *QCustomPlot::layerableAt(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *selectionDetails) const
16318 {
16319  QList<QVariant> details;
16320  QList<QCPLayerable*> candidates = layerableListAt(pos, onlySelectable, selectionDetails ? &details : nullptr);
16321  if (selectionDetails && !details.isEmpty())
16322  *selectionDetails = details.first();
16323  if (!candidates.isEmpty())
16324  return candidates.first();
16325  else
16326  return nullptr;
16327 }
16328 
16348 QList<QCPLayerable*> QCustomPlot::layerableListAt(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QList<QVariant> *selectionDetails) const
16349 {
16350  QList<QCPLayerable*> result;
16351  for (int layerIndex=mLayers.size()-1; layerIndex>=0; --layerIndex)
16352  {
16353  const QList<QCPLayerable*> layerables = mLayers.at(layerIndex)->children();
16354  for (int i=layerables.size()-1; i>=0; --i)
16355  {
16356  if (!layerables.at(i)->realVisibility())
16357  continue;
16358  QVariant details;
16359  double dist = layerables.at(i)->selectTest(pos, onlySelectable, selectionDetails ? &details : nullptr);
16360  if (dist >= 0 && dist < selectionTolerance())
16361  {
16362  result.append(layerables.at(i));
16363  if (selectionDetails)
16364  selectionDetails->append(details);
16365  }
16366  }
16367  }
16368  return result;
16369 }
16370 
16389 bool QCustomPlot::saveRastered(const QString &fileName, int width, int height, double scale, const char *format, int quality, int resolution, QCP::ResolutionUnit resolutionUnit)
16390 {
16391  QImage buffer = toPixmap(width, height, scale).toImage();
16392 
16393  int dotsPerMeter = 0;
16394  switch (resolutionUnit)
16395  {
16396  case QCP::ruDotsPerMeter: dotsPerMeter = resolution; break;
16397  case QCP::ruDotsPerCentimeter: dotsPerMeter = resolution*100; break;
16398  case QCP::ruDotsPerInch: dotsPerMeter = int(resolution/0.0254); break;
16399  }
16400  buffer.setDotsPerMeterX(dotsPerMeter); // this is saved together with some image formats, e.g. PNG, and is relevant when opening image in other tools
16401  buffer.setDotsPerMeterY(dotsPerMeter); // this is saved together with some image formats, e.g. PNG, and is relevant when opening image in other tools
16402  if (!buffer.isNull())
16403  return buffer.save(fileName, format, quality);
16404  else
16405  return false;
16406 }
16407 
16416 QPixmap QCustomPlot::toPixmap(int width, int height, double scale)
16417 {
16418  // this method is somewhat similar to toPainter. Change something here, and a change in toPainter might be necessary, too.
16419  int newWidth, newHeight;
16420  if (width == 0 || height == 0)
16421  {
16422  newWidth = this->width();
16423  newHeight = this->height();
16424  } else
16425  {
16426  newWidth = width;
16427  newHeight = height;
16428  }
16429  int scaledWidth = qRound(scale*newWidth);
16430  int scaledHeight = qRound(scale*newHeight);
16431 
16432  QPixmap result(scaledWidth, scaledHeight);
16433  result.fill(mBackgroundBrush.style() == Qt::SolidPattern ? mBackgroundBrush.color() : Qt::transparent); // if using non-solid pattern, make transparent now and draw brush pattern later
16434  QCPPainter painter;
16435  painter.begin(&result);
16436  if (painter.isActive())
16437  {
16438  QRect oldViewport = viewport();
16439  setViewport(QRect(0, 0, newWidth, newHeight));
16440  painter.setMode(QCPPainter::pmNoCaching);
16441  if (!qFuzzyCompare(scale, 1.0))
16442  {
16443  if (scale > 1.0) // for scale < 1 we always want cosmetic pens where possible, because else lines might disappear for very small scales
16444  painter.setMode(QCPPainter::pmNonCosmetic);
16445  painter.scale(scale, scale);
16446  }
16447  if (mBackgroundBrush.style() != Qt::SolidPattern && mBackgroundBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush) // solid fills were done a few lines above with QPixmap::fill
16448  painter.fillRect(mViewport, mBackgroundBrush);
16449  draw(&painter);
16450  setViewport(oldViewport);
16451  painter.end();
16452  } else // might happen if pixmap has width or height zero
16453  {
16454  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Couldn't activate painter on pixmap";
16455  return QPixmap();
16456  }
16457  return result;
16458 }
16459 
16472 void QCustomPlot::toPainter(QCPPainter *painter, int width, int height)
16473 {
16474  // this method is somewhat similar to toPixmap. Change something here, and a change in toPixmap might be necessary, too.
16475  int newWidth, newHeight;
16476  if (width == 0 || height == 0)
16477  {
16478  newWidth = this->width();
16479  newHeight = this->height();
16480  } else
16481  {
16482  newWidth = width;
16483  newHeight = height;
16484  }
16485 
16486  if (painter->isActive())
16487  {
16488  QRect oldViewport = viewport();
16489  setViewport(QRect(0, 0, newWidth, newHeight));
16490  painter->setMode(QCPPainter::pmNoCaching);
16491  if (mBackgroundBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush) // unlike in toPixmap, we can't do QPixmap::fill for Qt::SolidPattern brush style, so we also draw solid fills with fillRect here
16492  painter->fillRect(mViewport, mBackgroundBrush);
16493  draw(painter);
16494  setViewport(oldViewport);
16495  } else
16496  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Passed painter is not active";
16497 }
16498 /* end of 'src/core.cpp' */
16499

16502 /* modified 2022-11-06T12:45:56, size 25408 */
16503 
16504 
16508 
16545 QCPColorGradient::QCPColorGradient() :
16546  mLevelCount(350),
16547  mColorInterpolation(ciRGB),
16548  mNanHandling(nhNone),
16549  mNanColor(Qt::black),
16550  mPeriodic(false),
16551  mColorBufferInvalidated(true)
16552 {
16553  mColorBuffer.fill(qRgb(0, 0, 0), mLevelCount);
16554 }
16555 
16562 QCPColorGradient::QCPColorGradient(GradientPreset preset) :
16563  mLevelCount(350),
16564  mColorInterpolation(ciRGB),
16565  mNanHandling(nhNone),
16566  mNanColor(Qt::black),
16567  mPeriodic(false),
16568  mColorBufferInvalidated(true)
16569 {
16570  mColorBuffer.fill(qRgb(0, 0, 0), mLevelCount);
16571  loadPreset(preset);
16572 }

16574 /* undocumented operator */
16575 bool QCPColorGradient::operator==(const QCPColorGradient &other) const
16576 {
16577  return ((other.mLevelCount == this->mLevelCount) &&
16578  (other.mColorInterpolation == this->mColorInterpolation) &&
16579  (other.mNanHandling == this ->mNanHandling) &&
16580  (other.mNanColor == this->mNanColor) &&
16581  (other.mPeriodic == this->mPeriodic) &&
16582  (other.mColorStops == this->mColorStops));
16583 }
16584 
16591 void QCPColorGradient::setLevelCount(int n)
16592 {
16593  if (n < 2)
16594  {
16595  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "n must be greater or equal 2 but was" << n;
16596  n = 2;
16597  }
16598  if (n != mLevelCount)
16599  {
16600  mLevelCount = n;
16601  mColorBufferInvalidated = true;
16602  }
16603 }
16604

16619  mColorBufferInvalidated = true;
16620 }

16630  mColorStops.insert(position, color);
16631  mColorBufferInvalidated = true;
16632 }

16641 void QCPColorGradient::setColorInterpolation(QCPColorGradient::ColorInterpolation interpolation)
16642 {
16643  if (interpolation != mColorInterpolation)
16644  {
16645  mColorInterpolation = interpolation;
16646  mColorBufferInvalidated = true;
16647  }
16648 }

16686 void QCPColorGradient::setPeriodic(bool enabled)
16687 {
16688  mPeriodic = enabled;
16689 }
16690 
16709 void QCPColorGradient::colorize(const double *data, const QCPRange &range, QRgb *scanLine, int n, int dataIndexFactor, bool logarithmic)
16710 {
16711  // If you change something here, make sure to also adapt color() and the other colorize() overload
16712  if (!data)
16713  {
16714  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "null pointer given as data";
16715  return;
16716  }
16717  if (!scanLine)
16718  {
16719  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "null pointer given as scanLine";
16720  return;
16721  }
16722  if (mColorBufferInvalidated)
16723  updateColorBuffer();
16724 
16725  const bool skipNanCheck = mNanHandling == nhNone;
16726  const double posToIndexFactor = !logarithmic ? (mLevelCount-1)/range.size() : (mLevelCount-1)/qLn(range.upper/range.lower);
16727  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
16728  {
16729  const double value = data[dataIndexFactor*i];
16730  if (skipNanCheck || !std::isnan(value))
16731  {
16732  qint64 index = qint64((!logarithmic ? value-range.lower : qLn(value/range.lower)) * posToIndexFactor);
16733  if (!mPeriodic)
16734  {
16735  index = qBound(qint64(0), index, qint64(mLevelCount-1));
16736  } else
16737  {
16738  index %= mLevelCount;
16739  if (index < 0)
16740  index += mLevelCount;
16741  }
16742  scanLine[i] = mColorBuffer.at(index);
16743  } else
16744  {
16745  switch(mNanHandling)
16746  {
16747  case nhLowestColor: scanLine[i] = mColorBuffer.first(); break;
16748  case nhHighestColor: scanLine[i] = mColorBuffer.last(); break;
16749  case nhTransparent: scanLine[i] = qRgba(0, 0, 0, 0); break;
16750  case nhNanColor: scanLine[i] = mNanColor.rgba(); break;
16751  case nhNone: break; // shouldn't happen
16752  }
16753  }
16754  }
16755 }
16756 
16765 void QCPColorGradient::colorize(const double *data, const unsigned char *alpha, const QCPRange &range, QRgb *scanLine, int n, int dataIndexFactor, bool logarithmic)
16766 {
16767  // If you change something here, make sure to also adapt color() and the other colorize() overload
16768  if (!data)
16769  {
16770  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "null pointer given as data";
16771  return;
16772  }
16773  if (!alpha)
16774  {
16775  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "null pointer given as alpha";
16776  return;
16777  }
16778  if (!scanLine)
16779  {
16780  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "null pointer given as scanLine";
16781  return;
16782  }
16783  if (mColorBufferInvalidated)
16784  updateColorBuffer();
16785 
16786  const bool skipNanCheck = mNanHandling == nhNone;
16787  const double posToIndexFactor = !logarithmic ? (mLevelCount-1)/range.size() : (mLevelCount-1)/qLn(range.upper/range.lower);
16788  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
16789  {
16790  const double value = data[dataIndexFactor*i];
16791  if (skipNanCheck || !std::isnan(value))
16792  {
16793  qint64 index = qint64((!logarithmic ? value-range.lower : qLn(value/range.lower)) * posToIndexFactor);
16794  if (!mPeriodic)
16795  {
16796  index = qBound(qint64(0), index, qint64(mLevelCount-1));
16797  } else
16798  {
16799  index %= mLevelCount;
16800  if (index < 0)
16801  index += mLevelCount;
16802  }
16803  if (alpha[dataIndexFactor*i] == 255)
16804  {
16805  scanLine[i] = mColorBuffer.at(index);
16806  } else
16807  {
16808  const QRgb rgb = mColorBuffer.at(index);
16809  const float alphaF = alpha[dataIndexFactor*i]/255.0f;
16810  scanLine[i] = qRgba(int(qRed(rgb)*alphaF), int(qGreen(rgb)*alphaF), int(qBlue(rgb)*alphaF), int(qAlpha(rgb)*alphaF)); // also multiply r,g,b with alpha, to conform to Format_ARGB32_Premultiplied
16811  }
16812  } else
16813  {
16814  switch(mNanHandling)
16815  {
16816  case nhLowestColor: scanLine[i] = mColorBuffer.first(); break;
16817  case nhHighestColor: scanLine[i] = mColorBuffer.last(); break;
16818  case nhTransparent: scanLine[i] = qRgba(0, 0, 0, 0); break;
16819  case nhNanColor: scanLine[i] = mNanColor.rgba(); break;
16820  case nhNone: break; // shouldn't happen
16821  }
16822  }
16823  }
16824 }
16825 
16838 QRgb QCPColorGradient::color(double position, const QCPRange &range, bool logarithmic)
16839 {
16840  // If you change something here, make sure to also adapt ::colorize()
16841  if (mColorBufferInvalidated)
16842  updateColorBuffer();
16843 
16844  const bool skipNanCheck = mNanHandling == nhNone;
16845  if (!skipNanCheck && std::isnan(position))
16846  {
16847  switch(mNanHandling)
16848  {
16849  case nhLowestColor: return mColorBuffer.first();
16850  case nhHighestColor: return mColorBuffer.last();
16851  case nhTransparent: return qRgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
16852  case nhNanColor: return mNanColor.rgba();
16853  case nhNone: return qRgba(0, 0, 0, 0); // shouldn't happen
16854  }
16855  }
16856 
16857  const double posToIndexFactor = !logarithmic ? (mLevelCount-1)/range.size() : (mLevelCount-1)/qLn(range.upper/range.lower);
16858  int index = int((!logarithmic ? position-range.lower : qLn(position/range.lower)) * posToIndexFactor);
16859  if (!mPeriodic)
16860  {
16861  index = qBound(0, index, mLevelCount-1);
16862  } else
16863  {
16864  index %= mLevelCount;
16865  if (index < 0)
16866  index += mLevelCount;
16867  }
16868  return mColorBuffer.at(index);
16869 }
16870 
16878 void QCPColorGradient::loadPreset(GradientPreset preset)
16879 {
16880  clearColorStops();
16881  switch (preset)
16882  {
16883  case gpGrayscale:
16884  setColorInterpolation(ciRGB);
16885  setColorStopAt(0, Qt::black);
16886  setColorStopAt(1, Qt::white);
16887  break;
16888  case gpHot:
16889  setColorInterpolation(ciRGB);
16890  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(50, 0, 0));
16891  setColorStopAt(0.2, QColor(180, 10, 0));
16892  setColorStopAt(0.4, QColor(245, 50, 0));
16893  setColorStopAt(0.6, QColor(255, 150, 10));
16894  setColorStopAt(0.8, QColor(255, 255, 50));
16895  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(255, 255, 255));
16896  break;
16897  case gpCold:
16898  setColorInterpolation(ciRGB);
16899  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(0, 0, 50));
16900  setColorStopAt(0.2, QColor(0, 10, 180));
16901  setColorStopAt(0.4, QColor(0, 50, 245));
16902  setColorStopAt(0.6, QColor(10, 150, 255));
16903  setColorStopAt(0.8, QColor(50, 255, 255));
16904  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(255, 255, 255));
16905  break;
16906  case gpNight:
16907  setColorInterpolation(ciHSV);
16908  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(10, 20, 30));
16909  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(250, 255, 250));
16910  break;
16911  case gpCandy:
16912  setColorInterpolation(ciHSV);
16913  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(0, 0, 255));
16914  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(255, 250, 250));
16915  break;
16916  case gpGeography:
16917  setColorInterpolation(ciRGB);
16918  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(70, 170, 210));
16919  setColorStopAt(0.20, QColor(90, 160, 180));
16920  setColorStopAt(0.25, QColor(45, 130, 175));
16921  setColorStopAt(0.30, QColor(100, 140, 125));
16922  setColorStopAt(0.5, QColor(100, 140, 100));
16923  setColorStopAt(0.6, QColor(130, 145, 120));
16924  setColorStopAt(0.7, QColor(140, 130, 120));
16925  setColorStopAt(0.9, QColor(180, 190, 190));
16926  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(210, 210, 230));
16927  break;
16928  case gpIon:
16929  setColorInterpolation(ciHSV);
16930  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(50, 10, 10));
16931  setColorStopAt(0.45, QColor(0, 0, 255));
16932  setColorStopAt(0.8, QColor(0, 255, 255));
16933  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(0, 255, 0));
16934  break;
16935  case gpThermal:
16936  setColorInterpolation(ciRGB);
16937  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(0, 0, 50));
16938  setColorStopAt(0.15, QColor(20, 0, 120));
16939  setColorStopAt(0.33, QColor(200, 30, 140));
16940  setColorStopAt(0.6, QColor(255, 100, 0));
16941  setColorStopAt(0.85, QColor(255, 255, 40));
16942  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(255, 255, 255));
16943  break;
16944  case gpPolar:
16945  setColorInterpolation(ciRGB);
16946  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(50, 255, 255));
16947  setColorStopAt(0.18, QColor(10, 70, 255));
16948  setColorStopAt(0.28, QColor(10, 10, 190));
16949  setColorStopAt(0.5, QColor(0, 0, 0));
16950  setColorStopAt(0.72, QColor(190, 10, 10));
16951  setColorStopAt(0.82, QColor(255, 70, 10));
16952  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(255, 255, 50));
16953  break;
16954  case gpSpectrum:
16955  setColorInterpolation(ciHSV);
16956  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(50, 0, 50));
16957  setColorStopAt(0.15, QColor(0, 0, 255));
16958  setColorStopAt(0.35, QColor(0, 255, 255));
16959  setColorStopAt(0.6, QColor(255, 255, 0));
16960  setColorStopAt(0.75, QColor(255, 30, 0));
16961  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(50, 0, 0));
16962  break;
16963  case gpJet:
16964  setColorInterpolation(ciRGB);
16965  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(0, 0, 100));
16966  setColorStopAt(0.15, QColor(0, 50, 255));
16967  setColorStopAt(0.35, QColor(0, 255, 255));
16968  setColorStopAt(0.65, QColor(255, 255, 0));
16969  setColorStopAt(0.85, QColor(255, 30, 0));
16970  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(100, 0, 0));
16971  break;
16972  case gpHues:
16973  setColorInterpolation(ciHSV);
16974  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(255, 0, 0));
16975  setColorStopAt(1.0/3.0, QColor(0, 0, 255));
16976  setColorStopAt(2.0/3.0, QColor(0, 255, 0));
16977  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(255, 0, 0));
16978  break;
16979  }
16980 }
16981 
16987 void QCPColorGradient::clearColorStops()
16988 {
16989  mColorStops.clear();
16990  mColorBufferInvalidated = true;
16991 }
16992 
16999 QCPColorGradient QCPColorGradient::inverted() const
17000 {
17001  QCPColorGradient result(*this);
17002  result.clearColorStops();
17003  for (QMap<double, QColor>::const_iterator it=mColorStops.constBegin(); it!=mColorStops.constEnd(); ++it)
17004  result.setColorStopAt(1.0-it.key(), it.value());
17005  return result;
17006 }
17007 
17013 bool QCPColorGradient::stopsUseAlpha() const
17014 {
17015  for (QMap<double, QColor>::const_iterator it=mColorStops.constBegin(); it!=mColorStops.constEnd(); ++it)
17016  {
17017  if (it.value().alpha() < 255)
17018  return true;
17019  }
17020  return false;
17021 }
17022 
17028 void QCPColorGradient::updateColorBuffer()
17029 {
17030  if (mColorBuffer.size() != mLevelCount)
17031  mColorBuffer.resize(mLevelCount);
17032  if (mColorStops.size() > 1)
17033  {
17034  double indexToPosFactor = 1.0/double(mLevelCount-1);
17035  const bool useAlpha = stopsUseAlpha();
17036  for (int i=0; i<mLevelCount; ++i)
17037  {
17038  double position = i*indexToPosFactor;
17039  QMap<double, QColor>::const_iterator it = const_cast<const QMap<double, QColor>*>(&mColorStops)->lowerBound(position); // force using the const lowerBound method
17040  if (it == mColorStops.constEnd()) // position is on or after last stop, use color of last stop
17041  {
17042  if (useAlpha)
17043  {
17044  const QColor col = std::prev(it).value();
17045  const double alphaPremultiplier = col.alpha()/255.0; // since we use QImage::Format_ARGB32_Premultiplied
17046  mColorBuffer[i] = qRgba(int(col.red()*alphaPremultiplier),
17047  int(col.green()*alphaPremultiplier),
17048  int(col.blue()*alphaPremultiplier),
17049  col.alpha());
17050  } else
17051  mColorBuffer[i] = std::prev(it).value().rgba();
17052  } else if (it == mColorStops.constBegin()) // position is on or before first stop, use color of first stop
17053  {
17054  if (useAlpha)
17055  {
17056  const QColor &col = it.value();
17057  const double alphaPremultiplier = col.alpha()/255.0; // since we use QImage::Format_ARGB32_Premultiplied
17058  mColorBuffer[i] = qRgba(int(col.red()*alphaPremultiplier),
17059  int(col.green()*alphaPremultiplier),
17060  int(col.blue()*alphaPremultiplier),
17061  col.alpha());
17062  } else
17063  mColorBuffer[i] = it.value().rgba();
17064  } else // position is in between stops (or on an intermediate stop), interpolate color
17065  {
17066  QMap<double, QColor>::const_iterator high = it;
17067  QMap<double, QColor>::const_iterator low = std::prev(it);
17068  double t = (position-low.key())/(high.key()-low.key()); // interpolation factor 0..1
17069  switch (mColorInterpolation)
17070  {
17071  case ciRGB:
17072  {
17073  if (useAlpha)
17074  {
17075  const int alpha = int((1-t)*low.value().alpha() + t*high.value().alpha());
17076  const double alphaPremultiplier = alpha/255.0; // since we use QImage::Format_ARGB32_Premultiplied
17077  mColorBuffer[i] = qRgba(int( ((1-t)*low.value().red() + t*high.value().red())*alphaPremultiplier ),
17078  int( ((1-t)*low.value().green() + t*high.value().green())*alphaPremultiplier ),
17079  int( ((1-t)*low.value().blue() + t*high.value().blue())*alphaPremultiplier ),
17080  alpha);
17081  } else
17082  {
17083  mColorBuffer[i] = qRgb(int( ((1-t)*low.value().red() + t*high.value().red()) ),
17084  int( ((1-t)*low.value().green() + t*high.value().green()) ),
17085  int( ((1-t)*low.value().blue() + t*high.value().blue())) );
17086  }
17087  break;
17088  }
17089  case ciHSV:
17090  {
17091  QColor lowHsv = low.value().toHsv();
17092  QColor highHsv = high.value().toHsv();
17093  double hue = 0;
17094  double hueDiff = highHsv.hueF()-lowHsv.hueF();
17095  if (hueDiff > 0.5)
17096  hue = lowHsv.hueF() - t*(1.0-hueDiff);
17097  else if (hueDiff < -0.5)
17098  hue = lowHsv.hueF() + t*(1.0+hueDiff);
17099  else
17100  hue = lowHsv.hueF() + t*hueDiff;
17101  if (hue < 0) hue += 1.0;
17102  else if (hue >= 1.0) hue -= 1.0;
17103  if (useAlpha)
17104  {
17105  const QRgb rgb = QColor::fromHsvF(hue,
17106  (1-t)*lowHsv.saturationF() + t*highHsv.saturationF(),
17107  (1-t)*lowHsv.valueF() + t*highHsv.valueF()).rgb();
17108  const double alpha = (1-t)*lowHsv.alphaF() + t*highHsv.alphaF();
17109  mColorBuffer[i] = qRgba(int(qRed(rgb)*alpha), int(qGreen(rgb)*alpha), int(qBlue(rgb)*alpha), int(255*alpha));
17110  }
17111  else
17112  {
17113  mColorBuffer[i] = QColor::fromHsvF(hue,
17114  (1-t)*lowHsv.saturationF() + t*highHsv.saturationF(),
17115  (1-t)*lowHsv.valueF() + t*highHsv.valueF()).rgb();
17116  }
17117  break;
17118  }
17119  }
17120  }
17121  }
17122  } else if (mColorStops.size() == 1)
17123  {
17124  const QRgb rgb = mColorStops.constBegin().value().rgb();
17125  const double alpha = mColorStops.constBegin().value().alphaF();
17126  mColorBuffer.fill(qRgba(int(qRed(rgb)*alpha), int(qGreen(rgb)*alpha), int(qBlue(rgb)*alpha), int(255*alpha)));
17127  } else // mColorStops is empty, fill color buffer with black
17128  {
17129  mColorBuffer.fill(qRgb(0, 0, 0));
17130  }
17131  mColorBufferInvalidated = false;
17132 }
17133 /* end of 'src/colorgradient.cpp' */
17134 
17135 
17136 /* including file 'src/selectiondecorator-bracket.cpp' */
17137 /* modified 2022-11-06T12:45:56, size 12308 */
17138 
17142 
17162 QCPSelectionDecoratorBracket::QCPSelectionDecoratorBracket() :
17163  mBracketPen(QPen(Qt::black)),
17164  mBracketBrush(Qt::NoBrush),
17165  mBracketWidth(5),
17166  mBracketHeight(50),
17167  mBracketStyle(bsSquareBracket),
17168  mTangentToData(false),
17169  mTangentAverage(2)
17170 {
17171 
17172 }
17173 
17174 QCPSelectionDecoratorBracket::~QCPSelectionDecoratorBracket()
17175 {
17176 }
17177 
17182 void QCPSelectionDecoratorBracket::setBracketPen(const QPen &pen)
17183 {
17184  mBracketPen = pen;
17185 }
17186 
17191 void QCPSelectionDecoratorBracket::setBracketBrush(const QBrush &brush)
17192 {
17193  mBracketBrush = brush;
17194 }
17195 
17201 void QCPSelectionDecoratorBracket::setBracketWidth(int width)
17202 {
17203  mBracketWidth = width;
17204 }
17205 
17211 void QCPSelectionDecoratorBracket::setBracketHeight(int height)
17212 {
17213  mBracketHeight = height;
17214 }
17215 
17221 void QCPSelectionDecoratorBracket::setBracketStyle(QCPSelectionDecoratorBracket::BracketStyle style)
17222 {
17223  mBracketStyle = style;
17224 }
17225 
17233 void QCPSelectionDecoratorBracket::setTangentToData(bool enabled)
17234 {
17235  mTangentToData = enabled;
17236 }
17237 
17246 void QCPSelectionDecoratorBracket::setTangentAverage(int pointCount)
17247 {
17248  mTangentAverage = pointCount;
17249  if (mTangentAverage < 1)
17250  mTangentAverage = 1;
17251 }
17252 
17266 void QCPSelectionDecoratorBracket::drawBracket(QCPPainter *painter, int direction) const
17267 {
17268  switch (mBracketStyle)
17269  {
17270  case bsSquareBracket:
17271  {
17272  painter->drawLine(QLineF(mBracketWidth*direction, -mBracketHeight*0.5, 0, -mBracketHeight*0.5));
17273  painter->drawLine(QLineF(mBracketWidth*direction, mBracketHeight*0.5, 0, mBracketHeight*0.5));
17274  painter->drawLine(QLineF(0, -mBracketHeight*0.5, 0, mBracketHeight*0.5));
17275  break;
17276  }
17277  case bsHalfEllipse:
17278  {
17279  painter->drawArc(QRectF(-mBracketWidth*0.5, -mBracketHeight*0.5, mBracketWidth, mBracketHeight), -90*16, -180*16*direction);
17280  break;
17281  }
17282  case bsEllipse:
17283  {
17284  painter->drawEllipse(QRectF(-mBracketWidth*0.5, -mBracketHeight*0.5, mBracketWidth, mBracketHeight));
17285  break;
17286  }
17287  case bsPlus:
17288  {
17289  painter->drawLine(QLineF(0, -mBracketHeight*0.5, 0, mBracketHeight*0.5));
17290  painter->drawLine(QLineF(-mBracketWidth*0.5, 0, mBracketWidth*0.5, 0));
17291  break;
17292  }
17293  default:
17294  {
17295  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "unknown/custom bracket style can't be handeld by default implementation:" << static_cast<int>(mBracketStyle);
17296  break;
17297  }
17298  }
17299 }
17300 
17309 void QCPSelectionDecoratorBracket::drawDecoration(QCPPainter *painter, QCPDataSelection selection)
17310 {
17311  if (!mPlottable || selection.isEmpty()) return;
17312 
17313  if (QCPPlottableInterface1D *interface1d = mPlottable->interface1D())
17314  {
17315  foreach (const QCPDataRange &dataRange, selection.dataRanges())
17316  {
17317  // determine position and (if tangent mode is enabled) angle of brackets:
17318  int openBracketDir = (mPlottable->keyAxis() && !mPlottable->keyAxis()->rangeReversed()) ? 1 : -1;
17319  int closeBracketDir = -openBracketDir;
17320  QPointF openBracketPos = getPixelCoordinates(interface1d, dataRange.begin());
17321  QPointF closeBracketPos = getPixelCoordinates(interface1d, dataRange.end()-1);
17322  double openBracketAngle = 0;
17323  double closeBracketAngle = 0;
17324  if (mTangentToData)
17325  {
17326  openBracketAngle = getTangentAngle(interface1d, dataRange.begin(), openBracketDir);
17327  closeBracketAngle = getTangentAngle(interface1d, dataRange.end()-1, closeBracketDir);
17328  }
17329  // draw opening bracket:
17330  QTransform oldTransform = painter->transform();
17331  painter->setPen(mBracketPen);
17332  painter->setBrush(mBracketBrush);
17333  painter->translate(openBracketPos);
17334  painter->rotate(openBracketAngle/M_PI*180.0);
17335  drawBracket(painter, openBracketDir);
17336  painter->setTransform(oldTransform);
17337  // draw closing bracket:
17338  painter->setPen(mBracketPen);
17339  painter->setBrush(mBracketBrush);
17340  painter->translate(closeBracketPos);
17341  painter->rotate(closeBracketAngle/M_PI*180.0);
17342  drawBracket(painter, closeBracketDir);
17343  painter->setTransform(oldTransform);
17344  }
17345  }
17346 }
17347 
17361 double QCPSelectionDecoratorBracket::getTangentAngle(const QCPPlottableInterface1D *interface1d, int dataIndex, int direction) const
17362 {
17363  if (!interface1d || dataIndex < 0 || dataIndex >= interface1d->dataCount())
17364  return 0;
17365  direction = direction < 0 ? -1 : 1; // enforce direction is either -1 or 1
17366 
17367  // how many steps we can actually go from index in the given direction without exceeding data bounds:
17368  int averageCount;
17369  if (direction < 0)
17370  averageCount = qMin(mTangentAverage, dataIndex);
17371  else
17372  averageCount = qMin(mTangentAverage, interface1d->dataCount()-1-dataIndex);
17373  qDebug() << averageCount;
17374  // calculate point average of averageCount points:
17375  QVector<QPointF> points(averageCount);
17376  QPointF pointsAverage;
17377  int currentIndex = dataIndex;
17378  for (int i=0; i<averageCount; ++i)
17379  {
17380  points[i] = getPixelCoordinates(interface1d, currentIndex);
17381  pointsAverage += points[i];
17382  currentIndex += direction;
17383  }
17384  pointsAverage /= double(averageCount);
17385 
17386  // calculate slope of linear regression through points:
17387  double numSum = 0;
17388  double denomSum = 0;
17389  for (int i=0; i<averageCount; ++i)
17390  {
17391  const double dx = points.at(i).x()-pointsAverage.x();
17392  const double dy = points.at(i).y()-pointsAverage.y();
17393  numSum += dx*dy;
17394  denomSum += dx*dx;
17395  }
17396  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(denomSum) && !qFuzzyIsNull(numSum))
17397  {
17398  return qAtan2(numSum, denomSum);
17399  } else // undetermined angle, probably mTangentAverage == 1, so using only one data point
17400  return 0;
17401 }
17402 
17408 QPointF QCPSelectionDecoratorBracket::getPixelCoordinates(const QCPPlottableInterface1D *interface1d, int dataIndex) const
17409 {
17410  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mPlottable->keyAxis();
17411  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mPlottable->valueAxis();
17412  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return {0, 0}; }
17413 
17414  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
17415  return {keyAxis->coordToPixel(interface1d->dataMainKey(dataIndex)), valueAxis->coordToPixel(interface1d->dataMainValue(dataIndex))};
17416  else
17417  return {valueAxis->coordToPixel(interface1d->dataMainValue(dataIndex)), keyAxis->coordToPixel(interface1d->dataMainKey(dataIndex))};
17418 }
17419 /* end of 'src/selectiondecorator-bracket.cpp' */
17420 
17421 
17422 /* including file 'src/layoutelements/layoutelement-axisrect.cpp' */
17423 /* modified 2022-11-06T12:45:56, size 47193 */
17424 
17425 
17429 
17467 /* start documentation of inline functions */
17468 
17549 /* end documentation of inline functions */
17550 
17555 QCPAxisRect::QCPAxisRect(QCustomPlot *parentPlot, bool setupDefaultAxes) :
17556  QCPLayoutElement(parentPlot),
17557  mBackgroundBrush(Qt::NoBrush),
17558  mBackgroundScaled(true),
17559  mBackgroundScaledMode(Qt::KeepAspectRatioByExpanding),
17560  mInsetLayout(new QCPLayoutInset),
17561  mRangeDrag(Qt::Horizontal|Qt::Vertical),
17562  mRangeZoom(Qt::Horizontal|Qt::Vertical),
17563  mRangeZoomFactorHorz(0.85),
17564  mRangeZoomFactorVert(0.85),
17565  mDragging(false)
17566 {
17567  mInsetLayout->initializeParentPlot(mParentPlot);
17568  mInsetLayout->setParentLayerable(this);
17569  mInsetLayout->setParent(this);
17570 
17571  setMinimumSize(50, 50);
17572  setMinimumMargins(QMargins(15, 15, 15, 15));
17573  mAxes.insert(QCPAxis::atLeft, QList<QCPAxis*>());
17574  mAxes.insert(QCPAxis::atRight, QList<QCPAxis*>());
17575  mAxes.insert(QCPAxis::atTop, QList<QCPAxis*>());
17576  mAxes.insert(QCPAxis::atBottom, QList<QCPAxis*>());
17577 
17578  if (setupDefaultAxes)
17579  {
17580  QCPAxis *xAxis = addAxis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
17581  QCPAxis *yAxis = addAxis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
17582  QCPAxis *xAxis2 = addAxis(QCPAxis::atTop);
17583  QCPAxis *yAxis2 = addAxis(QCPAxis::atRight);
17584  setRangeDragAxes(xAxis, yAxis);
17585  setRangeZoomAxes(xAxis, yAxis);
17586  xAxis2->setVisible(false);
17587  yAxis2->setVisible(false);
17588  xAxis->grid()->setVisible(true);
17589  yAxis->grid()->setVisible(true);
17590  xAxis2->grid()->setVisible(false);
17591  yAxis2->grid()->setVisible(false);
17592  xAxis2->grid()->setZeroLinePen(Qt::NoPen);
17593  yAxis2->grid()->setZeroLinePen(Qt::NoPen);
17594  xAxis2->grid()->setVisible(false);
17595  yAxis2->grid()->setVisible(false);
17596  }
17597 }
17598 
17599 QCPAxisRect::~QCPAxisRect()
17600 {
17601  delete mInsetLayout;
17602  mInsetLayout = nullptr;
17603 
17604  foreach (QCPAxis *axis, axes())
17605  removeAxis(axis);
17606 }
17607 
17613 int QCPAxisRect::axisCount(QCPAxis::AxisType type) const
17614 {
17615  return mAxes.value(type).size();
17616 }
17617 
17623 QCPAxis *QCPAxisRect::axis(QCPAxis::AxisType type, int index) const
17624 {
17625  QList<QCPAxis*> ax(mAxes.value(type));
17626  if (index >= 0 && index < ax.size())
17627  {
17628  return ax.at(index);
17629  } else
17630  {
17631  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Axis index out of bounds:" << index;
17632  return nullptr;
17633  }
17634 }
17635 
17644 QList<QCPAxis*> QCPAxisRect::axes(QCPAxis::AxisTypes types) const
17645 {
17646  QList<QCPAxis*> result;
17647  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atLeft))
17648  result << mAxes.value(QCPAxis::atLeft);
17649  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atRight))
17650  result << mAxes.value(QCPAxis::atRight);
17651  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atTop))
17652  result << mAxes.value(QCPAxis::atTop);
17653  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atBottom))
17654  result << mAxes.value(QCPAxis::atBottom);
17655  return result;
17656 }
17657 
17662 QList<QCPAxis*> QCPAxisRect::axes() const
17663 {
17664  QList<QCPAxis*> result;
17665  QHashIterator<QCPAxis::AxisType, QList<QCPAxis*> > it(mAxes);
17666  while (it.hasNext())
17667  {
17668  it.next();
17669  result << it.value();
17670  }
17671  return result;
17672 }
17673 
17694 QCPAxis *QCPAxisRect::addAxis(QCPAxis::AxisType type, QCPAxis *axis)
17695 {
17696  QCPAxis *newAxis = axis;
17697  if (!newAxis)
17698  {
17699  newAxis = new QCPAxis(this, type);
17700  } else // user provided existing axis instance, do some sanity checks
17701  {
17702  if (newAxis->axisType() != type)
17703  {
17704  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "passed axis has different axis type than specified in type parameter";
17705  return nullptr;
17706  }
17707  if (newAxis->axisRect() != this)
17708  {
17709  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "passed axis doesn't have this axis rect as parent axis rect";
17710  return nullptr;
17711  }
17712  if (axes().contains(newAxis))
17713  {
17714  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "passed axis is already owned by this axis rect";
17715  return nullptr;
17716  }
17717  }
17718  if (!mAxes[type].isEmpty()) // multiple axes on one side, add half-bar axis ending to additional axes with offset
17719  {
17720  bool invert = (type == QCPAxis::atRight) || (type == QCPAxis::atBottom);
17721  newAxis->setLowerEnding(QCPLineEnding(QCPLineEnding::esHalfBar, 6, 10, !invert));
17722  newAxis->setUpperEnding(QCPLineEnding(QCPLineEnding::esHalfBar, 6, 10, invert));
17723  }
17724  mAxes[type].append(newAxis);
17725 
17726  // reset convenience axis pointers on parent QCustomPlot if they are unset:
17727  if (mParentPlot && mParentPlot->axisRectCount() > 0 && mParentPlot->axisRect(0) == this)
17728  {
17729  switch (type)
17730  {
17731  case QCPAxis::atBottom: { if (!mParentPlot->xAxis) mParentPlot->xAxis = newAxis; break; }
17732  case QCPAxis::atLeft: { if (!mParentPlot->yAxis) mParentPlot->yAxis = newAxis; break; }
17733  case QCPAxis::atTop: { if (!mParentPlot->xAxis2) mParentPlot->xAxis2 = newAxis; break; }
17734  case QCPAxis::atRight: { if (!mParentPlot->yAxis2) mParentPlot->yAxis2 = newAxis; break; }
17735  }
17736  }
17737 
17738  return newAxis;
17739 }
17740 
17749 QList<QCPAxis*> QCPAxisRect::addAxes(QCPAxis::AxisTypes types)
17750 {
17751  QList<QCPAxis*> result;
17752  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atLeft))
17753  result << addAxis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
17754  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atRight))
17755  result << addAxis(QCPAxis::atRight);
17756  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atTop))
17757  result << addAxis(QCPAxis::atTop);
17758  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atBottom))
17759  result << addAxis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
17760  return result;
17761 }
17762 
17770 bool QCPAxisRect::removeAxis(QCPAxis *axis)
17771 {
17772  // don't access axis->axisType() to provide safety when axis is an invalid pointer, rather go through all axis containers:
17773  QHashIterator<QCPAxis::AxisType, QList<QCPAxis*> > it(mAxes);
17774  while (it.hasNext())
17775  {
17776  it.next();
17777  if (it.value().contains(axis))
17778  {
17779  if (it.value().first() == axis && it.value().size() > 1) // if removing first axis, transfer axis offset to the new first axis (which at this point is the second axis, if it exists)
17780  it.value()[1]->setOffset(axis->offset());
17781  mAxes[it.key()].removeOne(axis);
17782  if (qobject_cast<QCustomPlot*>(parentPlot())) // make sure this isn't called from QObject dtor when QCustomPlot is already destructed (happens when the axis rect is not in any layout and thus QObject-child of QCustomPlot)
17783  parentPlot()->axisRemoved(axis);
17784  delete axis;
17785  return true;
17786  }
17787  }
17788  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Axis isn't in axis rect:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(axis);
17789  return false;
17790 }
17791 
17800 void QCPAxisRect::zoom(const QRectF &pixelRect)
17801 {
17802  zoom(pixelRect, axes());
17803 }
17804 
17813 void QCPAxisRect::zoom(const QRectF &pixelRect, const QList<QCPAxis*> &affectedAxes)
17814 {
17815  foreach (QCPAxis *axis, affectedAxes)
17816  {
17817  if (!axis)
17818  {
17819  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "a passed axis was zero";
17820  continue;
17821  }
17822  QCPRange pixelRange;
17823  if (axis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
17824  pixelRange = QCPRange(pixelRect.left(), pixelRect.right());
17825  else
17826  pixelRange = QCPRange(pixelRect.top(), pixelRect.bottom());
17827  axis->setRange(axis->pixelToCoord(pixelRange.lower), axis->pixelToCoord(pixelRange.upper));
17828  }
17829 }
17830 
17850 void QCPAxisRect::setupFullAxesBox(bool connectRanges)
17851 {
17852  QCPAxis *xAxis, *yAxis, *xAxis2, *yAxis2;
17853  if (axisCount(QCPAxis::atBottom) == 0)
17854  xAxis = addAxis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
17855  else
17856  xAxis = axis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
17857 
17858  if (axisCount(QCPAxis::atLeft) == 0)
17859  yAxis = addAxis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
17860  else
17861  yAxis = axis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
17862 
17863  if (axisCount(QCPAxis::atTop) == 0)
17864  xAxis2 = addAxis(QCPAxis::atTop);
17865  else
17866  xAxis2 = axis(QCPAxis::atTop);
17867 
17868  if (axisCount(QCPAxis::atRight) == 0)
17869  yAxis2 = addAxis(QCPAxis::atRight);
17870  else
17871  yAxis2 = axis(QCPAxis::atRight);
17872 
17873  xAxis->setVisible(true);
17874  yAxis->setVisible(true);
17875  xAxis2->setVisible(true);
17876  yAxis2->setVisible(true);
17877  xAxis2->setTickLabels(false);
17878  yAxis2->setTickLabels(false);
17879 
17880  xAxis2->setRange(xAxis->range());
17881  xAxis2->setRangeReversed(xAxis->rangeReversed());
17882  xAxis2->setScaleType(xAxis->scaleType());
17883  xAxis2->setTicks(xAxis->ticks());
17884  xAxis2->setNumberFormat(xAxis->numberFormat());
17885  xAxis2->setNumberPrecision(xAxis->numberPrecision());
17886  xAxis2->ticker()->setTickCount(xAxis->ticker()->tickCount());
17887  xAxis2->ticker()->setTickOrigin(xAxis->ticker()->tickOrigin());
17888 
17889  yAxis2->setRange(yAxis->range());
17890  yAxis2->setRangeReversed(yAxis->rangeReversed());
17891  yAxis2->setScaleType(yAxis->scaleType());
17892  yAxis2->setTicks(yAxis->ticks());
17893  yAxis2->setNumberFormat(yAxis->numberFormat());
17894  yAxis2->setNumberPrecision(yAxis->numberPrecision());
17895  yAxis2->ticker()->setTickCount(yAxis->ticker()->tickCount());
17896  yAxis2->ticker()->setTickOrigin(yAxis->ticker()->tickOrigin());
17897 
17898  if (connectRanges)
17899  {
17900  connect(xAxis, SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), xAxis2, SLOT(setRange(QCPRange)));
17901  connect(yAxis, SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), yAxis2, SLOT(setRange(QCPRange)));
17902  }
17903 }
17904 
17913 QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> QCPAxisRect::plottables() const
17914 {
17915  // Note: don't append all QCPAxis::plottables() into a list, because we might get duplicate entries
17916  QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> result;
17917  foreach (QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable, mParentPlot->mPlottables)
17918  {
17919  if (plottable->keyAxis()->axisRect() == this || plottable->valueAxis()->axisRect() == this)
17920  result.append(plottable);
17921  }
17922  return result;
17923 }
17924 
17933 QList<QCPGraph*> QCPAxisRect::graphs() const
17934 {
17935  // Note: don't append all QCPAxis::graphs() into a list, because we might get duplicate entries
17936  QList<QCPGraph*> result;
17937  foreach (QCPGraph *graph, mParentPlot->mGraphs)
17938  {
17939  if (graph->keyAxis()->axisRect() == this || graph->valueAxis()->axisRect() == this)
17940  result.append(graph);
17941  }
17942  return result;
17943 }
17944 
17955 QList<QCPAbstractItem *> QCPAxisRect::items() const
17956 {
17957  // Note: don't just append all QCPAxis::items() into a list, because we might get duplicate entries
17958  // and miss those items that have this axis rect as clipAxisRect.
17959  QList<QCPAbstractItem*> result;
17960  foreach (QCPAbstractItem *item, mParentPlot->mItems)
17961  {
17962  if (item->clipAxisRect() == this)
17963  {
17964  result.append(item);
17965  continue;
17966  }
17967  foreach (QCPItemPosition *position, item->positions())
17968  {
17969  if (position->axisRect() == this ||
17970  position->keyAxis()->axisRect() == this ||
17971  position->valueAxis()->axisRect() == this)
17972  {
17973  result.append(item);
17974  break;
17975  }
17976  }
17977  }
17978  return result;
17979 }
17980 
17991 void QCPAxisRect::update(UpdatePhase phase)
17992 {
17993  QCPLayoutElement::update(phase);
17994 
17995  switch (phase)
17996  {
17997  case upPreparation:
17998  {
17999  foreach (QCPAxis *axis, axes())
18000  axis->setupTickVectors();
18001  break;
18002  }
18003  case upLayout:
18004  {
18005  mInsetLayout->setOuterRect(rect());
18006  break;
18007  }
18008  default: break;
18009  }
18010 
18011  // pass update call on to inset layout (doesn't happen automatically, because QCPAxisRect doesn't derive from QCPLayout):
18012  mInsetLayout->update(phase);
18013 }
18014 
18015 /* inherits documentation from base class */
18016 QList<QCPLayoutElement*> QCPAxisRect::elements(bool recursive) const
18017 {
18018  QList<QCPLayoutElement*> result;
18019  if (mInsetLayout)
18020  {
18021  result << mInsetLayout;
18022  if (recursive)
18023  result << mInsetLayout->elements(recursive);
18024  }
18025  return result;
18026 }
18027 
18028 /* inherits documentation from base class */
18029 void QCPAxisRect::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
18030 {
18031  painter->setAntialiasing(false);
18032 }
18033 
18034 /* inherits documentation from base class */
18035 void QCPAxisRect::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
18036 {
18037  drawBackground(painter);
18038 }
18039 
18055 void QCPAxisRect::setBackground(const QPixmap &pm)
18056 {
18057  mBackgroundPixmap = pm;
18058  mScaledBackgroundPixmap = QPixmap();
18059 }
18060 
18074 void QCPAxisRect::setBackground(const QBrush &brush)
18075 {
18076  mBackgroundBrush = brush;
18077 }
18078 
18086 void QCPAxisRect::setBackground(const QPixmap &pm, bool scaled, Qt::AspectRatioMode mode)
18087 {
18088  mBackgroundPixmap = pm;
18089  mScaledBackgroundPixmap = QPixmap();
18090  mBackgroundScaled = scaled;
18091  mBackgroundScaledMode = mode;
18092 }

18107 }
