18115 {
18116  mBackgroundScaledMode = mode;
18117 }
18118 
18125 QCPAxis *QCPAxisRect::rangeDragAxis(Qt::Orientation orientation)
18126 {
18127  if (orientation == Qt::Horizontal)
18128  return mRangeDragHorzAxis.isEmpty() ? nullptr : mRangeDragHorzAxis.first().data();
18129  else
18130  return mRangeDragVertAxis.isEmpty() ? nullptr : mRangeDragVertAxis.first().data();
18131 }
18132 
18139 QCPAxis *QCPAxisRect::rangeZoomAxis(Qt::Orientation orientation)
18140 {
18141  if (orientation == Qt::Horizontal)
18142  return mRangeZoomHorzAxis.isEmpty() ? nullptr : mRangeZoomHorzAxis.first().data();
18143  else
18144  return mRangeZoomVertAxis.isEmpty() ? nullptr : mRangeZoomVertAxis.first().data();
18145 }
18146 
18152 QList<QCPAxis*> QCPAxisRect::rangeDragAxes(Qt::Orientation orientation)
18153 {
18154  QList<QCPAxis*> result;
18155  if (orientation == Qt::Horizontal)
18156  {
18157  foreach (QPointer<QCPAxis> axis, mRangeDragHorzAxis)
18158  {
18159  if (!axis.isNull())
18160  result.append(axis.data());
18161  }
18162  } else
18163  {
18164  foreach (QPointer<QCPAxis> axis, mRangeDragVertAxis)
18165  {
18166  if (!axis.isNull())
18167  result.append(axis.data());
18168  }
18169  }
18170  return result;
18171 }
18172 
18178 QList<QCPAxis*> QCPAxisRect::rangeZoomAxes(Qt::Orientation orientation)
18179 {
18180  QList<QCPAxis*> result;
18181  if (orientation == Qt::Horizontal)
18182  {
18183  foreach (QPointer<QCPAxis> axis, mRangeZoomHorzAxis)
18184  {
18185  if (!axis.isNull())
18186  result.append(axis.data());
18187  }
18188  } else
18189  {
18190  foreach (QPointer<QCPAxis> axis, mRangeZoomVertAxis)
18191  {
18192  if (!axis.isNull())
18193  result.append(axis.data());
18194  }
18195  }
18196  return result;
18197 }
18198 
18204 double QCPAxisRect::rangeZoomFactor(Qt::Orientation orientation)
18205 {
18206  return (orientation == Qt::Horizontal ? mRangeZoomFactorHorz : mRangeZoomFactorVert);
18207 }

18248 }
18249 
18261 void QCPAxisRect::setRangeDragAxes(QCPAxis *horizontal, QCPAxis *vertical)
18262 {
18263  QList<QCPAxis*> horz, vert;
18264  if (horizontal)
18265  horz.append(horizontal);
18266  if (vertical)
18267  vert.append(vertical);
18268  setRangeDragAxes(horz, vert);
18269 }
18270 
18280 void QCPAxisRect::setRangeDragAxes(QList<QCPAxis*> axes)
18281 {
18282  QList<QCPAxis*> horz, vert;
18283  foreach (QCPAxis *ax, axes)
18284  {
18285  if (ax->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
18286  horz.append(ax);
18287  else
18288  vert.append(ax);
18289  }
18290  setRangeDragAxes(horz, vert);
18291 }
18292 
18299 void QCPAxisRect::setRangeDragAxes(QList<QCPAxis*> horizontal, QList<QCPAxis*> vertical)
18300 {
18301  mRangeDragHorzAxis.clear();
18302  foreach (QCPAxis *ax, horizontal)
18303  {
18304  QPointer<QCPAxis> axPointer(ax);
18305  if (!axPointer.isNull())
18306  mRangeDragHorzAxis.append(axPointer);
18307  else
18308  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid axis passed in horizontal list:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(ax);
18309  }
18310  mRangeDragVertAxis.clear();
18311  foreach (QCPAxis *ax, vertical)
18312  {
18313  QPointer<QCPAxis> axPointer(ax);
18314  if (!axPointer.isNull())
18315  mRangeDragVertAxis.append(axPointer);
18316  else
18317  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid axis passed in vertical list:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(ax);
18318  }
18319 }
18320 
18333 void QCPAxisRect::setRangeZoomAxes(QCPAxis *horizontal, QCPAxis *vertical)
18334 {
18335  QList<QCPAxis*> horz, vert;
18336  if (horizontal)
18337  horz.append(horizontal);
18338  if (vertical)
18339  vert.append(vertical);
18340  setRangeZoomAxes(horz, vert);
18341 }
18342 
18352 void QCPAxisRect::setRangeZoomAxes(QList<QCPAxis*> axes)
18353 {
18354  QList<QCPAxis*> horz, vert;
18355  foreach (QCPAxis *ax, axes)
18356  {
18357  if (ax->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
18358  horz.append(ax);
18359  else
18360  vert.append(ax);
18361  }
18362  setRangeZoomAxes(horz, vert);
18363 }
18364 
18371 void QCPAxisRect::setRangeZoomAxes(QList<QCPAxis*> horizontal, QList<QCPAxis*> vertical)
18372 {
18373  mRangeZoomHorzAxis.clear();
18374  foreach (QCPAxis *ax, horizontal)
18375  {
18376  QPointer<QCPAxis> axPointer(ax);
18377  if (!axPointer.isNull())
18378  mRangeZoomHorzAxis.append(axPointer);
18379  else
18380  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid axis passed in horizontal list:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(ax);
18381  }
18382  mRangeZoomVertAxis.clear();
18383  foreach (QCPAxis *ax, vertical)
18384  {
18385  QPointer<QCPAxis> axPointer(ax);
18386  if (!axPointer.isNull())
18387  mRangeZoomVertAxis.append(axPointer);
18388  else
18389  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid axis passed in vertical list:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(ax);
18390  }
18391 }
18392 
18403 void QCPAxisRect::setRangeZoomFactor(double horizontalFactor, double verticalFactor)
18404 {
18405  mRangeZoomFactorHorz = horizontalFactor;
18406  mRangeZoomFactorVert = verticalFactor;
18407 }
18408 
18413 void QCPAxisRect::setRangeZoomFactor(double factor)
18414 {
18415  mRangeZoomFactorHorz = factor;
18416  mRangeZoomFactorVert = factor;
18417 }
18418 
18437 void QCPAxisRect::drawBackground(QCPPainter *painter)
18438 {
18439  // draw background fill:
18440  if (mBackgroundBrush != Qt::NoBrush)
18441  painter->fillRect(mRect, mBackgroundBrush);
18442 
18443  // draw background pixmap (on top of fill, if brush specified):
18444  if (!mBackgroundPixmap.isNull())
18445  {
18446  if (mBackgroundScaled)
18447  {
18448  // check whether mScaledBackground needs to be updated:
18449  QSize scaledSize(mBackgroundPixmap.size());
18450  scaledSize.scale(mRect.size(), mBackgroundScaledMode);
18451  if (mScaledBackgroundPixmap.size() != scaledSize)
18452  mScaledBackgroundPixmap = mBackgroundPixmap.scaled(mRect.size(), mBackgroundScaledMode, Qt::SmoothTransformation);
18453  painter->drawPixmap(mRect.topLeft()+QPoint(0, -1), mScaledBackgroundPixmap, QRect(0, 0, mRect.width(), mRect.height()) & mScaledBackgroundPixmap.rect());
18454  } else
18455  {
18456  painter->drawPixmap(mRect.topLeft()+QPoint(0, -1), mBackgroundPixmap, QRect(0, 0, mRect.width(), mRect.height()));
18457  }
18458  }
18459 }
18460 
18471 void QCPAxisRect::updateAxesOffset(QCPAxis::AxisType type)
18472 {
18473  const QList<QCPAxis*> axesList = mAxes.value(type);
18474  if (axesList.isEmpty())
18475  return;
18476 
18477  bool isFirstVisible = !axesList.first()->visible(); // if the first axis is visible, the second axis (which is where the loop starts) isn't the first visible axis, so initialize with false
18478  for (int i=1; i<axesList.size(); ++i)
18479  {
18480  int offset = axesList.at(i-1)->offset() + axesList.at(i-1)->calculateMargin();
18481  if (axesList.at(i)->visible()) // only add inner tick length to offset if this axis is visible and it's not the first visible one (might happen if true first axis is invisible)
18482  {
18483  if (!isFirstVisible)
18484  offset += axesList.at(i)->tickLengthIn();
18485  isFirstVisible = false;
18486  }
18487  axesList.at(i)->setOffset(offset);
18488  }
18489 }
18490 
18491 /* inherits documentation from base class */
18492 int QCPAxisRect::calculateAutoMargin(QCP::MarginSide side)
18493 {
18494  if (!mAutoMargins.testFlag(side))
18495  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Called with side that isn't specified as auto margin";
18496 
18497  updateAxesOffset(QCPAxis::marginSideToAxisType(side));
18498 
18499  // note: only need to look at the last (outer most) axis to determine the total margin, due to updateAxisOffset call
18500  const QList<QCPAxis*> axesList = mAxes.value(QCPAxis::marginSideToAxisType(side));
18501  if (!axesList.isEmpty())
18502  return axesList.last()->offset() + axesList.last()->calculateMargin();
18503  else
18504  return 0;
18505 }
18506 
18517 void QCPAxisRect::layoutChanged()
18518 {
18519  if (mParentPlot && mParentPlot->axisRectCount() > 0 && mParentPlot->axisRect(0) == this)
18520  {
18521  if (axisCount(QCPAxis::atBottom) > 0 && !mParentPlot->xAxis)
18522  mParentPlot->xAxis = axis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
18523  if (axisCount(QCPAxis::atLeft) > 0 && !mParentPlot->yAxis)
18524  mParentPlot->yAxis = axis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
18525  if (axisCount(QCPAxis::atTop) > 0 && !mParentPlot->xAxis2)
18526  mParentPlot->xAxis2 = axis(QCPAxis::atTop);
18527  if (axisCount(QCPAxis::atRight) > 0 && !mParentPlot->yAxis2)
18528  mParentPlot->yAxis2 = axis(QCPAxis::atRight);
18529  }
18530 }
18531 
18543 void QCPAxisRect::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event, const QVariant &details)
18544 {
18545  Q_UNUSED(details)
18546  if (event->buttons() & Qt::LeftButton)
18547  {
18548  mDragging = true;
18549  // initialize antialiasing backup in case we start dragging:
18550  if (mParentPlot->noAntialiasingOnDrag())
18551  {
18552  mAADragBackup = mParentPlot->antialiasedElements();
18553  mNotAADragBackup = mParentPlot->notAntialiasedElements();
18554  }
18555  // Mouse range dragging interaction:
18556  if (mParentPlot->interactions().testFlag(QCP::iRangeDrag))
18557  {
18558  mDragStartHorzRange.clear();
18559  foreach (QPointer<QCPAxis> axis, mRangeDragHorzAxis)
18560  mDragStartHorzRange.append(axis.isNull() ? QCPRange() : axis->range());
18561  mDragStartVertRange.clear();
18562  foreach (QPointer<QCPAxis> axis, mRangeDragVertAxis)
18563  mDragStartVertRange.append(axis.isNull() ? QCPRange() : axis->range());
18564  }
18565  }
18566 }
18567 
18575 void QCPAxisRect::mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *event, const QPointF &startPos)
18576 {
18577  Q_UNUSED(startPos)
18578  // Mouse range dragging interaction:
18579  if (mDragging && mParentPlot->interactions().testFlag(QCP::iRangeDrag))
18580  {
18581 
18582  if (mRangeDrag.testFlag(Qt::Horizontal))
18583  {
18584  for (int i=0; i<mRangeDragHorzAxis.size(); ++i)
18585  {
18586  QCPAxis *ax = mRangeDragHorzAxis.at(i).data();
18587  if (!ax)
18588  continue;
18589  if (i >= mDragStartHorzRange.size())
18590  break;
18591  if (ax->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLinear)
18592  {
18593  double diff = ax->pixelToCoord(startPos.x()) - ax->pixelToCoord(event->pos().x());
18594  ax->setRange(mDragStartHorzRange.at(i).lower+diff, mDragStartHorzRange.at(i).upper+diff);
18595  } else if (ax->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
18596  {
18597  double diff = ax->pixelToCoord(startPos.x()) / ax->pixelToCoord(event->pos().x());
18598  ax->setRange(mDragStartHorzRange.at(i).lower*diff, mDragStartHorzRange.at(i).upper*diff);
18599  }
18600  }
18601  }
18602 
18603  if (mRangeDrag.testFlag(Qt::Vertical))
18604  {
18605  for (int i=0; i<mRangeDragVertAxis.size(); ++i)
18606  {
18607  QCPAxis *ax = mRangeDragVertAxis.at(i).data();
18608  if (!ax)
18609  continue;
18610  if (i >= mDragStartVertRange.size())
18611  break;
18612  if (ax->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLinear)
18613  {
18614  double diff = ax->pixelToCoord(startPos.y()) - ax->pixelToCoord(event->pos().y());
18615  ax->setRange(mDragStartVertRange.at(i).lower+diff, mDragStartVertRange.at(i).upper+diff);
18616  } else if (ax->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
18617  {
18618  double diff = ax->pixelToCoord(startPos.y()) / ax->pixelToCoord(event->pos().y());
18619  ax->setRange(mDragStartVertRange.at(i).lower*diff, mDragStartVertRange.at(i).upper*diff);
18620  }
18621  }
18622  }
18623 
18624  if (mRangeDrag != 0) // if either vertical or horizontal drag was enabled, do a replot
18625  {
18626  if (mParentPlot->noAntialiasingOnDrag())
18627  mParentPlot->setNotAntialiasedElements(QCP::aeAll);
18628  mParentPlot->replot(QCustomPlot::rpQueuedReplot);
18629  }
18630 
18631  }
18632 }
18633 
18634 /* inherits documentation from base class */
18635 void QCPAxisRect::mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent *event, const QPointF &startPos)
18636 {
18637  Q_UNUSED(event)
18638  Q_UNUSED(startPos)
18639  mDragging = false;
18640  if (mParentPlot->noAntialiasingOnDrag())
18641  {
18642  mParentPlot->setAntialiasedElements(mAADragBackup);
18643  mParentPlot->setNotAntialiasedElements(mNotAADragBackup);
18644  }
18645 }
18646 
18661 void QCPAxisRect::wheelEvent(QWheelEvent *event)
18662 {
18663 #if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(5, 0, 0)
18664  const double delta = event->delta();
18665 #else
18666  const double delta = event->angleDelta().y();
18667 #endif
18668 
18669 #if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(5, 14, 0)
18670  const QPointF pos = event->pos();
18671 #else
18672  const QPointF pos = event->position();
18673 #endif
18674 
18675  // Mouse range zooming interaction:
18676  if (mParentPlot->interactions().testFlag(QCP::iRangeZoom))
18677  {
18678  if (mRangeZoom != 0)
18679  {
18680  double factor;
18681  double wheelSteps = delta/120.0; // a single step delta is +/-120 usually
18682  if (mRangeZoom.testFlag(Qt::Horizontal))
18683  {
18684  factor = qPow(mRangeZoomFactorHorz, wheelSteps);
18685  foreach (QPointer<QCPAxis> axis, mRangeZoomHorzAxis)
18686  {
18687  if (!axis.isNull())
18688  axis->scaleRange(factor, axis->pixelToCoord(pos.x()));
18689  }
18690  }
18691  if (mRangeZoom.testFlag(Qt::Vertical))
18692  {
18693  factor = qPow(mRangeZoomFactorVert, wheelSteps);
18694  foreach (QPointer<QCPAxis> axis, mRangeZoomVertAxis)
18695  {
18696  if (!axis.isNull())
18697  axis->scaleRange(factor, axis->pixelToCoord(pos.y()));
18698  }
18699  }
18700  mParentPlot->replot();
18701  }
18702  }
18703 }
18704 /* end of 'src/layoutelements/layoutelement-axisrect.cpp' */
18705 
18706 
18707 /* including file 'src/layoutelements/layoutelement-legend.cpp' */
18708 /* modified 2022-11-06T12:45:56, size 31762 */
18709 
18713 
18738 /* start of documentation of signals */
18739 
18746 /* end of documentation of signals */

18752 QCPAbstractLegendItem::QCPAbstractLegendItem(QCPLegend *parent) :
18753  QCPLayoutElement(parent->parentPlot()),
18754  mParentLegend(parent),
18755  mFont(parent->font()),
18756  mTextColor(parent->textColor()),
18757  mSelectedFont(parent->selectedFont()),
18758  mSelectedTextColor(parent->selectedTextColor()),
18759  mSelectable(true),
18760  mSelected(false)
18761 {
18762  setLayer(QLatin1String("legend"));
18763  setMargins(QMargins(0, 0, 0, 0));
18764 }

18839 /* inherits documentation from base class */
18840 double QCPAbstractLegendItem::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
18841 {
18842  Q_UNUSED(details)
18843  if (!mParentPlot) return -1;
18844  if (onlySelectable && (!mSelectable || !mParentLegend->selectableParts().testFlag(QCPLegend::spItems)))
18845  return -1;
18846 
18847  if (mRect.contains(pos.toPoint()))
18848  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
18849  else
18850  return -1;
18851 }
18852

18855 {

18857 }

18861 {

18863 }
18864 
18865 /* inherits documentation from base class */
18866 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
18867 {
18868  Q_UNUSED(event)
18869  Q_UNUSED(details)
18870  if (mSelectable && mParentLegend->selectableParts().testFlag(QCPLegend::spItems))
18871  {
18872  bool selBefore = mSelected;
18873  setSelected(additive ? !mSelected : true);
18874  if (selectionStateChanged)
18875  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
18876  }
18877 }
18878 
18879 /* inherits documentation from base class */
18880 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
18881 {
18882  if (mSelectable && mParentLegend->selectableParts().testFlag(QCPLegend::spItems))
18883  {
18884  bool selBefore = mSelected;
18885  setSelected(false);
18886  if (selectionStateChanged)
18887  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
18888  }
18889 }

18926 QCPPlottableLegendItem::QCPPlottableLegendItem(QCPLegend *parent, QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable) :

18929 {

18938 QPen QCPPlottableLegendItem::getIconBorderPen() const
18939 {
18940  return mSelected ? mParentLegend->selectedIconBorderPen() : mParentLegend->iconBorderPen();
18941 }
18942 
18948 QColor QCPPlottableLegendItem::getTextColor() const
18949 {
18950  return mSelected ? mSelectedTextColor : mTextColor;
18951 }
18952 
18958 QFont QCPPlottableLegendItem::getFont() const
18959 {
18960  return mSelected ? mSelectedFont : mFont;
18961 }
18962 
18969 void QCPPlottableLegendItem::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
18970 {
18971  if (!mPlottable) return;
18972  painter->setFont(getFont());
18973  painter->setPen(QPen(getTextColor()));
18974  QSize iconSize = mParentLegend->iconSize();
18975  QRect textRect = painter->fontMetrics().boundingRect(0, 0, 0, iconSize.height(), Qt::TextDontClip, mPlottable->name());
18976  QRect iconRect(mRect.topLeft(), iconSize);
18977  int textHeight = qMax(textRect.height(), iconSize.height()); // if text has smaller height than icon, center text vertically in icon height, else align tops
18978  painter->drawText(mRect.x()+iconSize.width()+mParentLegend->iconTextPadding(), mRect.y(), textRect.width(), textHeight, Qt::TextDontClip, mPlottable->name());
18979  // draw icon:
18980  painter->save();
18981  painter->setClipRect(iconRect, Qt::IntersectClip);
18982  mPlottable->drawLegendIcon(painter, iconRect);
18983  painter->restore();
18984  // draw icon border:
18985  if (getIconBorderPen().style() != Qt::NoPen)
18986  {
18987  painter->setPen(getIconBorderPen());
18988  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
18989  int halfPen = qCeil(painter->pen().widthF()*0.5)+1;
18990  painter->setClipRect(mOuterRect.adjusted(-halfPen, -halfPen, halfPen, halfPen)); // extend default clip rect so thicker pens (especially during selection) are not clipped
18991  painter->drawRect(iconRect);
18992  }
18993 }
18994 
19002 QSize QCPPlottableLegendItem::minimumOuterSizeHint() const
19003 {
19004  if (!mPlottable) return {};
19005  QSize result(0, 0);
19006  QRect textRect;
19007  QFontMetrics fontMetrics(getFont());
19008  QSize iconSize = mParentLegend->iconSize();
19009  textRect = fontMetrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, iconSize.height(), Qt::TextDontClip, mPlottable->name());
19010  result.setWidth(iconSize.width() + mParentLegend->iconTextPadding() + textRect.width());
19011  result.setHeight(qMax(textRect.height(), iconSize.height()));
19012  result.rwidth() += mMargins.left()+mMargins.right();
19013  result.rheight() += mMargins.top()+mMargins.bottom();
19014  return result;
19015 }

19073 QCPLegend::QCPLegend() :
19074  mIconTextPadding{}
19075 {
19076  setFillOrder(QCPLayoutGrid::foRowsFirst);
19077  setWrap(0);
19078 
19079  setRowSpacing(3);
19080  setColumnSpacing(8);
19081  setMargins(QMargins(7, 5, 7, 4));
19082  setAntialiased(false);
19083  setIconSize(32, 18);
19084 
19085  setIconTextPadding(7);
19086 
19087  setSelectableParts(spLegendBox | spItems);
19088  setSelectedParts(spNone);
19089 
19090  setBorderPen(QPen(Qt::black, 0));
19091  setSelectedBorderPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
19092  setIconBorderPen(Qt::NoPen);
19093  setSelectedIconBorderPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
19094  setBrush(Qt::white);
19095  setSelectedBrush(Qt::white);
19096  setTextColor(Qt::black);
19097  setSelectedTextColor(Qt::blue);
19098 }
19099 
19100 QCPLegend::~QCPLegend()
19101 {
19102  clearItems();
19103  if (qobject_cast<QCustomPlot*>(mParentPlot)) // make sure this isn't called from QObject dtor when QCustomPlot is already destructed (happens when the legend is not in any layout and thus QObject-child of QCustomPlot)
19104  mParentPlot->legendRemoved(this);
19105 }
19106 
19107 /* no doc for getter, see setSelectedParts */
19108 QCPLegend::SelectableParts QCPLegend::selectedParts() const
19109 {
19110  // check whether any legend elements selected, if yes, add spItems to return value
19111  bool hasSelectedItems = false;
19112  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
19113  {
19114  if (item(i) && item(i)->selected())
19115  {
19116  hasSelectedItems = true;
19117  break;
19118  }
19119  }
19120  if (hasSelectedItems)
19121  return mSelectedParts | spItems;
19122  else
19123  return mSelectedParts & ~spItems;
19124 }
19125

19139  mBrush = brush;
19140 }

19152 {
19153  mFont = font;
19154  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
19155  {
19156  if (item(i))
19157  item(i)->setFont(mFont);
19158  }
19159 }
19160

19173  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
19174  {
19175  if (item(i))
19176  item(i)->setTextColor(color);
19177  }

19228 void QCPLegend::setSelectableParts(const SelectableParts &selectable)
19229 {
19230  if (mSelectableParts != selectable)
19231  {
19232  mSelectableParts = selectable;
19233  emit selectableChanged(mSelectableParts);
19234  }
19235 }
19236 
19258 void QCPLegend::setSelectedParts(const SelectableParts &selected)
19259 {
19260  SelectableParts newSelected = selected;
19261  mSelectedParts = this->selectedParts(); // update mSelectedParts in case item selection changed
19262 
19263  if (mSelectedParts != newSelected)
19264  {
19265  if (!mSelectedParts.testFlag(spItems) && newSelected.testFlag(spItems)) // attempt to set spItems flag (can't do that)
19266  {
19267  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "spItems flag can not be set, it can only be unset with this function";
19268  newSelected &= ~spItems;
19269  }
19270  if (mSelectedParts.testFlag(spItems) && !newSelected.testFlag(spItems)) // spItems flag was unset, so clear item selection
19271  {
19272  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
19273  {
19274  if (item(i))
19275  item(i)->setSelected(false);
19276  }
19277  }
19278  mSelectedParts = newSelected;
19279  emit selectionChanged(mSelectedParts);
19280  }
19281 }
19282 
19289 void QCPLegend::setSelectedBorderPen(const QPen &pen)
19290 {
19291  mSelectedBorderPen = pen;
19292 }
19293 
19299 void QCPLegend::setSelectedIconBorderPen(const QPen &pen)
19300 {
19301  mSelectedIconBorderPen = pen;
19302 }
19303 
19310 void QCPLegend::setSelectedBrush(const QBrush &brush)
19311 {
19312  mSelectedBrush = brush;
19313 }
19314 
19322 void QCPLegend::setSelectedFont(const QFont &font)
19323 {
19324  mSelectedFont = font;
19325  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
19326  {
19327  if (item(i))
19328  item(i)->setSelectedFont(font);
19329  }
19330 }

19342  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
19343  {
19344  if (item(i))
19345  item(i)->setSelectedTextColor(color);
19346  }

19357 QCPAbstractLegendItem *QCPLegend::item(int index) const

19361 
19368 QCPPlottableLegendItem *QCPLegend::itemWithPlottable(const QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable) const
19369 {
19370  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
19371  {
19372  if (QCPPlottableLegendItem *pli = qobject_cast<QCPPlottableLegendItem*>(item(i)))
19373  {
19374  if (pli->plottable() == plottable)
19375  return pli;
19376  }
19377  }
19378  return nullptr;
19379 }

19392 {
19393  return elementCount();
19394 }

19401 bool QCPLegend::hasItem(QCPAbstractLegendItem *item) const
19402 {
19403  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
19404  {
19405  if (item == this->item(i))
19406  return true;
19407  }
19408  return false;
19409 }

19418 {

19420 }

19432 bool QCPLegend::addItem(QCPAbstractLegendItem *item)
19433 {
19434  return addElement(item);
19435 }
19436 
19450 bool QCPLegend::removeItem(int index)
19451 {
19452  if (QCPAbstractLegendItem *ali = item(index))
19453  {
19454  bool success = remove(ali);
19455  if (success)
19456  setFillOrder(fillOrder(), true); // gets rid of empty cell by reordering
19457  return success;
19458  } else
19459  return false;
19460 }
19461 
19474 bool QCPLegend::removeItem(QCPAbstractLegendItem *item)
19475 {
19476  bool success = remove(item);
19477  if (success)
19478  setFillOrder(fillOrder(), true); // gets rid of empty cell by reordering
19479  return success;
19480 }
19481 
19485 void QCPLegend::clearItems()
19486 {
19487  for (int i=elementCount()-1; i>=0; --i)
19488  {
19489  if (item(i))
19490  removeAt(i); // don't use removeItem() because it would unnecessarily reorder the whole legend for each item
19491  }
19492  setFillOrder(fillOrder(), true); // get rid of empty cells by reordering once after all items are removed
19493 }
19494 
19501 QList<QCPAbstractLegendItem *> QCPLegend::selectedItems() const
19502 {
19503  QList<QCPAbstractLegendItem*> result;
19504  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
19505  {
19506  if (QCPAbstractLegendItem *ali = item(i))
19507  {
19508  if (ali->selected())
19509  result.append(ali);
19510  }
19511  }
19512  return result;
19513 }
19514 
19530 void QCPLegend::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
19531 {
19532  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeLegend);
19533 }
19534 
19540 QPen QCPLegend::getBorderPen() const
19541 {
19542  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spLegendBox) ? mSelectedBorderPen : mBorderPen;
19543 }
19544 
19550 QBrush QCPLegend::getBrush() const
19551 {
19552  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spLegendBox) ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
19553 }
19554 
19560 void QCPLegend::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
19561 {
19562  // draw background rect:
19563  painter->setBrush(getBrush());
19564  painter->setPen(getBorderPen());
19565  painter->drawRect(mOuterRect);
19566 }
19567 
19568 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19569 double QCPLegend::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
19570 {
19571  if (!mParentPlot) return -1;
19572  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectableParts.testFlag(spLegendBox))
19573  return -1;
19574 
19575  if (mOuterRect.contains(pos.toPoint()))
19576  {
19577  if (details) details->setValue(spLegendBox);
19578  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
19579  }
19580  return -1;
19581 }
19582 
19583 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19584 void QCPLegend::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
19585 {
19586  Q_UNUSED(event)
19587  mSelectedParts = selectedParts(); // in case item selection has changed
19588  if (details.value<SelectablePart>() == spLegendBox && mSelectableParts.testFlag(spLegendBox))
19589  {
19590  SelectableParts selBefore = mSelectedParts;
19591  setSelectedParts(additive ? mSelectedParts^spLegendBox : mSelectedParts|spLegendBox); // no need to unset spItems in !additive case, because they will be deselected by QCustomPlot (they're normal QCPLayerables with own deselectEvent)
19592  if (selectionStateChanged)
19593  *selectionStateChanged = mSelectedParts != selBefore;
19594  }
19595 }
19596 
19597 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19598 void QCPLegend::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
19599 {
19600  mSelectedParts = selectedParts(); // in case item selection has changed
19601  if (mSelectableParts.testFlag(spLegendBox))
19602  {
19603  SelectableParts selBefore = mSelectedParts;
19604  setSelectedParts(selectedParts() & ~spLegendBox);
19605  if (selectionStateChanged)
19606  *selectionStateChanged = mSelectedParts != selBefore;
19607  }
19608 }
19609 
19610 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19611 QCP::Interaction QCPLegend::selectionCategory() const
19612 {
19613  return QCP::iSelectLegend;
19614 }
19615 
19616 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19617 QCP::Interaction QCPAbstractLegendItem::selectionCategory() const
19618 {
19619  return QCP::iSelectLegend;
19620 }
19621 
19622 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19623 void QCPLegend::parentPlotInitialized(QCustomPlot *parentPlot)
19624 {
19625  if (parentPlot && !parentPlot->legend)
19626  parentPlot->legend = this;
19627 }

19631 /* including file 'src/layoutelements/layoutelement-textelement.cpp' */
19632 /* modified 2022-11-06T12:45:56, size 12925 */
19633 
19637 
19648 /* start documentation of signals */
19649 
19672 /* end documentation of signals */
19673 
19679 QCPTextElement::QCPTextElement(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
19680  QCPLayoutElement(parentPlot),
19681  mText(),
19682  mTextFlags(Qt::AlignCenter),
19683  mFont(QFont(QLatin1String("sans serif"), 12)), // will be taken from parentPlot if available, see below
19684  mTextColor(Qt::black),
19685  mSelectedFont(QFont(QLatin1String("sans serif"), 12)), // will be taken from parentPlot if available, see below
19686  mSelectedTextColor(Qt::blue),
19687  mSelectable(false),
19688  mSelected(false)
19689 {
19690  if (parentPlot)
19691  {
19692  mFont = parentPlot->font();
19693  mSelectedFont = parentPlot->font();
19694  }
19695  setMargins(QMargins(2, 2, 2, 2));
19696 }
19697 
19704 QCPTextElement::QCPTextElement(QCustomPlot *parentPlot, const QString &text) :
19705  QCPLayoutElement(parentPlot),
19706  mText(text),
19707  mTextFlags(Qt::AlignCenter),
19708  mFont(QFont(QLatin1String("sans serif"), 12)), // will be taken from parentPlot if available, see below
19709  mTextColor(Qt::black),
19710  mSelectedFont(QFont(QLatin1String("sans serif"), 12)), // will be taken from parentPlot if available, see below
19711  mSelectedTextColor(Qt::blue),
19712  mSelectable(false),
19713  mSelected(false)
19714 {
19715  if (parentPlot)
19716  {
19717  mFont = parentPlot->font();
19718  mSelectedFont = parentPlot->font();
19719  }
19720  setMargins(QMargins(2, 2, 2, 2));
19721 }

19729 QCPTextElement::QCPTextElement(QCustomPlot *parentPlot, const QString &text, double pointSize) :
19730  QCPLayoutElement(parentPlot),
19731  mText(text),
19732  mTextFlags(Qt::AlignCenter),
19733  mFont(QFont(QLatin1String("sans serif"), int(pointSize))), // will be taken from parentPlot if available, see below
19734  mTextColor(Qt::black),
19735  mSelectedFont(QFont(QLatin1String("sans serif"), int(pointSize))), // will be taken from parentPlot if available, see below
19736  mSelectedTextColor(Qt::blue),
19737  mSelectable(false),
19738  mSelected(false)
19739 {
19740  mFont.setPointSizeF(pointSize); // set here again as floating point, because constructor above only takes integer
19741  if (parentPlot)
19742  {
19743  mFont = parentPlot->font();
19744  mFont.setPointSizeF(pointSize);
19745  mSelectedFont = parentPlot->font();
19746  mSelectedFont.setPointSizeF(pointSize);
19747  }
19748  setMargins(QMargins(2, 2, 2, 2));
19749 }

19912 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19913 QSize QCPTextElement::minimumOuterSizeHint() const
19914 {
19915  QFontMetrics metrics(mFont);
19916  QSize result(metrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip, mText).size());
19917  result.rwidth() += mMargins.left()+mMargins.right();
19918  result.rheight() += mMargins.top()+mMargins.bottom();
19919  return result;
19920 }
19921 
19922 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19923 QSize QCPTextElement::maximumOuterSizeHint() const
19924 {
19925  QFontMetrics metrics(mFont);
19926  QSize result(metrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip, mText).size());
19927  result.setWidth(QWIDGETSIZE_MAX);
19928  result.rheight() += mMargins.top()+mMargins.bottom();
19929  return result;
19930 }

19932 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19933 void QCPTextElement::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
19934 {
19935  Q_UNUSED(event)
19936  Q_UNUSED(details)
19937  if (mSelectable)
19938  {
19939  bool selBefore = mSelected;
19940  setSelected(additive ? !mSelected : true);
19941  if (selectionStateChanged)
19942  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
19943  }
19944 }
19945 
19946 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19947 void QCPTextElement::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
19948 {
19949  if (mSelectable)
19950  {
19951  bool selBefore = mSelected;
19952  setSelected(false);
19953  if (selectionStateChanged)
19954  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
19955  }
19956 }
19957 
19968 double QCPTextElement::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
19969 {
19970  Q_UNUSED(details)
19971  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
19972  return -1;
19973 
19974  if (mTextBoundingRect.contains(pos.toPoint()))
19975  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
19976  else
19977  return -1;
19978 }
19979 
19986 void QCPTextElement::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event, const QVariant &details)
19987 {
19988  Q_UNUSED(details)
19989  event->accept();
19990 }
19991 
19998 void QCPTextElement::mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent *event, const QPointF &startPos)
19999 {
20000  if ((QPointF(event->pos())-startPos).manhattanLength() <= 3)
20001  emit clicked(event);
20002 }

20009 void QCPTextElement::mouseDoubleClickEvent(QMouseEvent *event, const QVariant &details)
20010 {
20011  Q_UNUSED(details)
20012  emit doubleClicked(event);
20013 }

20127 QCPColorScale::QCPColorScale(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
20128  QCPLayoutElement(parentPlot),
20129  mType(QCPAxis::atTop), // set to atTop such that setType(QCPAxis::atRight) below doesn't skip work because it thinks it's already atRight
20130  mDataScaleType(QCPAxis::stLinear),
20131  mGradient(QCPColorGradient::gpCold),
20132  mBarWidth(20),
20133  mAxisRect(new QCPColorScaleAxisRectPrivate(this))
20134 {
20135  setMinimumMargins(QMargins(0, 6, 0, 6)); // for default right color scale types, keep some room at bottom and top (important if no margin group is used)
20136  setType(QCPAxis::atRight);
20137  setDataRange(QCPRange(0, 6));
20138 }

20141 {

20143 }

20145 /* undocumented getter */
20146 QString QCPColorScale::label() const
20147 {
20148  if (!mColorAxis)
20149  {
20150  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal color axis undefined";
20151  return QString();
20152  }
20153 
20154  return mColorAxis.data()->label();
20155 }
20156 
20157 /* undocumented getter */
20158 bool QCPColorScale::rangeDrag() const
20159 {
20160  if (!mAxisRect)
20161  {
20162  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
20163  return false;
20164  }
20165 
20166  return mAxisRect.data()->rangeDrag().testFlag(QCPAxis::orientation(mType)) &&
20167  mAxisRect.data()->rangeDragAxis(QCPAxis::orientation(mType)) &&
20168  mAxisRect.data()->rangeDragAxis(QCPAxis::orientation(mType))->orientation() == QCPAxis::orientation(mType);
20169 }
20170 
20171 /* undocumented getter */
20172 bool QCPColorScale::rangeZoom() const
20173 {
20174  if (!mAxisRect)
20175  {
20176  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
20177  return false;
20178  }
20179 
20180  return mAxisRect.data()->rangeZoom().testFlag(QCPAxis::orientation(mType)) &&
20181  mAxisRect.data()->rangeZoomAxis(QCPAxis::orientation(mType)) &&
20182  mAxisRect.data()->rangeZoomAxis(QCPAxis::orientation(mType))->orientation() == QCPAxis::orientation(mType);
20183 }
20184 
20192 void QCPColorScale::setType(QCPAxis::AxisType type)
20193 {
20194  if (!mAxisRect)
20195  {
20196  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
20197  return;
20198  }
20199  if (mType != type)
20200  {
20201  mType = type;
20202  QCPRange rangeTransfer(0, 6);
20203  QString labelTransfer;
20204  QSharedPointer<QCPAxisTicker> tickerTransfer;
20205  // transfer/revert some settings on old axis if it exists:
20206  bool doTransfer = !mColorAxis.isNull();
20207  if (doTransfer)
20208  {
20209  rangeTransfer = mColorAxis.data()->range();
20210  labelTransfer = mColorAxis.data()->label();
20211  tickerTransfer = mColorAxis.data()->ticker();
20212  mColorAxis.data()->setLabel(QString());
20213  disconnect(mColorAxis.data(), SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), this, SLOT(setDataRange(QCPRange)));
20214  disconnect(mColorAxis.data(), SIGNAL(scaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), this, SLOT(setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
20215  }
20216  const QList<QCPAxis::AxisType> allAxisTypes = QList<QCPAxis::AxisType>() << QCPAxis::atLeft << QCPAxis::atRight << QCPAxis::atBottom << QCPAxis::atTop;
20217  foreach (QCPAxis::AxisType atype, allAxisTypes)
20218  {
20219  mAxisRect.data()->axis(atype)->setTicks(atype == mType);
20220  mAxisRect.data()->axis(atype)->setTickLabels(atype== mType);
20221  }
20222  // set new mColorAxis pointer:
20223  mColorAxis = mAxisRect.data()->axis(mType);
20224  // transfer settings to new axis:
20225  if (doTransfer)
20226  {
20227  mColorAxis.data()->setRange(rangeTransfer); // range transfer necessary if axis changes from vertical to horizontal or vice versa (axes with same orientation are synchronized via signals)
20228  mColorAxis.data()->setLabel(labelTransfer);
20229  mColorAxis.data()->setTicker(tickerTransfer);
20230  }
20231  connect(mColorAxis.data(), SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), this, SLOT(setDataRange(QCPRange)));
20232  connect(mColorAxis.data(), SIGNAL(scaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), this, SLOT(setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
20233  mAxisRect.data()->setRangeDragAxes(QList<QCPAxis*>() << mColorAxis.data());
20234  }
20235 }
20236 
20246 void QCPColorScale::setDataRange(const QCPRange &dataRange)
20247 {
20248  if (mDataRange.lower != dataRange.lower || mDataRange.upper != dataRange.upper)
20249  {
20250  mDataRange = dataRange;
20251  if (mColorAxis)
20252  mColorAxis.data()->setRange(mDataRange);
20253  emit dataRangeChanged(mDataRange);
20254  }
20255 }
20256 
20276 void QCPColorScale::setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType scaleType)
20277 {
20278  if (mDataScaleType != scaleType)
20279  {
20280  mDataScaleType = scaleType;
20281  if (mColorAxis)
20282  mColorAxis.data()->setScaleType(mDataScaleType);
20283  if (mDataScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
20284  setDataRange(mDataRange.sanitizedForLogScale());
20285  emit dataScaleTypeChanged(mDataScaleType);
20286  }
20287 }
20288

20299  {
20300  mGradient = gradient;

20302  mAxisRect.data()->mGradientImageInvalidated = true;
20303  emit gradientChanged(mGradient);
20304  }
20305 }

20337 void QCPColorScale::setRangeDrag(bool enabled)
20338 {
20339  if (!mAxisRect)
20340  {
20341  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
20342  return;
20343  }
20344 
20345  if (enabled)
20346  {
20347  mAxisRect.data()->setRangeDrag(QCPAxis::orientation(mType));
20348  } else
20349  {
20350 #if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(5, 2, 0)
20351  mAxisRect.data()->setRangeDrag(nullptr);
20352 #else
20353  mAxisRect.data()->setRangeDrag({});
20354 #endif
20355  }
20356 }

20388 QList<QCPColorMap*> QCPColorScale::colorMaps() const
20389 {
20390  QList<QCPColorMap*> result;
20391  for (int i=0; i<mParentPlot->plottableCount(); ++i)
20392  {
20393  if (QCPColorMap *cm = qobject_cast<QCPColorMap*>(mParentPlot->plottable(i)))
20394  if (cm->colorScale() == this)
20395  result.append(cm);
20396  }
20397  return result;
20398 }
20399 
20406 void QCPColorScale::rescaleDataRange(bool onlyVisibleMaps)
20407 {
20408  QList<QCPColorMap*> maps = colorMaps();
20409  QCPRange newRange;
20410  bool haveRange = false;
20411  QCP::SignDomain sign = QCP::sdBoth;
20412  if (mDataScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
20413  sign = (mDataRange.upper < 0 ? QCP::sdNegative : QCP::sdPositive);
20414  foreach (QCPColorMap *map, maps)
20415  {
20416  if (!map->realVisibility() && onlyVisibleMaps)
20417  continue;
20418  QCPRange mapRange;
20419  if (map->colorScale() == this)
20420  {
20421  bool currentFoundRange = true;
20422  mapRange = map->data()->dataBounds();
20423  if (sign == QCP::sdPositive)
20424  {
20425  if (mapRange.lower <= 0 && mapRange.upper > 0)
20426  mapRange.lower = mapRange.upper*1e-3;
20427  else if (mapRange.lower <= 0 && mapRange.upper <= 0)
20428  currentFoundRange = false;
20429  } else if (sign == QCP::sdNegative)
20430  {
20431  if (mapRange.upper >= 0 && mapRange.lower < 0)
20432  mapRange.upper = mapRange.lower*1e-3;
20433  else if (mapRange.upper >= 0 && mapRange.lower >= 0)
20434  currentFoundRange = false;
20435  }
20436  if (currentFoundRange)
20437  {
20438  if (!haveRange)
20439  newRange = mapRange;
20440  else
20441  newRange.expand(mapRange);
20442  haveRange = true;
20443  }
20444  }
20445  }
20446  if (haveRange)
20447  {
20448  if (!QCPRange::validRange(newRange)) // likely due to range being zero (plottable has only constant data in this dimension), shift current range to at least center the data
20449  {
20450  double center = (newRange.lower+newRange.upper)*0.5; // upper and lower should be equal anyway, but just to make sure, incase validRange returned false for other reason
20451  if (mDataScaleType == QCPAxis::stLinear)
20452  {
20453  newRange.lower = center-mDataRange.size()/2.0;
20454  newRange.upper = center+mDataRange.size()/2.0;
20455  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
20456  {
20457  newRange.lower = center/qSqrt(mDataRange.upper/mDataRange.lower);
20458  newRange.upper = center*qSqrt(mDataRange.upper/mDataRange.lower);
20459  }
20460  }
20461  setDataRange(newRange);
20462  }
20463 }
20464 
20465 /* inherits documentation from base class */
20466 void QCPColorScale::update(UpdatePhase phase)
20467 {
20468  QCPLayoutElement::update(phase);
20469  if (!mAxisRect)
20470  {
20471  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
20472  return;
20473  }
20474 
20475  mAxisRect.data()->update(phase);
20476 
20477  switch (phase)
20478  {
20479  case upMargins:
20480  {
20481  if (mType == QCPAxis::atBottom || mType == QCPAxis::atTop)
20482  {
20483  setMaximumSize(QWIDGETSIZE_MAX, mBarWidth+mAxisRect.data()->margins().top()+mAxisRect.data()->margins().bottom());
20484  setMinimumSize(0, mBarWidth+mAxisRect.data()->margins().top()+mAxisRect.data()->margins().bottom());
20485  } else
20486  {
20487  setMaximumSize(mBarWidth+mAxisRect.data()->margins().left()+mAxisRect.data()->margins().right(), QWIDGETSIZE_MAX);
20488  setMinimumSize(mBarWidth+mAxisRect.data()->margins().left()+mAxisRect.data()->margins().right(), 0);
20489  }
20490  break;
20491  }
20492  case upLayout:
20493  {
20494  mAxisRect.data()->setOuterRect(rect());
20495  break;
20496  }
20497  default: break;
20498  }
20499 }
20500

20502 void QCPColorScale::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
20503 {
20504  painter->setAntialiasing(false);
20505 }
20506

20554 
20569 QCPColorScaleAxisRectPrivate::QCPColorScaleAxisRectPrivate(QCPColorScale *parentColorScale) :
20570  QCPAxisRect(parentColorScale->parentPlot(), true),
20571  mParentColorScale(parentColorScale),
20572  mGradientImageInvalidated(true)
20573 {
20574  setParentLayerable(parentColorScale);
20575  setMinimumMargins(QMargins(0, 0, 0, 0));
20576  const QList<QCPAxis::AxisType> allAxisTypes = QList<QCPAxis::AxisType>() << QCPAxis::atBottom << QCPAxis::atTop << QCPAxis::atLeft << QCPAxis::atRight;
20577  foreach (QCPAxis::AxisType type, allAxisTypes)
20578  {
20579  axis(type)->setVisible(true);
20580  axis(type)->grid()->setVisible(false);
20581  axis(type)->setPadding(0);
20582  connect(axis(type), SIGNAL(selectionChanged(QCPAxis::SelectableParts)), this, SLOT(axisSelectionChanged(QCPAxis::SelectableParts)));
20583  connect(axis(type), SIGNAL(selectableChanged(QCPAxis::SelectableParts)), this, SLOT(axisSelectableChanged(QCPAxis::SelectableParts)));
20584  }
20585 
20586  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atLeft), SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), axis(QCPAxis::atRight), SLOT(setRange(QCPRange)));
20587  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atRight), SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), axis(QCPAxis::atLeft), SLOT(setRange(QCPRange)));
20588  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atBottom), SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), axis(QCPAxis::atTop), SLOT(setRange(QCPRange)));
20589  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atTop), SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), axis(QCPAxis::atBottom), SLOT(setRange(QCPRange)));
20590  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atLeft), SIGNAL(scaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), axis(QCPAxis::atRight), SLOT(setScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
20591  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atRight), SIGNAL(scaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), axis(QCPAxis::atLeft), SLOT(setScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
20592  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atBottom), SIGNAL(scaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), axis(QCPAxis::atTop), SLOT(setScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
20593  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atTop), SIGNAL(scaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), axis(QCPAxis::atBottom), SLOT(setScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
20594 
20595  // make layer transfers of color scale transfer to axis rect and axes
20596  // the axes must be set after axis rect, such that they appear above color gradient drawn by axis rect:
20597  connect(parentColorScale, SIGNAL(layerChanged(QCPLayer*)), this, SLOT(setLayer(QCPLayer*)));
20598  foreach (QCPAxis::AxisType type, allAxisTypes)
20599  connect(parentColorScale, SIGNAL(layerChanged(QCPLayer*)), axis(type), SLOT(setLayer(QCPLayer*)));
20600 }
20601 
20609 void QCPColorScaleAxisRectPrivate::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
20610 {
20611  if (mGradientImageInvalidated)
20612  updateGradientImage();
20613 
20614  bool mirrorHorz = false;
20615  bool mirrorVert = false;
20616  if (mParentColorScale->mColorAxis)
20617  {
20618  mirrorHorz = mParentColorScale->mColorAxis.data()->rangeReversed() && (mParentColorScale->type() == QCPAxis::atBottom || mParentColorScale->type() == QCPAxis::atTop);
20619  mirrorVert = mParentColorScale->mColorAxis.data()->rangeReversed() && (mParentColorScale->type() == QCPAxis::atLeft || mParentColorScale->type() == QCPAxis::atRight);
20620  }
20621 
20622  painter->drawImage(rect().adjusted(0, -1, 0, -1), mGradientImage.mirrored(mirrorHorz, mirrorVert));
20623  QCPAxisRect::draw(painter);
20624 }
20625 
20631 void QCPColorScaleAxisRectPrivate::updateGradientImage()
20632 {
20633  if (rect().isEmpty())
20634  return;
20635 
20636  const QImage::Format format = QImage::Format_ARGB32_Premultiplied;
20637  int n = mParentColorScale->mGradient.levelCount();
20638  int w, h;
20639  QVector<double> data(n);
20640  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
20641  data[i] = i;
20642  if (mParentColorScale->mType == QCPAxis::atBottom || mParentColorScale->mType == QCPAxis::atTop)
20643  {
20644  w = n;
20645  h = rect().height();
20646  mGradientImage = QImage(w, h, format);
20647  QVector<QRgb*> pixels;
20648  for (int y=0; y<h; ++y)
20649  pixels.append(reinterpret_cast<QRgb*>(mGradientImage.scanLine(y)));
20650  mParentColorScale->mGradient.colorize(data.constData(), QCPRange(0, n-1), pixels.first(), n);
20651  for (int y=1; y<h; ++y)
20652  memcpy(pixels.at(y), pixels.first(), size_t(n)*sizeof(QRgb));
20653  } else
20654  {
20655  w = rect().width();
20656  h = n;
20657  mGradientImage = QImage(w, h, format);
20658  for (int y=0; y<h; ++y)
20659  {
20660  QRgb *pixels = reinterpret_cast<QRgb*>(mGradientImage.scanLine(y));
20661  const QRgb lineColor = mParentColorScale->mGradient.color(data[h-1-y], QCPRange(0, n-1));
20662  for (int x=0; x<w; ++x)
20663  pixels[x] = lineColor;
20664  }
20665  }
20666  mGradientImageInvalidated = false;
20667 }
20668 
20674 void QCPColorScaleAxisRectPrivate::axisSelectionChanged(QCPAxis::SelectableParts selectedParts)
20675 {
20676  // axis bases of four axes shall always (de-)selected synchronously:
20677  const QList<QCPAxis::AxisType> allAxisTypes = QList<QCPAxis::AxisType>() << QCPAxis::atBottom << QCPAxis::atTop << QCPAxis::atLeft << QCPAxis::atRight;
20678  foreach (QCPAxis::AxisType type, allAxisTypes)
20679  {
20680  if (QCPAxis *senderAxis = qobject_cast<QCPAxis*>(sender()))
20681  if (senderAxis->axisType() == type)
20682  continue;
20683 
20684  if (axis(type)->selectableParts().testFlag(QCPAxis::spAxis))
20685  {
20686  if (selectedParts.testFlag(QCPAxis::spAxis))
20687  axis(type)->setSelectedParts(axis(type)->selectedParts() | QCPAxis::spAxis);
20688  else
20689  axis(type)->setSelectedParts(axis(type)->selectedParts() & ~QCPAxis::spAxis);
20690  }
20691  }
20692 }
20693 
20699 void QCPColorScaleAxisRectPrivate::axisSelectableChanged(QCPAxis::SelectableParts selectableParts)
20700 {
20701  // synchronize axis base selectability:
20702  const QList<QCPAxis::AxisType> allAxisTypes = QList<QCPAxis::AxisType>() << QCPAxis::atBottom << QCPAxis::atTop << QCPAxis::atLeft << QCPAxis::atRight;
20703  foreach (QCPAxis::AxisType type, allAxisTypes)
20704  {
20705  if (QCPAxis *senderAxis = qobject_cast<QCPAxis*>(sender()))
20706  if (senderAxis->axisType() == type)
20707  continue;
20708 
20709  if (axis(type)->selectableParts().testFlag(QCPAxis::spAxis))
20710  {
20711  if (selectableParts.testFlag(QCPAxis::spAxis))
20712  axis(type)->setSelectableParts(axis(type)->selectableParts() | QCPAxis::spAxis);
20713  else
20714  axis(type)->setSelectableParts(axis(type)->selectableParts() & ~QCPAxis::spAxis);
20715  }
20716  }
20717 }
20718 /* end of 'src/layoutelements/layoutelement-colorscale.cpp' */
20719

20879 QCPGraph::QCPGraph(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis) :
20880  QCPAbstractPlottable1D<QCPGraphData>(keyAxis, valueAxis),
20881  mLineStyle{},
20882  mScatterSkip{},
20883  mAdaptiveSampling{}
20884 {
20885  // special handling for QCPGraphs to maintain the simple graph interface:
20886  mParentPlot->registerGraph(this);
20887 
20888  setPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 0));
20889  setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
20890 
20891  setLineStyle(lsLine);
20892  setScatterSkip(0);
20893  setChannelFillGraph(nullptr);
20894  setAdaptiveSampling(true);
20895 }

20898 {

20932 void QCPGraph::setData(const QVector<double> &keys, const QVector<double> &values, bool alreadySorted)
20933 {
20934  mDataContainer->clear();
20935  addData(keys, values, alreadySorted);
20936 }
