25460 
25473 void QCPStatisticalBox::addData(const QVector<double> &keys, const QVector<double> &minimum, const QVector<double> &lowerQuartile, const QVector<double> &median, const QVector<double> &upperQuartile, const QVector<double> &maximum, bool alreadySorted)
25474 {
25475  if (keys.size() != minimum.size() || minimum.size() != lowerQuartile.size() || lowerQuartile.size() != median.size() ||
25476  median.size() != upperQuartile.size() || upperQuartile.size() != maximum.size() || maximum.size() != keys.size())
25477  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "keys, minimum, lowerQuartile, median, upperQuartile, maximum have different sizes:"
25478  << keys.size() << minimum.size() << lowerQuartile.size() << median.size() << upperQuartile.size() << maximum.size();
25479  const int n = qMin(keys.size(), qMin(minimum.size(), qMin(lowerQuartile.size(), qMin(median.size(), qMin(upperQuartile.size(), maximum.size())))));
25480  QVector<QCPStatisticalBoxData> tempData(n);
25481  QVector<QCPStatisticalBoxData>::iterator it = tempData.begin();
25482  const QVector<QCPStatisticalBoxData>::iterator itEnd = tempData.end();
25483  int i = 0;
25484  while (it != itEnd)
25485  {
25486  it->key = keys[i];
25487  it->minimum = minimum[i];
25488  it->lowerQuartile = lowerQuartile[i];
25489  it->median = median[i];
25490  it->upperQuartile = upperQuartile[i];
25491  it->maximum = maximum[i];
25492  ++it;
25493  ++i;
25494  }
25495  mDataContainer->add(tempData, alreadySorted); // don't modify tempData beyond this to prevent copy on write
25496 }
25497 
25506 void QCPStatisticalBox::addData(double key, double minimum, double lowerQuartile, double median, double upperQuartile, double maximum, const QVector<double> &outliers)
25507 {
25508  mDataContainer->add(QCPStatisticalBoxData(key, minimum, lowerQuartile, median, upperQuartile, maximum, outliers));
25509 }
25510 
25514 QCPDataSelection QCPStatisticalBox::selectTestRect(const QRectF &rect, bool onlySelectable) const
25515 {
25516  QCPDataSelection result;
25517  if ((onlySelectable && mSelectable == QCP::stNone) || mDataContainer->isEmpty())
25518  return result;
25519  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis)
25520  return result;
25521 
25522  QCPStatisticalBoxDataContainer::const_iterator visibleBegin, visibleEnd;
25523  getVisibleDataBounds(visibleBegin, visibleEnd);
25524 
25525  for (QCPStatisticalBoxDataContainer::const_iterator it=visibleBegin; it!=visibleEnd; ++it)
25526  {
25527  if (rect.intersects(getQuartileBox(it)))
25528  result.addDataRange(QCPDataRange(int(it-mDataContainer->constBegin()), int(it-mDataContainer->constBegin()+1)), false);
25529  }
25530  result.simplify();
25531  return result;
25532 }
25533 
25542 double QCPStatisticalBox::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
25543 {
25544  Q_UNUSED(details)
25545  if ((onlySelectable && mSelectable == QCP::stNone) || mDataContainer->isEmpty())
25546  return -1;
25547  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis)
25548  return -1;
25549 
25550  if (mKeyAxis->axisRect()->rect().contains(pos.toPoint()) || mParentPlot->interactions().testFlag(QCP::iSelectPlottablesBeyondAxisRect))
25551  {
25552  // get visible data range:
25553  QCPStatisticalBoxDataContainer::const_iterator visibleBegin, visibleEnd;
25554  QCPStatisticalBoxDataContainer::const_iterator closestDataPoint = mDataContainer->constEnd();
25555  getVisibleDataBounds(visibleBegin, visibleEnd);
25556  double minDistSqr = (std::numeric_limits<double>::max)();
25557  for (QCPStatisticalBoxDataContainer::const_iterator it=visibleBegin; it!=visibleEnd; ++it)
25558  {
25559  if (getQuartileBox(it).contains(pos)) // quartile box
25560  {
25561  double currentDistSqr = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99 * mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
25562  if (currentDistSqr < minDistSqr)
25563  {
25564  minDistSqr = currentDistSqr;
25565  closestDataPoint = it;
25566  }
25567  } else // whiskers
25568  {
25569  const QVector<QLineF> whiskerBackbones = getWhiskerBackboneLines(it);
25570  const QCPVector2D posVec(pos);
25571  foreach (const QLineF &backbone, whiskerBackbones)
25572  {
25573  double currentDistSqr = posVec.distanceSquaredToLine(backbone);
25574  if (currentDistSqr < minDistSqr)
25575  {
25576  minDistSqr = currentDistSqr;
25577  closestDataPoint = it;
25578  }
25579  }
25580  }
25581  }
25582  if (details)
25583  {
25584  int pointIndex = int(closestDataPoint-mDataContainer->constBegin());
25585  details->setValue(QCPDataSelection(QCPDataRange(pointIndex, pointIndex+1)));
25586  }
25587  return qSqrt(minDistSqr);
25588  }
25589  return -1;
25590 }
25591 
25592 /* inherits documentation from base class */
25593 QCPRange QCPStatisticalBox::getKeyRange(bool &foundRange, QCP::SignDomain inSignDomain) const
25594 {
25595  QCPRange range = mDataContainer->keyRange(foundRange, inSignDomain);
25596  // determine exact range by including width of bars/flags:
25597  if (foundRange)
25598  {
25599  if (inSignDomain != QCP::sdPositive || range.lower-mWidth*0.5 > 0)
25600  range.lower -= mWidth*0.5;
25601  if (inSignDomain != QCP::sdNegative || range.upper+mWidth*0.5 < 0)
25602  range.upper += mWidth*0.5;
25603  }
25604  return range;
25605 }
25606 
25607 /* inherits documentation from base class */
25608 QCPRange QCPStatisticalBox::getValueRange(bool &foundRange, QCP::SignDomain inSignDomain, const QCPRange &inKeyRange) const
25609 {
25610  return mDataContainer->valueRange(foundRange, inSignDomain, inKeyRange);
25611 }
25612 
25613 /* inherits documentation from base class */
25614 void QCPStatisticalBox::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
25615 {
25616  if (mDataContainer->isEmpty()) return;
25617  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
25618  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
25619  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
25620 
25621  QCPStatisticalBoxDataContainer::const_iterator visibleBegin, visibleEnd;
25622  getVisibleDataBounds(visibleBegin, visibleEnd);
25623 
25624  // loop over and draw segments of unselected/selected data:
25625  QList<QCPDataRange> selectedSegments, unselectedSegments, allSegments;
25626  getDataSegments(selectedSegments, unselectedSegments);
25627  allSegments << unselectedSegments << selectedSegments;
25628  for (int i=0; i<allSegments.size(); ++i)
25629  {
25630  bool isSelectedSegment = i >= unselectedSegments.size();
25631  QCPStatisticalBoxDataContainer::const_iterator begin = visibleBegin;
25632  QCPStatisticalBoxDataContainer::const_iterator end = visibleEnd;
25633  mDataContainer->limitIteratorsToDataRange(begin, end, allSegments.at(i));
25634  if (begin == end)
25635  continue;
25636 
25637  for (QCPStatisticalBoxDataContainer::const_iterator it=begin; it!=end; ++it)
25638  {
25639  // check data validity if flag set:
25640 # ifdef QCUSTOMPLOT_CHECK_DATA
25641  if (QCP::isInvalidData(it->key, it->minimum) ||
25642  QCP::isInvalidData(it->lowerQuartile, it->median) ||
25643  QCP::isInvalidData(it->upperQuartile, it->maximum))
25644  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Data point at" << it->key << "of drawn range has invalid data." << "Plottable name:" << name();
25645  for (int i=0; i<it->outliers.size(); ++i)
25646  if (QCP::isInvalidData(it->outliers.at(i)))
25647  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Data point outlier at" << it->key << "of drawn range invalid." << "Plottable name:" << name();
25648 # endif
25649 
25650  if (isSelectedSegment && mSelectionDecorator)
25651  {
25652  mSelectionDecorator->applyPen(painter);
25653  mSelectionDecorator->applyBrush(painter);
25654  } else
25655  {
25656  painter->setPen(mPen);
25657  painter->setBrush(mBrush);
25658  }
25659  QCPScatterStyle finalOutlierStyle = mOutlierStyle;
25660  if (isSelectedSegment && mSelectionDecorator)
25661  finalOutlierStyle = mSelectionDecorator->getFinalScatterStyle(mOutlierStyle);
25662  drawStatisticalBox(painter, it, finalOutlierStyle);
25663  }
25664  }
25665 
25666  // draw other selection decoration that isn't just line/scatter pens and brushes:
25667  if (mSelectionDecorator)
25668  mSelectionDecorator->drawDecoration(painter, selection());
25669 }
25670 
25671 /* inherits documentation from base class */
25672 void QCPStatisticalBox::drawLegendIcon(QCPPainter *painter, const QRectF &rect) const
25673 {
25674  // draw filled rect:
25675  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
25676  painter->setPen(mPen);
25677  painter->setBrush(mBrush);
25678  QRectF r = QRectF(0, 0, rect.width()*0.67, rect.height()*0.67);
25679  r.moveCenter(rect.center());
25680  painter->drawRect(r);
25681 }
25682 
25691 void QCPStatisticalBox::drawStatisticalBox(QCPPainter *painter, QCPStatisticalBoxDataContainer::const_iterator it, const QCPScatterStyle &outlierStyle) const
25692 {
25693  // draw quartile box:
25694  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
25695  const QRectF quartileBox = getQuartileBox(it);
25696  painter->drawRect(quartileBox);
25697  // draw median line with cliprect set to quartile box:
25698  painter->save();
25699  painter->setClipRect(quartileBox, Qt::IntersectClip);
25700  painter->setPen(mMedianPen);
25701  painter->drawLine(QLineF(coordsToPixels(it->key-mWidth*0.5, it->median), coordsToPixels(it->key+mWidth*0.5, it->median)));
25702  painter->restore();
25703  // draw whisker lines:
25704  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mWhiskerAntialiased, QCP::aePlottables);
25705  painter->setPen(mWhiskerPen);
25706  painter->drawLines(getWhiskerBackboneLines(it));
25707  painter->setPen(mWhiskerBarPen);
25708  painter->drawLines(getWhiskerBarLines(it));
25709  // draw outliers:
25710  applyScattersAntialiasingHint(painter);
25711  outlierStyle.applyTo(painter, mPen);
25712  for (int i=0; i<it->outliers.size(); ++i)
25713  outlierStyle.drawShape(painter, coordsToPixels(it->key, it->outliers.at(i)));
25714 }
25715 
25730 void QCPStatisticalBox::getVisibleDataBounds(QCPStatisticalBoxDataContainer::const_iterator &begin, QCPStatisticalBoxDataContainer::const_iterator &end) const
25731 {
25732  if (!mKeyAxis)
25733  {
25734  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key axis";
25735  begin = mDataContainer->constEnd();
25736  end = mDataContainer->constEnd();
25737  return;
25738  }
25739  begin = mDataContainer->findBegin(mKeyAxis.data()->range().lower-mWidth*0.5); // subtract half width of box to include partially visible data points
25740  end = mDataContainer->findEnd(mKeyAxis.data()->range().upper+mWidth*0.5); // add half width of box to include partially visible data points
25741 }
25742 
25750 QRectF QCPStatisticalBox::getQuartileBox(QCPStatisticalBoxDataContainer::const_iterator it) const
25751 {
25752  QRectF result;
25753  result.setTopLeft(coordsToPixels(it->key-mWidth*0.5, it->upperQuartile));
25754  result.setBottomRight(coordsToPixels(it->key+mWidth*0.5, it->lowerQuartile));
25755  return result;
25756 }
25757 
25766 QVector<QLineF> QCPStatisticalBox::getWhiskerBackboneLines(QCPStatisticalBoxDataContainer::const_iterator it) const
25767 {
25768  QVector<QLineF> result(2);
25769  result[0].setPoints(coordsToPixels(it->key, it->lowerQuartile), coordsToPixels(it->key, it->minimum)); // min backbone
25770  result[1].setPoints(coordsToPixels(it->key, it->upperQuartile), coordsToPixels(it->key, it->maximum)); // max backbone
25771  return result;
25772 }
25773 
25781 QVector<QLineF> QCPStatisticalBox::getWhiskerBarLines(QCPStatisticalBoxDataContainer::const_iterator it) const
25782 {
25783  QVector<QLineF> result(2);
25784  result[0].setPoints(coordsToPixels(it->key-mWhiskerWidth*0.5, it->minimum), coordsToPixels(it->key+mWhiskerWidth*0.5, it->minimum)); // min bar
25785  result[1].setPoints(coordsToPixels(it->key-mWhiskerWidth*0.5, it->maximum), coordsToPixels(it->key+mWhiskerWidth*0.5, it->maximum)); // max bar
25786  return result;
25787 }
25788 /* end of 'src/plottables/plottable-statisticalbox.cpp' */

25840 
25848 QCPColorMapData::QCPColorMapData(int keySize, int valueSize, const QCPRange &keyRange, const QCPRange &valueRange) :
25849  mKeySize(0),
25850  mValueSize(0),
25851  mKeyRange(keyRange),
25852  mValueRange(valueRange),
25853  mIsEmpty(true),
25854  mData(nullptr),
25855  mAlpha(nullptr),
25856  mDataModified(true)
25857 {
25858  setSize(keySize, valueSize);
25859  fill(0);
25860 }
25861 
25862 QCPColorMapData::~QCPColorMapData()
25863 {
25864  delete[] mData;
25865  delete[] mAlpha;
25866 }
25867 
25871 QCPColorMapData::QCPColorMapData(const QCPColorMapData &other) :
25872  mKeySize(0),
25873  mValueSize(0),
25874  mIsEmpty(true),
25875  mData(nullptr),
25876  mAlpha(nullptr),
25877  mDataModified(true)
25878 {
25879  *this = other;
25880 }
25881 
25886 QCPColorMapData &QCPColorMapData::operator=(const QCPColorMapData &other)
25887 {
25888  if (&other != this)
25889  {
25890  const int keySize = other.keySize();
25891  const int valueSize = other.valueSize();
25892  if (!other.mAlpha && mAlpha)
25893  clearAlpha();
25894  setSize(keySize, valueSize);
25895  if (other.mAlpha && !mAlpha)
25896  createAlpha(false);
25897  setRange(other.keyRange(), other.valueRange());
25898  if (!isEmpty())
25899  {
25900  memcpy(mData, other.mData, sizeof(mData[0])*size_t(keySize*valueSize));
25901  if (mAlpha)
25902  memcpy(mAlpha, other.mAlpha, sizeof(mAlpha[0])*size_t(keySize*valueSize));
25903  }
25904  mDataBounds = other.mDataBounds;
25905  mDataModified = true;
25906  }
25907  return *this;
25908 }
25909 
25910 /* undocumented getter */
25911 double QCPColorMapData::data(double key, double value)
25912 {
25913  int keyCell = int( (key-mKeyRange.lower)/(mKeyRange.upper-mKeyRange.lower)*(mKeySize-1)+0.5 );
25914  int valueCell = int( (value-mValueRange.lower)/(mValueRange.upper-mValueRange.lower)*(mValueSize-1)+0.5 );
25915  if (keyCell >= 0 && keyCell < mKeySize && valueCell >= 0 && valueCell < mValueSize)
25916  return mData[valueCell*mKeySize + keyCell];
25917  else
25918  return 0;
25919 }
25920 
25921 /* undocumented getter */
25922 double QCPColorMapData::cell(int keyIndex, int valueIndex)
25923 {
25924  if (keyIndex >= 0 && keyIndex < mKeySize && valueIndex >= 0 && valueIndex < mValueSize)
25925  return mData[valueIndex*mKeySize + keyIndex];
25926  else
25927  return 0;
25928 }
25929 
25938 unsigned char QCPColorMapData::alpha(int keyIndex, int valueIndex)
25939 {
25940  if (mAlpha && keyIndex >= 0 && keyIndex < mKeySize && valueIndex >= 0 && valueIndex < mValueSize)
25941  return mAlpha[valueIndex*mKeySize + keyIndex];
25942  else
25943  return 255;
25944 }
25945 
25958 void QCPColorMapData::setSize(int keySize, int valueSize)
25959 {
25960  if (keySize != mKeySize || valueSize != mValueSize)
25961  {
25962  mKeySize = keySize;
25963  mValueSize = valueSize;
25964  delete[] mData;
25965  mIsEmpty = mKeySize == 0 || mValueSize == 0;
25966  if (!mIsEmpty)
25967  {
25968 #ifdef __EXCEPTIONS
25969  try { // 2D arrays get memory intensive fast. So if the allocation fails, at least output debug message
25970 #endif
25971  mData = new double[size_t(mKeySize*mValueSize)];
25972 #ifdef __EXCEPTIONS
25973  } catch (...) { mData = nullptr; }
25974 #endif
25975  if (mData)
25976  fill(0);
25977  else
25978  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "out of memory for data dimensions "<< mKeySize << "*" << mValueSize;
25979  } else
25980  mData = nullptr;
25981 
25982  if (mAlpha) // if we had an alpha map, recreate it with new size
25983  createAlpha();
25984 
25985  mDataModified = true;
25986  }
25987 }
25988 
25999 void QCPColorMapData::setKeySize(int keySize)
26000 {
26001  setSize(keySize, mValueSize);
26002 }
26003 
26014 void QCPColorMapData::setValueSize(int valueSize)
26015 {
26016  setSize(mKeySize, valueSize);
26017 }
26018 
26029 void QCPColorMapData::setRange(const QCPRange &keyRange, const QCPRange &valueRange)
26030 {
26031  setKeyRange(keyRange);
26032  setValueRange(valueRange);
26033 }
26034 
26045 void QCPColorMapData::setKeyRange(const QCPRange &keyRange)
26046 {
26047  mKeyRange = keyRange;
26048 }
26049 
26060 void QCPColorMapData::setValueRange(const QCPRange &valueRange)
26061 {
26062  mValueRange = valueRange;
26063 }
26064 
26077 void QCPColorMapData::setData(double key, double value, double z)
26078 {
26079  int keyCell = int( (key-mKeyRange.lower)/(mKeyRange.upper-mKeyRange.lower)*(mKeySize-1)+0.5 );
26080  int valueCell = int( (value-mValueRange.lower)/(mValueRange.upper-mValueRange.lower)*(mValueSize-1)+0.5 );
26081  if (keyCell >= 0 && keyCell < mKeySize && valueCell >= 0 && valueCell < mValueSize)
26082  {
26083  mData[valueCell*mKeySize + keyCell] = z;
26084  if (z < mDataBounds.lower)
26085  mDataBounds.lower = z;
26086  if (z > mDataBounds.upper)
26087  mDataBounds.upper = z;
26088  mDataModified = true;
26089  }
26090 }
26091 
26103 void QCPColorMapData::setCell(int keyIndex, int valueIndex, double z)
26104 {
26105  if (keyIndex >= 0 && keyIndex < mKeySize && valueIndex >= 0 && valueIndex < mValueSize)
26106  {
26107  mData[valueIndex*mKeySize + keyIndex] = z;
26108  if (z < mDataBounds.lower)
26109  mDataBounds.lower = z;
26110  if (z > mDataBounds.upper)
26111  mDataBounds.upper = z;
26112  mDataModified = true;
26113  } else
26114  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << keyIndex << valueIndex;
26115 }
26116 
26132 void QCPColorMapData::setAlpha(int keyIndex, int valueIndex, unsigned char alpha)
26133 {
26134  if (keyIndex >= 0 && keyIndex < mKeySize && valueIndex >= 0 && valueIndex < mValueSize)
26135  {
26136  if (mAlpha || createAlpha())
26137  {
26138  mAlpha[valueIndex*mKeySize + keyIndex] = alpha;
26139  mDataModified = true;
26140  }
26141  } else
26142  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << keyIndex << valueIndex;
26143 }
26144 
26158 void QCPColorMapData::recalculateDataBounds()
26159 {
26160  if (mKeySize > 0 && mValueSize > 0)
26161  {
26162  double minHeight = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
26163  double maxHeight = -std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
26164  const int dataCount = mValueSize*mKeySize;
26165  for (int i=0; i<dataCount; ++i)
26166  {
26167  if (mData[i] > maxHeight)
26168  maxHeight = mData[i];
26169  if (mData[i] < minHeight)
26170  minHeight = mData[i];
26171  }
26172  mDataBounds.lower = minHeight;
26173  mDataBounds.upper = maxHeight;
26174  }
26175 }
26176 
26182 void QCPColorMapData::clear()
26183 {
26184  setSize(0, 0);
26185 }
26186 
26190 void QCPColorMapData::clearAlpha()
26191 {
26192  if (mAlpha)
26193  {
26194  delete[] mAlpha;
26195  mAlpha = nullptr;
26196  mDataModified = true;
26197  }
26198 }
26199 
26203 void QCPColorMapData::fill(double z)
26204 {
26205  const int dataCount = mValueSize*mKeySize;
26206  memset(mData, z, dataCount*sizeof(*mData));
26207  mDataBounds = QCPRange(z, z);
26208  mDataModified = true;
26209 }
26210 
26220 void QCPColorMapData::fillAlpha(unsigned char alpha)
26221 {
26222  if (mAlpha || createAlpha(false))
26223  {
26224  const int dataCount = mValueSize*mKeySize;
26225  memset(mAlpha, alpha, dataCount*sizeof(*mAlpha));
26226  mDataModified = true;
26227  }
26228 }
26229 
26247 void QCPColorMapData::coordToCell(double key, double value, int *keyIndex, int *valueIndex) const
26248 {
26249  if (keyIndex)
26250  *keyIndex = int( (key-mKeyRange.lower)/(mKeyRange.upper-mKeyRange.lower)*(mKeySize-1)+0.5 );
26251  if (valueIndex)
26252  *valueIndex = int( (value-mValueRange.lower)/(mValueRange.upper-mValueRange.lower)*(mValueSize-1)+0.5 );
26253 }
26254 
26270 void QCPColorMapData::cellToCoord(int keyIndex, int valueIndex, double *key, double *value) const
26271 {
26272  if (key)
26273  *key = keyIndex/double(mKeySize-1)*(mKeyRange.upper-mKeyRange.lower)+mKeyRange.lower;
26274  if (value)
26275  *value = valueIndex/double(mValueSize-1)*(mValueRange.upper-mValueRange.lower)+mValueRange.lower;
26276 }
26277 
26291 bool QCPColorMapData::createAlpha(bool initializeOpaque)
26292 {
26293  clearAlpha();
26294  if (isEmpty())
26295  return false;
26296 
26297 #ifdef __EXCEPTIONS
26298  try { // 2D arrays get memory intensive fast. So if the allocation fails, at least output debug message
26299 #endif
26300  mAlpha = new unsigned char[size_t(mKeySize*mValueSize)];
26301 #ifdef __EXCEPTIONS
26302  } catch (...) { mAlpha = nullptr; }
26303 #endif
26304  if (mAlpha)
26305  {
26306  if (initializeOpaque)
26307  fillAlpha(255);
26308  return true;
26309  } else
26310  {
26311  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "out of memory for data dimensions "<< mKeySize << "*" << mValueSize;
26312  return false;
26313  }
26314 }
26315 
26316 
26320 
26397 /* start documentation of inline functions */
26398 
26407 /* end documentation of inline functions */
26408 
26409 /* start documentation of signals */
26410 
26432 /* end documentation of signals */
26433 
26441 QCPColorMap::QCPColorMap(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis) :
26442  QCPAbstractPlottable(keyAxis, valueAxis),
26443  mDataScaleType(QCPAxis::stLinear),
26444  mMapData(new QCPColorMapData(10, 10, QCPRange(0, 5), QCPRange(0, 5))),
26445  mGradient(QCPColorGradient::gpCold),
26446  mInterpolate(true),
26447  mTightBoundary(false),
26448  mMapImageInvalidated(true)
26449 {
26450 }
26451 
26452 QCPColorMap::~QCPColorMap()
26453 {
26454  delete mMapData;
26455 }
26456 
26464 void QCPColorMap::setData(QCPColorMapData *data, bool copy)
26465 {
26466  if (mMapData == data)
26467  {
26468  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "The data pointer is already in (and owned by) this plottable" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(data);
26469  return;
26470  }
26471  if (copy)
26472  {
26473  *mMapData = *data;
26474  } else
26475  {
26476  delete mMapData;
26477  mMapData = data;
26478  }
26479  mMapImageInvalidated = true;
26480 }
26481 
26490 void QCPColorMap::setDataRange(const QCPRange &dataRange)
26491 {
26492  if (!QCPRange::validRange(dataRange)) return;
26493  if (mDataRange.lower != dataRange.lower || mDataRange.upper != dataRange.upper)
26494  {
26495  if (mDataScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
26496  mDataRange = dataRange.sanitizedForLogScale();
26497  else
26498  mDataRange = dataRange.sanitizedForLinScale();
26499  mMapImageInvalidated = true;
26500  emit dataRangeChanged(mDataRange);
26501  }
26502 }
26503 
26509 void QCPColorMap::setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType scaleType)
26510 {
26511  if (mDataScaleType != scaleType)
26512  {
26513  mDataScaleType = scaleType;
26514  mMapImageInvalidated = true;
26515  emit dataScaleTypeChanged(mDataScaleType);
26516  if (mDataScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
26517  setDataRange(mDataRange.sanitizedForLogScale());
26518  }
26519 }
26520 
26532 void QCPColorMap::setGradient(const QCPColorGradient &gradient)
26533 {
26534  if (mGradient != gradient)
26535  {
26536  mGradient = gradient;
26537  mMapImageInvalidated = true;
26538  emit gradientChanged(mGradient);
26539  }
26540 }
26541 
26548 void QCPColorMap::setInterpolate(bool enabled)
26549 {
26550  mInterpolate = enabled;
26551  mMapImageInvalidated = true; // because oversampling factors might need to change
26552 }
26553 
26565 void QCPColorMap::setTightBoundary(bool enabled)
26566 {
26567  mTightBoundary = enabled;
26568 }
26569 
26584 void QCPColorMap::setColorScale(QCPColorScale *colorScale)
26585 {
26586  if (mColorScale) // unconnect signals from old color scale
26587  {
26588  disconnect(this, SIGNAL(dataRangeChanged(QCPRange)), mColorScale.data(), SLOT(setDataRange(QCPRange)));
26589  disconnect(this, SIGNAL(dataScaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), mColorScale.data(), SLOT(setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
26590  disconnect(this, SIGNAL(gradientChanged(QCPColorGradient)), mColorScale.data(), SLOT(setGradient(QCPColorGradient)));
26591  disconnect(mColorScale.data(), SIGNAL(dataRangeChanged(QCPRange)), this, SLOT(setDataRange(QCPRange)));
26592  disconnect(mColorScale.data(), SIGNAL(gradientChanged(QCPColorGradient)), this, SLOT(setGradient(QCPColorGradient)));
26593  disconnect(mColorScale.data(), SIGNAL(dataScaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), this, SLOT(setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
26594  }
26595  mColorScale = colorScale;
26596  if (mColorScale) // connect signals to new color scale
26597  {
26598  setGradient(mColorScale.data()->gradient());
26599  setDataRange(mColorScale.data()->dataRange());
26600  setDataScaleType(mColorScale.data()->dataScaleType());
26601  connect(this, SIGNAL(dataRangeChanged(QCPRange)), mColorScale.data(), SLOT(setDataRange(QCPRange)));
26602  connect(this, SIGNAL(dataScaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), mColorScale.data(), SLOT(setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
26603  connect(this, SIGNAL(gradientChanged(QCPColorGradient)), mColorScale.data(), SLOT(setGradient(QCPColorGradient)));
26604  connect(mColorScale.data(), SIGNAL(dataRangeChanged(QCPRange)), this, SLOT(setDataRange(QCPRange)));
26605  connect(mColorScale.data(), SIGNAL(gradientChanged(QCPColorGradient)), this, SLOT(setGradient(QCPColorGradient)));
26606  connect(mColorScale.data(), SIGNAL(dataScaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), this, SLOT(setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
26607  }
26608 }
26609 
26630 void QCPColorMap::rescaleDataRange(bool recalculateDataBounds)
26631 {
26632  if (recalculateDataBounds)
26633  mMapData->recalculateDataBounds();
26634  setDataRange(mMapData->dataBounds());
26635 }
26636 
26651 void QCPColorMap::updateLegendIcon(Qt::TransformationMode transformMode, const QSize &thumbSize)
26652 {
26653  if (mMapImage.isNull() && !data()->isEmpty())
26654  updateMapImage(); // try to update map image if it's null (happens if no draw has happened yet)
26655 
26656  if (!mMapImage.isNull()) // might still be null, e.g. if data is empty, so check here again
26657  {
26658  bool mirrorX = (keyAxis()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal ? keyAxis() : valueAxis())->rangeReversed();
26659  bool mirrorY = (valueAxis()->orientation() == Qt::Vertical ? valueAxis() : keyAxis())->rangeReversed();
26660  mLegendIcon = QPixmap::fromImage(mMapImage.mirrored(mirrorX, mirrorY)).scaled(thumbSize, Qt::KeepAspectRatio, transformMode);
26661  }
26662 }
26663 
26664 /* inherits documentation from base class */
26665 double QCPColorMap::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
26666 {
26667  Q_UNUSED(details)
26668  if ((onlySelectable && mSelectable == QCP::stNone) || mMapData->isEmpty())
26669  return -1;
26670  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis)
26671  return -1;
26672 
26673  if (mKeyAxis.data()->axisRect()->rect().contains(pos.toPoint()) || mParentPlot->interactions().testFlag(QCP::iSelectPlottablesBeyondAxisRect))
26674  {
26675  double posKey, posValue;
26676  pixelsToCoords(pos, posKey, posValue);
26677  if (mMapData->keyRange().contains(posKey) && mMapData->valueRange().contains(posValue))
26678  {
26679  if (details)
26680  details->setValue(QCPDataSelection(QCPDataRange(0, 1))); // temporary solution, to facilitate whole-plottable selection. Replace in future version with segmented 2D selection.
26681  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
26682  }
26683  }
26684  return -1;
26685 }
26686 
26687 /* inherits documentation from base class */
26688 QCPRange QCPColorMap::getKeyRange(bool &foundRange, QCP::SignDomain inSignDomain) const
26689 {
26690  foundRange = true;
26691  QCPRange result = mMapData->keyRange();
26692  result.normalize();
26693  if (inSignDomain == QCP::sdPositive)
26694  {
26695  if (result.lower <= 0 && result.upper > 0)
26696  result.lower = result.upper*1e-3;
26697  else if (result.lower <= 0 && result.upper <= 0)
26698  foundRange = false;
26699  } else if (inSignDomain == QCP::sdNegative)
26700  {
26701  if (result.upper >= 0 && result.lower < 0)
26702  result.upper = result.lower*1e-3;
26703  else if (result.upper >= 0 && result.lower >= 0)
26704  foundRange = false;
26705  }
26706  return result;
26707 }
26708 
26709 /* inherits documentation from base class */
26710 QCPRange QCPColorMap::getValueRange(bool &foundRange, QCP::SignDomain inSignDomain, const QCPRange &inKeyRange) const
26711 {
26712  if (inKeyRange != QCPRange())
26713  {
26714  if (mMapData->keyRange().upper < inKeyRange.lower || mMapData->keyRange().lower > inKeyRange.upper)
26715  {
26716  foundRange = false;
26717  return {};
26718  }
26719  }
26720 
26721  foundRange = true;
26722  QCPRange result = mMapData->valueRange();
26723  result.normalize();
26724  if (inSignDomain == QCP::sdPositive)
26725  {
26726  if (result.lower <= 0 && result.upper > 0)
26727  result.lower = result.upper*1e-3;
26728  else if (result.lower <= 0 && result.upper <= 0)
26729  foundRange = false;
26730  } else if (inSignDomain == QCP::sdNegative)
26731  {
26732  if (result.upper >= 0 && result.lower < 0)
26733  result.upper = result.lower*1e-3;
26734  else if (result.upper >= 0 && result.lower >= 0)
26735  foundRange = false;
26736  }
26737  return result;
26738 }
26739 
26754 void QCPColorMap::updateMapImage()
26755 {
26756  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
26757  if (!keyAxis) return;
26758  if (mMapData->isEmpty()) return;
26759 
26760  const QImage::Format format = QImage::Format_ARGB32_Premultiplied;
26761  const int keySize = mMapData->keySize();
26762  const int valueSize = mMapData->valueSize();
26763  int keyOversamplingFactor = mInterpolate ? 1 : int(1.0+100.0/double(keySize)); // make mMapImage have at least size 100, factor becomes 1 if size > 200 or interpolation is on
26764  int valueOversamplingFactor = mInterpolate ? 1 : int(1.0+100.0/double(valueSize)); // make mMapImage have at least size 100, factor becomes 1 if size > 200 or interpolation is on
26765 
26766  // resize mMapImage to correct dimensions including possible oversampling factors, according to key/value axes orientation:
26767  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal && (mMapImage.width() != keySize*keyOversamplingFactor || mMapImage.height() != valueSize*valueOversamplingFactor))
26768  mMapImage = QImage(QSize(keySize*keyOversamplingFactor, valueSize*valueOversamplingFactor), format);
26769  else if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical && (mMapImage.width() != valueSize*valueOversamplingFactor || mMapImage.height() != keySize*keyOversamplingFactor))
26770  mMapImage = QImage(QSize(valueSize*valueOversamplingFactor, keySize*keyOversamplingFactor), format);
26771 
26772  if (mMapImage.isNull())
26773  {
26774  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Couldn't create map image (possibly too large for memory)";
26775  mMapImage = QImage(QSize(10, 10), format);
26776  mMapImage.fill(Qt::black);
26777  } else
26778  {
26779  QImage *localMapImage = &mMapImage; // this is the image on which the colorization operates. Either the final mMapImage, or if we need oversampling, mUndersampledMapImage
26780  if (keyOversamplingFactor > 1 || valueOversamplingFactor > 1)
26781  {
26782  // resize undersampled map image to actual key/value cell sizes:
26783  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal && (mUndersampledMapImage.width() != keySize || mUndersampledMapImage.height() != valueSize))
26784  mUndersampledMapImage = QImage(QSize(keySize, valueSize), format);
26785  else if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical && (mUndersampledMapImage.width() != valueSize || mUndersampledMapImage.height() != keySize))
26786  mUndersampledMapImage = QImage(QSize(valueSize, keySize), format);
26787  localMapImage = &mUndersampledMapImage; // make the colorization run on the undersampled image
26788  } else if (!mUndersampledMapImage.isNull())
26789  mUndersampledMapImage = QImage(); // don't need oversampling mechanism anymore (map size has changed) but mUndersampledMapImage still has nonzero size, free it
26790 
26791  const double *rawData = mMapData->mData;
26792  const unsigned char *rawAlpha = mMapData->mAlpha;
26793  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
26794  {
26795  const int lineCount = valueSize;
26796  const int rowCount = keySize;
26797  for (int line=0; line<lineCount; ++line)
26798  {
26799  QRgb* pixels = reinterpret_cast<QRgb*>(localMapImage->scanLine(lineCount-1-line)); // invert scanline index because QImage counts scanlines from top, but our vertical index counts from bottom (mathematical coordinate system)
26800  if (rawAlpha)
26801  mGradient.colorize(rawData+line*rowCount, rawAlpha+line*rowCount, mDataRange, pixels, rowCount, 1, mDataScaleType==QCPAxis::stLogarithmic);
26802  else
26803  mGradient.colorize(rawData+line*rowCount, mDataRange, pixels, rowCount, 1, mDataScaleType==QCPAxis::stLogarithmic);
26804  }
26805  } else // keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical
26806  {
26807  const int lineCount = keySize;
26808  const int rowCount = valueSize;
26809  for (int line=0; line<lineCount; ++line)
26810  {
26811  QRgb* pixels = reinterpret_cast<QRgb*>(localMapImage->scanLine(lineCount-1-line)); // invert scanline index because QImage counts scanlines from top, but our vertical index counts from bottom (mathematical coordinate system)
26812  if (rawAlpha)
26813  mGradient.colorize(rawData+line, rawAlpha+line, mDataRange, pixels, rowCount, lineCount, mDataScaleType==QCPAxis::stLogarithmic);
26814  else
26815  mGradient.colorize(rawData+line, mDataRange, pixels, rowCount, lineCount, mDataScaleType==QCPAxis::stLogarithmic);
26816  }
26817  }
26818 
26819  if (keyOversamplingFactor > 1 || valueOversamplingFactor > 1)
26820  {
26821  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
26822  mMapImage = mUndersampledMapImage.scaled(keySize*keyOversamplingFactor, valueSize*valueOversamplingFactor, Qt::IgnoreAspectRatio, Qt::FastTransformation);
26823  else
26824  mMapImage = mUndersampledMapImage.scaled(valueSize*valueOversamplingFactor, keySize*keyOversamplingFactor, Qt::IgnoreAspectRatio, Qt::FastTransformation);
26825  }
26826  }
26827  mMapData->mDataModified = false;
26828  mMapImageInvalidated = false;
26829 }
26830 
26831 /* inherits documentation from base class */
26832 void QCPColorMap::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
26833 {
26834  if (mMapData->isEmpty()) return;
26835  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis) return;
26836  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
26837 
26838  if (mMapData->mDataModified || mMapImageInvalidated)
26839  updateMapImage();
26840 
26841  // use buffer if painting vectorized (PDF):
26842  const bool useBuffer = painter->modes().testFlag(QCPPainter::pmVectorized);
26843  QCPPainter *localPainter = painter; // will be redirected to paint on mapBuffer if painting vectorized
26844  QRectF mapBufferTarget; // the rect in absolute widget coordinates where the visible map portion/buffer will end up in
26845  QPixmap mapBuffer;
26846  if (useBuffer)
26847  {
26848  const double mapBufferPixelRatio = 3; // factor by which DPI is increased in embedded bitmaps
26849  mapBufferTarget = painter->clipRegion().boundingRect();
26850  mapBuffer = QPixmap((mapBufferTarget.size()*mapBufferPixelRatio).toSize());
26851  mapBuffer.fill(Qt::transparent);
26852  localPainter = new QCPPainter(&mapBuffer);
26853  localPainter->scale(mapBufferPixelRatio, mapBufferPixelRatio);
26854  localPainter->translate(-mapBufferTarget.topLeft());
26855  }
26856 
26857  QRectF imageRect = QRectF(coordsToPixels(mMapData->keyRange().lower, mMapData->valueRange().lower),
26858  coordsToPixels(mMapData->keyRange().upper, mMapData->valueRange().upper)).normalized();
26859  // extend imageRect to contain outer halves/quarters of bordering/cornering pixels (cells are centered on map range boundary):
26860  double halfCellWidth = 0; // in pixels
26861  double halfCellHeight = 0; // in pixels
26862  if (keyAxis()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
26863  {
26864  if (mMapData->keySize() > 1)
26865  halfCellWidth = 0.5*imageRect.width()/double(mMapData->keySize()-1);
26866  if (mMapData->valueSize() > 1)
26867  halfCellHeight = 0.5*imageRect.height()/double(mMapData->valueSize()-1);
26868  } else // keyAxis orientation is Qt::Vertical
26869  {
26870  if (mMapData->keySize() > 1)
26871  halfCellHeight = 0.5*imageRect.height()/double(mMapData->keySize()-1);
26872  if (mMapData->valueSize() > 1)
26873  halfCellWidth = 0.5*imageRect.width()/double(mMapData->valueSize()-1);
26874  }
26875  imageRect.adjust(-halfCellWidth, -halfCellHeight, halfCellWidth, halfCellHeight);
26876  const bool mirrorX = (keyAxis()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal ? keyAxis() : valueAxis())->rangeReversed();
26877  const bool mirrorY = (valueAxis()->orientation() == Qt::Vertical ? valueAxis() : keyAxis())->rangeReversed();
26878  const bool smoothBackup = localPainter->renderHints().testFlag(QPainter::SmoothPixmapTransform);
26879  localPainter->setRenderHint(QPainter::SmoothPixmapTransform, mInterpolate);
26880  QRegion clipBackup;
26881  if (mTightBoundary)
26882  {
26883  clipBackup = localPainter->clipRegion();
26884  QRectF tightClipRect = QRectF(coordsToPixels(mMapData->keyRange().lower, mMapData->valueRange().lower),
26885  coordsToPixels(mMapData->keyRange().upper, mMapData->valueRange().upper)).normalized();
26886  localPainter->setClipRect(tightClipRect, Qt::IntersectClip);
26887  }
26888  localPainter->drawImage(imageRect, mMapImage.mirrored(mirrorX, mirrorY));
26889  if (mTightBoundary)
26890  localPainter->setClipRegion(clipBackup);
26891  localPainter->setRenderHint(QPainter::SmoothPixmapTransform, smoothBackup);
26892 
26893  if (useBuffer) // localPainter painted to mapBuffer, so now draw buffer with original painter
26894  {
26895  delete localPainter;
26896  painter->drawPixmap(mapBufferTarget.toRect(), mapBuffer);
26897  }
26898 }
26899 
26900 /* inherits documentation from base class */
26901 void QCPColorMap::drawLegendIcon(QCPPainter *painter, const QRectF &rect) const
26902 {
26903  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
26904  // draw map thumbnail:
26905  if (!mLegendIcon.isNull())
26906  {
26907  QPixmap scaledIcon = mLegendIcon.scaled(rect.size().toSize(), Qt::KeepAspectRatio, Qt::FastTransformation);
26908  QRectF iconRect = QRectF(0, 0, scaledIcon.width(), scaledIcon.height());
26909  iconRect.moveCenter(rect.center());
26910  painter->drawPixmap(iconRect.topLeft(), scaledIcon);
26911  }
26912  /*
26913  // draw frame:
26914  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
26915  painter->setPen(Qt::black);
26916  painter->drawRect(rect.adjusted(1, 1, 0, 0));
26917  */
26918 }

27098 QCPFinancial::QCPFinancial(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis) :
27099  QCPAbstractPlottable1D<QCPFinancialData>(keyAxis, valueAxis),
27100  mChartStyle(csCandlestick),
27101  mWidth(0.5),
27102  mWidthType(wtPlotCoords),
27103  mTwoColored(true),
27104  mBrushPositive(QBrush(QColor(50, 160, 0))),
27105  mBrushNegative(QBrush(QColor(180, 0, 15))),
27106  mPenPositive(QPen(QColor(40, 150, 0))),
27107  mPenNegative(QPen(QColor(170, 5, 5)))
27108 {
27109  mSelectionDecorator->setBrush(QBrush(QColor(160, 160, 255)));
27110 }

27147 void QCPFinancial::setData(const QVector<double> &keys, const QVector<double> &open, const QVector<double> &high, const QVector<double> &low, const QVector<double> &close, bool alreadySorted)

27150  addData(keys, open, high, low, close, alreadySorted);

27253 
27268 void QCPFinancial::addData(const QVector<double> &keys, const QVector<double> &open, const QVector<double> &high, const QVector<double> &low, const QVector<double> &close, bool alreadySorted)
27269 {
27270  if (keys.size() != open.size() || open.size() != high.size() || high.size() != low.size() || low.size() != close.size() || close.size() != keys.size())
27271  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "keys, open, high, low, close have different sizes:" << keys.size() << open.size() << high.size() << low.size() << close.size();
27272  const int n = qMin(keys.size(), qMin(open.size(), qMin(high.size(), qMin(low.size(), close.size()))));
27273  QVector<QCPFinancialData> tempData(n);
27274  QVector<QCPFinancialData>::iterator it = tempData.begin();
27275  const QVector<QCPFinancialData>::iterator itEnd = tempData.end();
27276  int i = 0;
27277  while (it != itEnd)
27278  {
27279  it->key = keys[i];
27280  it->open = open[i];
27281  it->high = high[i];
27282  it->low = low[i];
27283  it->close = close[i];
27284  ++it;
27285  ++i;
27286  }
27287  mDataContainer->add(tempData, alreadySorted); // don't modify tempData beyond this to prevent copy on write
27288 }
27289 
27300 void QCPFinancial::addData(double key, double open, double high, double low, double close)
27301 {
27302  mDataContainer->add(QCPFinancialData(key, open, high, low, close));
27303 }
27304 
27308 QCPDataSelection QCPFinancial::selectTestRect(const QRectF &rect, bool onlySelectable) const
27309 {
27310  QCPDataSelection result;
27311  if ((onlySelectable && mSelectable == QCP::stNone) || mDataContainer->isEmpty())
27312  return result;
27313  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis)
27314  return result;
27315 
27316  QCPFinancialDataContainer::const_iterator visibleBegin, visibleEnd;
27317  getVisibleDataBounds(visibleBegin, visibleEnd);
27318 
27319  for (QCPFinancialDataContainer::const_iterator it=visibleBegin; it!=visibleEnd; ++it)
27320  {
27321  if (rect.intersects(selectionHitBox(it)))
27322  result.addDataRange(QCPDataRange(int(it-mDataContainer->constBegin()), int(it-mDataContainer->constBegin()+1)), false);
27323  }
27324  result.simplify();
27325  return result;
27326 }
27327 
27336 double QCPFinancial::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
27337 {
27338  Q_UNUSED(details)
27339  if ((onlySelectable && mSelectable == QCP::stNone) || mDataContainer->isEmpty())
27340  return -1;
27341  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis)
27342  return -1;
27343 
27344  if (mKeyAxis.data()->axisRect()->rect().contains(pos.toPoint()) || mParentPlot->interactions().testFlag(QCP::iSelectPlottablesBeyondAxisRect))
27345  {
27346  // get visible data range:
27347  QCPFinancialDataContainer::const_iterator visibleBegin, visibleEnd;
27348  QCPFinancialDataContainer::const_iterator closestDataPoint = mDataContainer->constEnd();
27349  getVisibleDataBounds(visibleBegin, visibleEnd);
27350  // perform select test according to configured style:
27351  double result = -1;
27352  switch (mChartStyle)
27353  {
27354  case QCPFinancial::csOhlc:
27355  result = ohlcSelectTest(pos, visibleBegin, visibleEnd, closestDataPoint); break;
27356  case QCPFinancial::csCandlestick:
27357  result = candlestickSelectTest(pos, visibleBegin, visibleEnd, closestDataPoint); break;
27358  }
27359  if (details)
27360  {
27361  int pointIndex = int(closestDataPoint-mDataContainer->constBegin());
27362  details->setValue(QCPDataSelection(QCPDataRange(pointIndex, pointIndex+1)));
27363  }
27364  return result;
27365  }
27366 
27367  return -1;
27368 }
27369 
27370 /* inherits documentation from base class */
27371 QCPRange QCPFinancial::getKeyRange(bool &foundRange, QCP::SignDomain inSignDomain) const
27372 {
27373  QCPRange range = mDataContainer->keyRange(foundRange, inSignDomain);
27374  // determine exact range by including width of bars/flags:
27375  if (foundRange)
27376  {
27377  if (inSignDomain != QCP::sdPositive || range.lower-mWidth*0.5 > 0)
27378  range.lower -= mWidth*0.5;
27379  if (inSignDomain != QCP::sdNegative || range.upper+mWidth*0.5 < 0)
27380  range.upper += mWidth*0.5;
27381  }
27382  return range;
27383 }
27384 
27385 /* inherits documentation from base class */
27386 QCPRange QCPFinancial::getValueRange(bool &foundRange, QCP::SignDomain inSignDomain, const QCPRange &inKeyRange) const
27387 {
27388  return mDataContainer->valueRange(foundRange, inSignDomain, inKeyRange);
27389 }
27390 
27405 QCPFinancialDataContainer QCPFinancial::timeSeriesToOhlc(const QVector<double> &time, const QVector<double> &value, double timeBinSize, double timeBinOffset)
27406 {
27407  QCPFinancialDataContainer data;
27408  int count = qMin(time.size(), value.size());
27409  if (count == 0)
27410  return QCPFinancialDataContainer();
27411 
27412  QCPFinancialData currentBinData(0, value.first(), value.first(), value.first(), value.first());
27413  int currentBinIndex = qFloor((time.first()-timeBinOffset)/timeBinSize+0.5);
27414  for (int i=0; i<count; ++i)
27415  {
27416  int index = qFloor((time.at(i)-timeBinOffset)/timeBinSize+0.5);
27417  if (currentBinIndex == index) // data point still in current bin, extend high/low:
27418  {
27419  if (value.at(i) < currentBinData.low) currentBinData.low = value.at(i);
27420  if (value.at(i) > currentBinData.high) currentBinData.high = value.at(i);
27421  if (i == count-1) // last data point is in current bin, finalize bin:
27422  {
27423  currentBinData.close = value.at(i);
27424  currentBinData.key = timeBinOffset+(index)*timeBinSize;
27425  data.add(currentBinData);
27426  }
27427  } else // data point not anymore in current bin, set close of old and open of new bin, and add old to map:
27428  {
27429  // finalize current bin:
27430  currentBinData.close = value.at(i-1);
27431  currentBinData.key = timeBinOffset+(index-1)*timeBinSize;
27432  data.add(currentBinData);
27433  // start next bin:
27434  currentBinIndex = index;
27435  currentBinData.open = value.at(i);
27436  currentBinData.high = value.at(i);
27437  currentBinData.low = value.at(i);
27438  }
27439  }
27440 
27441  return data;
27442 }
27443 
27444 /* inherits documentation from base class */
27445 void QCPFinancial::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
27446 {
27447  // get visible data range:
27448  QCPFinancialDataContainer::const_iterator visibleBegin, visibleEnd;
27449  getVisibleDataBounds(visibleBegin, visibleEnd);
27450 
27451  // loop over and draw segments of unselected/selected data:
27452  QList<QCPDataRange> selectedSegments, unselectedSegments, allSegments;
27453  getDataSegments(selectedSegments, unselectedSegments);
27454  allSegments << unselectedSegments << selectedSegments;
27455  for (int i=0; i<allSegments.size(); ++i)
27456  {
27457  bool isSelectedSegment = i >= unselectedSegments.size();
27458  QCPFinancialDataContainer::const_iterator begin = visibleBegin;
27459  QCPFinancialDataContainer::const_iterator end = visibleEnd;
27460  mDataContainer->limitIteratorsToDataRange(begin, end, allSegments.at(i));
27461  if (begin == end)
27462  continue;
27463 
27464  // draw data segment according to configured style:
27465  switch (mChartStyle)
27466  {
27467  case QCPFinancial::csOhlc:
27468  drawOhlcPlot(painter, begin, end, isSelectedSegment); break;
27469  case QCPFinancial::csCandlestick:
27470  drawCandlestickPlot(painter, begin, end, isSelectedSegment); break;
27471  }
27472  }
27473 
27474  // draw other selection decoration that isn't just line/scatter pens and brushes:
27475  if (mSelectionDecorator)
27476  mSelectionDecorator->drawDecoration(painter, selection());
27477 }
27478 
27479 /* inherits documentation from base class */
27480 void QCPFinancial::drawLegendIcon(QCPPainter *painter, const QRectF &rect) const
27481 {
27482  painter->setAntialiasing(false); // legend icon especially of csCandlestick looks better without antialiasing
27483  if (mChartStyle == csOhlc)
27484  {
27485  if (mTwoColored)
27486  {
27487  // draw upper left half icon with positive color:
27488  painter->setBrush(mBrushPositive);
27489  painter->setPen(mPenPositive);
27490  painter->setClipRegion(QRegion(QPolygon() << rect.bottomLeft().toPoint() << rect.topRight().toPoint() << rect.topLeft().toPoint()));
27491  painter->drawLine(QLineF(0, rect.height()*0.5, rect.width(), rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
27492  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.width()*0.2, rect.height()*0.3, rect.width()*0.2, rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
27493  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.width()*0.8, rect.height()*0.5, rect.width()*0.8, rect.height()*0.7).translated(rect.topLeft()));
27494  // draw bottom right half icon with negative color:
27495  painter->setBrush(mBrushNegative);
27496  painter->setPen(mPenNegative);
27497  painter->setClipRegion(QRegion(QPolygon() << rect.bottomLeft().toPoint() << rect.topRight().toPoint() << rect.bottomRight().toPoint()));
27498  painter->drawLine(QLineF(0, rect.height()*0.5, rect.width(), rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
27499  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.width()*0.2, rect.height()*0.3, rect.width()*0.2, rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
27500  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.width()*0.8, rect.height()*0.5, rect.width()*0.8, rect.height()*0.7).translated(rect.topLeft()));
27501  } else
27502  {
27503  painter->setBrush(mBrush);
27504  painter->setPen(mPen);
27505  painter->drawLine(QLineF(0, rect.height()*0.5, rect.width(), rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
27506  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.width()*0.2, rect.height()*0.3, rect.width()*0.2, rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
27507  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.width()*0.8, rect.height()*0.5, rect.width()*0.8, rect.height()*0.7).translated(rect.topLeft()));
27508  }
27509  } else if (mChartStyle == csCandlestick)
27510  {
27511  if (mTwoColored)
27512  {
27513  // draw upper left half icon with positive color:
27514  painter->setBrush(mBrushPositive);
27515  painter->setPen(mPenPositive);
27516  painter->setClipRegion(QRegion(QPolygon() << rect.bottomLeft().toPoint() << rect.topRight().toPoint() << rect.topLeft().toPoint()));
27517  painter->drawLine(QLineF(0, rect.height()*0.5, rect.width()*0.25, rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
27518  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.width()*0.75, rect.height()*0.5, rect.width(), rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
27519  painter->drawRect(QRectF(rect.width()*0.25, rect.height()*0.25, rect.width()*0.5, rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
27520  // draw bottom right half icon with negative color:
27521  painter->setBrush(mBrushNegative);
27522  painter->setPen(mPenNegative);
27523  painter->setClipRegion(QRegion(QPolygon() << rect.bottomLeft().toPoint() << rect.topRight().toPoint() << rect.bottomRight().toPoint()));
27524  painter->drawLine(QLineF(0, rect.height()*0.5, rect.width()*0.25, rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
27525  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.width()*0.75, rect.height()*0.5, rect.width(), rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
27526  painter->drawRect(QRectF(rect.width()*0.25, rect.height()*0.25, rect.width()*0.5, rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
27527  } else
27528  {
27529  painter->setBrush(mBrush);
27530  painter->setPen(mPen);
27531  painter->drawLine(QLineF(0, rect.height()*0.5, rect.width()*0.25, rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
27532  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.width()*0.75, rect.height()*0.5, rect.width(), rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
27533  painter->drawRect(QRectF(rect.width()*0.25, rect.height()*0.25, rect.width()*0.5, rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
27534  }
27535  }
27536 }
27537 
27544 void QCPFinancial::drawOhlcPlot(QCPPainter *painter, const QCPFinancialDataContainer::const_iterator &begin, const QCPFinancialDataContainer::const_iterator &end, bool isSelected)
27545 {
27546  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
27547  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
27548  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
27549 
27550  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
27551  {
27552  for (QCPFinancialDataContainer::const_iterator it = begin; it != end; ++it)
27553  {
27554  if (isSelected && mSelectionDecorator)
27555  mSelectionDecorator->applyPen(painter);
27556  else if (mTwoColored)
27557  painter->setPen(it->close >= it->open ? mPenPositive : mPenNegative);
27558  else
27559  painter->setPen(mPen);
27560  double keyPixel = keyAxis->coordToPixel(it->key);
27561  double openPixel = valueAxis->coordToPixel(it->open);
27562  double closePixel = valueAxis->coordToPixel(it->close);
27563  // draw backbone:
27564  painter->drawLine(QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(it->high)), QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(it->low)));
27565  // draw open:
27566  double pixelWidth = getPixelWidth(it->key, keyPixel); // sign of this makes sure open/close are on correct sides
27567  painter->drawLine(QPointF(keyPixel-pixelWidth, openPixel), QPointF(keyPixel, openPixel));
27568  // draw close:
27569  painter->drawLine(QPointF(keyPixel, closePixel), QPointF(keyPixel+pixelWidth, closePixel));
27570  }
27571  } else
27572  {
27573  for (QCPFinancialDataContainer::const_iterator it = begin; it != end; ++it)
27574  {
27575  if (isSelected && mSelectionDecorator)
27576  mSelectionDecorator->applyPen(painter);
27577  else if (mTwoColored)
27578  painter->setPen(it->close >= it->open ? mPenPositive : mPenNegative);
27579  else
27580  painter->setPen(mPen);
27581  double keyPixel = keyAxis->coordToPixel(it->key);
27582  double openPixel = valueAxis->coordToPixel(it->open);
27583  double closePixel = valueAxis->coordToPixel(it->close);
27584  // draw backbone:
27585  painter->drawLine(QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(it->high), keyPixel), QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(it->low), keyPixel));
27586  // draw open:
27587  double pixelWidth = getPixelWidth(it->key, keyPixel); // sign of this makes sure open/close are on correct sides
27588  painter->drawLine(QPointF(openPixel, keyPixel-pixelWidth), QPointF(openPixel, keyPixel));
27589  // draw close:
27590  painter->drawLine(QPointF(closePixel, keyPixel), QPointF(closePixel, keyPixel+pixelWidth));
27591  }
27592  }
27593 }
27594 
27601 void QCPFinancial::drawCandlestickPlot(QCPPainter *painter, const QCPFinancialDataContainer::const_iterator &begin, const QCPFinancialDataContainer::const_iterator &end, bool isSelected)
27602 {
27603  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
27604  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
27605  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
27606 
27607  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
27608  {
27609  for (QCPFinancialDataContainer::const_iterator it = begin; it != end; ++it)
27610  {
27611  if (isSelected && mSelectionDecorator)
27612  {
27613  mSelectionDecorator->applyPen(painter);
27614  mSelectionDecorator->applyBrush(painter);
27615  } else if (mTwoColored)
27616  {
27617  painter->setPen(it->close >= it->open ? mPenPositive : mPenNegative);
27618  painter->setBrush(it->close >= it->open ? mBrushPositive : mBrushNegative);
27619  } else
27620  {
27621  painter->setPen(mPen);
27622  painter->setBrush(mBrush);
27623  }
27624  double keyPixel = keyAxis->coordToPixel(it->key);
27625  double openPixel = valueAxis->coordToPixel(it->open);
27626  double closePixel = valueAxis->coordToPixel(it->close);
27627  // draw high:
27628  painter->drawLine(QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(it->high)), QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(qMax(it->open, it->close))));
27629  // draw low:
27630  painter->drawLine(QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(it->low)), QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(qMin(it->open, it->close))));
27631  // draw open-close box:
27632  double pixelWidth = getPixelWidth(it->key, keyPixel);
27633  painter->drawRect(QRectF(QPointF(keyPixel-pixelWidth, closePixel), QPointF(keyPixel+pixelWidth, openPixel)));
27634  }
27635  } else // keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical
27636  {
27637  for (QCPFinancialDataContainer::const_iterator it = begin; it != end; ++it)
27638  {
27639  if (isSelected && mSelectionDecorator)
27640  {
27641  mSelectionDecorator->applyPen(painter);
27642  mSelectionDecorator->applyBrush(painter);
27643  } else if (mTwoColored)
27644  {
27645  painter->setPen(it->close >= it->open ? mPenPositive : mPenNegative);
27646  painter->setBrush(it->close >= it->open ? mBrushPositive : mBrushNegative);
27647  } else
27648  {
27649  painter->setPen(mPen);
27650  painter->setBrush(mBrush);
27651  }
27652  double keyPixel = keyAxis->coordToPixel(it->key);
27653  double openPixel = valueAxis->coordToPixel(it->open);
27654  double closePixel = valueAxis->coordToPixel(it->close);
27655  // draw high:
27656  painter->drawLine(QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(it->high), keyPixel), QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(qMax(it->open, it->close)), keyPixel));
27657  // draw low:
27658  painter->drawLine(QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(it->low), keyPixel), QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(qMin(it->open, it->close)), keyPixel));
27659  // draw open-close box:
27660  double pixelWidth = getPixelWidth(it->key, keyPixel);
27661  painter->drawRect(QRectF(QPointF(closePixel, keyPixel-pixelWidth), QPointF(openPixel, keyPixel+pixelWidth)));
27662  }
27663  }
27664 }
27665 
27678 double QCPFinancial::getPixelWidth(double key, double keyPixel) const
27679 {
27680  double result = 0;
27681  switch (mWidthType)
27682  {
27683  case wtAbsolute:
27684  {
27685  if (mKeyAxis)
27686  result = mWidth*0.5*mKeyAxis.data()->pixelOrientation();
27687  break;
27688  }
27689  case wtAxisRectRatio:
27690  {
27691  if (mKeyAxis && mKeyAxis.data()->axisRect())
27692  {
27693  if (mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
27694  result = mKeyAxis.data()->axisRect()->width()*mWidth*0.5*mKeyAxis.data()->pixelOrientation();
27695  else
27696  result = mKeyAxis.data()->axisRect()->height()*mWidth*0.5*mKeyAxis.data()->pixelOrientation();
27697  } else
27698  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "No key axis or axis rect defined";
27699  break;
27700  }
27701  case wtPlotCoords:
27702  {
27703  if (mKeyAxis)
27704  result = mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(key+mWidth*0.5)-keyPixel;
27705  else
27706  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "No key axis defined";
27707  break;
27708  }
27709  }
27710  return result;
27711 }
27712 
27721 double QCPFinancial::ohlcSelectTest(const QPointF &pos, const QCPFinancialDataContainer::const_iterator &begin, const QCPFinancialDataContainer::const_iterator &end, QCPFinancialDataContainer::const_iterator &closestDataPoint) const
27722 {
27723  closestDataPoint = mDataContainer->constEnd();
27724  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
27725  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
27726  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return -1; }
27727 
27728  double minDistSqr = (std::numeric_limits<double>::max)();
27729  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
27730  {
27731  for (QCPFinancialDataContainer::const_iterator it=begin; it!=end; ++it)
27732  {
27733  double keyPixel = keyAxis->coordToPixel(it->key);
27734  // calculate distance to backbone:
27735  double currentDistSqr = QCPVector2D(pos).distanceSquaredToLine(QCPVector2D(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(it->high)), QCPVector2D(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(it->low)));
27736  if (currentDistSqr < minDistSqr)
27737  {
27738  minDistSqr = currentDistSqr;
27739  closestDataPoint = it;
27740  }
27741  }
27742  } else // keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical
27743  {
27744  for (QCPFinancialDataContainer::const_iterator it=begin; it!=end; ++it)
27745  {
27746  double keyPixel = keyAxis->coordToPixel(it->key);
27747  // calculate distance to backbone:
27748  double currentDistSqr = QCPVector2D(pos).distanceSquaredToLine(QCPVector2D(valueAxis->coordToPixel(it->high), keyPixel), QCPVector2D(valueAxis->coordToPixel(it->low), keyPixel));
27749  if (currentDistSqr < minDistSqr)
27750  {
27751  minDistSqr = currentDistSqr;
27752  closestDataPoint = it;
27753  }
27754  }
27755  }
27756  return qSqrt(minDistSqr);
27757 }
27758 
27768 double QCPFinancial::candlestickSelectTest(const QPointF &pos, const QCPFinancialDataContainer::const_iterator &begin, const QCPFinancialDataContainer::const_iterator &end, QCPFinancialDataContainer::const_iterator &closestDataPoint) const
27769 {
27770  closestDataPoint = mDataContainer->constEnd();
27771  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
27772  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
27773  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return -1; }
27774 
27775  double minDistSqr = (std::numeric_limits<double>::max)();
27776  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
27777  {
27778  for (QCPFinancialDataContainer::const_iterator it=begin; it!=end; ++it)
27779  {
27780  double currentDistSqr;
27781  // determine whether pos is in open-close-box:
27782  QCPRange boxKeyRange(it->key-mWidth*0.5, it->key+mWidth*0.5);
27783  QCPRange boxValueRange(it->close, it->open);
27784  double posKey, posValue;
27785  pixelsToCoords(pos, posKey, posValue);
27786  if (boxKeyRange.contains(posKey) && boxValueRange.contains(posValue)) // is in open-close-box
27787  {
27788  currentDistSqr = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99 * mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
27789  } else
27790  {
27791  // calculate distance to high/low lines:
27792  double keyPixel = keyAxis->coordToPixel(it->key);
27793  double highLineDistSqr = QCPVector2D(pos).distanceSquaredToLine(QCPVector2D(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(it->high)), QCPVector2D(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(qMax(it->open, it->close))));
27794  double lowLineDistSqr = QCPVector2D(pos).distanceSquaredToLine(QCPVector2D(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(it->low)), QCPVector2D(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(qMin(it->open, it->close))));
27795  currentDistSqr = qMin(highLineDistSqr, lowLineDistSqr);
27796  }
27797  if (currentDistSqr < minDistSqr)
27798  {
27799  minDistSqr = currentDistSqr;
27800  closestDataPoint = it;
27801  }
27802  }
27803  } else // keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical
27804  {
27805  for (QCPFinancialDataContainer::const_iterator it=begin; it!=end; ++it)
27806  {
27807  double currentDistSqr;
27808  // determine whether pos is in open-close-box:
27809  QCPRange boxKeyRange(it->key-mWidth*0.5, it->key+mWidth*0.5);
27810  QCPRange boxValueRange(it->close, it->open);
27811  double posKey, posValue;
27812  pixelsToCoords(pos, posKey, posValue);
27813  if (boxKeyRange.contains(posKey) && boxValueRange.contains(posValue)) // is in open-close-box
27814  {
27815  currentDistSqr = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99 * mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
27816  } else
27817  {
27818  // calculate distance to high/low lines:
27819  double keyPixel = keyAxis->coordToPixel(it->key);
27820  double highLineDistSqr = QCPVector2D(pos).distanceSquaredToLine(QCPVector2D(valueAxis->coordToPixel(it->high), keyPixel), QCPVector2D(valueAxis->coordToPixel(qMax(it->open, it->close)), keyPixel));
27821  double lowLineDistSqr = QCPVector2D(pos).distanceSquaredToLine(QCPVector2D(valueAxis->coordToPixel(it->low), keyPixel), QCPVector2D(valueAxis->coordToPixel(qMin(it->open, it->close)), keyPixel));
27822  currentDistSqr = qMin(highLineDistSqr, lowLineDistSqr);
27823  }
27824  if (currentDistSqr < minDistSqr)
27825  {
27826  minDistSqr = currentDistSqr;
27827  closestDataPoint = it;
27828  }
27829  }
27830  }
27831  return qSqrt(minDistSqr);
27832 }
27833 
27848 void QCPFinancial::getVisibleDataBounds(QCPFinancialDataContainer::const_iterator &begin, QCPFinancialDataContainer::const_iterator &end) const
27849 {
27850  if (!mKeyAxis)
27851  {
27852  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key axis";
27853  begin = mDataContainer->constEnd();
27854  end = mDataContainer->constEnd();
27855  return;
27856  }
27857  begin = mDataContainer->findBegin(mKeyAxis.data()->range().lower-mWidth*0.5); // subtract half width of ohlc/candlestick to include partially visible data points
27858  end = mDataContainer->findEnd(mKeyAxis.data()->range().upper+mWidth*0.5); // add half width of ohlc/candlestick to include partially visible data points
27859 }
27860 
27866 QRectF QCPFinancial::selectionHitBox(QCPFinancialDataContainer::const_iterator it) const
27867 {
27868  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
27869  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
27870  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return {}; }
27871 
27872  double keyPixel = keyAxis->coordToPixel(it->key);
27873  double highPixel = valueAxis->coordToPixel(it->high);
27874  double lowPixel = valueAxis->coordToPixel(it->low);
27875  double keyWidthPixels = keyPixel-keyAxis->coordToPixel(it->key-mWidth*0.5);
27876  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
27877  return QRectF(keyPixel-keyWidthPixels, highPixel, keyWidthPixels*2, lowPixel-highPixel).normalized();
27878  else
27879  return QRectF(highPixel, keyPixel-keyWidthPixels, lowPixel-highPixel, keyWidthPixels*2).normalized();
27880 }
27881 /* end of 'src/plottables/plottable-financial.cpp' */
27882

27885 /* modified 2022-11-06T12:45:56, size 37679 */

27929  errorMinus(errorMinus),
27930  errorPlus(errorPlus)
27931 {
27932 }

27992 QCPErrorBars::QCPErrorBars(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis) :
27993  QCPAbstractPlottable(keyAxis, valueAxis),
27994  mDataContainer(new QVector<QCPErrorBarsData>),
27995  mErrorType(etValueError),
27996  mWhiskerWidth(9),
27997  mSymbolGap(10)
27998 {
27999  setPen(QPen(Qt::black, 0));
28000  setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
28001 }

28043 }

28055 void QCPErrorBars::setData(const QVector<double> &errorMinus, const QVector<double> &errorPlus)
28056 {
28057  mDataContainer->clear();
28058  addData(errorMinus, errorPlus);
28059 }
28060 
28075 void QCPErrorBars::setDataPlottable(QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable)
28076 {
28077  if (plottable && qobject_cast<QCPErrorBars*>(plottable))
28078  {
28079  mDataPlottable = nullptr;
28080  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't set another QCPErrorBars instance as data plottable";
28081  return;
28082  }
28083  if (plottable && !plottable->interface1D())
28084  {
28085  mDataPlottable = nullptr;
28086  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "passed plottable doesn't implement 1d interface, can't associate with QCPErrorBars";
28087  return;
28088  }
28089 
28090  mDataPlottable = plottable;
28091 }

28130 void QCPErrorBars::addData(const QVector<double> &error)
28131 {
28132  addData(error, error);
28133 }
28134 
28145 void QCPErrorBars::addData(const QVector<double> &errorMinus, const QVector<double> &errorPlus)
28146 {
28147  if (errorMinus.size() != errorPlus.size())
28148  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "minus and plus error vectors have different sizes:" << errorMinus.size() << errorPlus.size();
28149  const int n = qMin(errorMinus.size(), errorPlus.size());
28150  mDataContainer->reserve(n);
28151  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
28152  mDataContainer->append(QCPErrorBarsData(errorMinus.at(i), errorPlus.at(i)));
28153 }
28154 
28164 void QCPErrorBars::addData(double error)
28165 {
28166  mDataContainer->append(QCPErrorBarsData(error));
28167 }
28168 
28179 void QCPErrorBars::addData(double errorMinus, double errorPlus)
28180 {
28181  mDataContainer->append(QCPErrorBarsData(errorMinus, errorPlus));
28182 }

28195  else
28196  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "no data plottable set";
28197  return 0;
28198 }

28220 /* inherits documentation from base class */
28221 QCPRange QCPErrorBars::dataValueRange(int index) const
28222 {
28223  if (mDataPlottable)
28224  {
28225  const double value = mDataPlottable->interface1D()->dataMainValue(index);
28226  if (index >= 0 && index < mDataContainer->size() && mErrorType == etValueError)
28227  return {value-mDataContainer->at(index).errorMinus, value+mDataContainer->at(index).errorPlus};
28228  else
28229  return {value, value};
28230  } else
28231  {
28232  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "no data plottable set";
28233  return {};
28234  }
28235 }
28236

28239 {
