28241  return mDataPlottable->interface1D()->dataPixelPosition(index);
28242  else
28243  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "no data plottable set";
28244  return {};
28245 }
28246 
28247 /* inherits documentation from base class */
28248 bool QCPErrorBars::sortKeyIsMainKey() const
28249 {
28250  if (mDataPlottable)
28251  {
28252  return mDataPlottable->interface1D()->sortKeyIsMainKey();
28253  } else
28254  {
28255  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "no data plottable set";
28256  return true;
28257  }
28258 }
28259 
28263 QCPDataSelection QCPErrorBars::selectTestRect(const QRectF &rect, bool onlySelectable) const
28264 {
28265  QCPDataSelection result;
28266  if (!mDataPlottable)
28267  return result;
28268  if ((onlySelectable && mSelectable == QCP::stNone) || mDataContainer->isEmpty())
28269  return result;
28270  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis)
28271  return result;
28272 
28273  QCPErrorBarsDataContainer::const_iterator visibleBegin, visibleEnd;
28274  getVisibleDataBounds(visibleBegin, visibleEnd, QCPDataRange(0, dataCount()));
28275 
28276  QVector<QLineF> backbones, whiskers;
28277  for (QCPErrorBarsDataContainer::const_iterator it=visibleBegin; it!=visibleEnd; ++it)
28278  {
28279  backbones.clear();
28280  whiskers.clear();
28281  getErrorBarLines(it, backbones, whiskers);
28282  foreach (const QLineF &backbone, backbones)
28283  {
28284  if (rectIntersectsLine(rect, backbone))
28285  {
28286  result.addDataRange(QCPDataRange(int(it-mDataContainer->constBegin()), int(it-mDataContainer->constBegin()+1)), false);
28287  break;
28288  }
28289  }
28290  }
28291  result.simplify();
28292  return result;
28293 }
28294 
28295 /* inherits documentation from base class */
28296 int QCPErrorBars::findBegin(double sortKey, bool expandedRange) const
28297 {
28298  if (mDataPlottable)
28299  {
28300  if (mDataContainer->isEmpty())
28301  return 0;
28302  int beginIndex = mDataPlottable->interface1D()->findBegin(sortKey, expandedRange);
28303  if (beginIndex >= mDataContainer->size())
28304  beginIndex = mDataContainer->size()-1;
28305  return beginIndex;
28306  } else
28307  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "no data plottable set";
28308  return 0;
28309 }
28310 
28311 /* inherits documentation from base class */
28312 int QCPErrorBars::findEnd(double sortKey, bool expandedRange) const
28313 {
28314  if (mDataPlottable)
28315  {
28316  if (mDataContainer->isEmpty())
28317  return 0;
28318  int endIndex = mDataPlottable->interface1D()->findEnd(sortKey, expandedRange);
28319  if (endIndex > mDataContainer->size())
28320  endIndex = mDataContainer->size();
28321  return endIndex;
28322  } else
28323  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "no data plottable set";
28324  return 0;
28325 }
28326 
28335 double QCPErrorBars::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
28336 {
28337  if (!mDataPlottable) return -1;
28338 
28339  if ((onlySelectable && mSelectable == QCP::stNone) || mDataContainer->isEmpty())
28340  return -1;
28341  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis)
28342  return -1;
28343 
28344  if (mKeyAxis.data()->axisRect()->rect().contains(pos.toPoint()) || mParentPlot->interactions().testFlag(QCP::iSelectPlottablesBeyondAxisRect))
28345  {
28346  QCPErrorBarsDataContainer::const_iterator closestDataPoint = mDataContainer->constEnd();
28347  double result = pointDistance(pos, closestDataPoint);
28348  if (details)
28349  {
28350  int pointIndex = int(closestDataPoint-mDataContainer->constBegin());
28351  details->setValue(QCPDataSelection(QCPDataRange(pointIndex, pointIndex+1)));
28352  }
28353  return result;
28354  } else
28355  return -1;
28356 }
28357 
28358 /* inherits documentation from base class */
28359 void QCPErrorBars::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
28360 {
28361  if (!mDataPlottable) return;
28362  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
28363  if (mKeyAxis.data()->range().size() <= 0 || mDataContainer->isEmpty()) return;
28364 
28365  // if the sort key isn't the main key, we must check the visibility for each data point/error bar individually
28366  // (getVisibleDataBounds applies range restriction, but otherwise can only return full data range):
28367  bool checkPointVisibility = !mDataPlottable->interface1D()->sortKeyIsMainKey();
28368 
28369  // check data validity if flag set:
28370 #ifdef QCUSTOMPLOT_CHECK_DATA
28371  QCPErrorBarsDataContainer::const_iterator it;
28372  for (it = mDataContainer->constBegin(); it != mDataContainer->constEnd(); ++it)
28373  {
28374  if (QCP::isInvalidData(it->errorMinus, it->errorPlus))
28375  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Data point at index" << it-mDataContainer->constBegin() << "invalid." << "Plottable name:" << name();
28376  }
28377 #endif
28378 
28379  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
28380  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
28381  // loop over and draw segments of unselected/selected data:
28382  QList<QCPDataRange> selectedSegments, unselectedSegments, allSegments;
28383  getDataSegments(selectedSegments, unselectedSegments);
28384  allSegments << unselectedSegments << selectedSegments;
28385  QVector<QLineF> backbones, whiskers;
28386  for (int i=0; i<allSegments.size(); ++i)
28387  {
28388  QCPErrorBarsDataContainer::const_iterator begin, end;
28389  getVisibleDataBounds(begin, end, allSegments.at(i));
28390  if (begin == end)
28391  continue;
28392 
28393  bool isSelectedSegment = i >= unselectedSegments.size();
28394  if (isSelectedSegment && mSelectionDecorator)
28395  mSelectionDecorator->applyPen(painter);
28396  else
28397  painter->setPen(mPen);
28398  if (painter->pen().capStyle() == Qt::SquareCap)
28399  {
28400  QPen capFixPen(painter->pen());
28401  capFixPen.setCapStyle(Qt::FlatCap);
28402  painter->setPen(capFixPen);
28403  }
28404  backbones.clear();
28405  whiskers.clear();
28406  for (QCPErrorBarsDataContainer::const_iterator it=begin; it!=end; ++it)
28407  {
28408  if (!checkPointVisibility || errorBarVisible(int(it-mDataContainer->constBegin())))
28409  getErrorBarLines(it, backbones, whiskers);
28410  }
28411  painter->drawLines(backbones);
28412  painter->drawLines(whiskers);
28413  }
28414 
28415  // draw other selection decoration that isn't just line/scatter pens and brushes:
28416  if (mSelectionDecorator)
28417  mSelectionDecorator->drawDecoration(painter, selection());
28418 }
28419 
28420 /* inherits documentation from base class */
28421 void QCPErrorBars::drawLegendIcon(QCPPainter *painter, const QRectF &rect) const
28422 {
28423  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
28424  painter->setPen(mPen);
28425  if (mErrorType == etValueError && mValueAxis && mValueAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
28426  {
28427  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.center().x(), rect.top()+2, rect.center().x(), rect.bottom()-1));
28428  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.center().x()-4, rect.top()+2, rect.center().x()+4, rect.top()+2));
28429  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.center().x()-4, rect.bottom()-1, rect.center().x()+4, rect.bottom()-1));
28430  } else
28431  {
28432  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.left()+2, rect.center().y(), rect.right()-2, rect.center().y()));
28433  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.left()+2, rect.center().y()-4, rect.left()+2, rect.center().y()+4));
28434  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.right()-2, rect.center().y()-4, rect.right()-2, rect.center().y()+4));
28435  }
28436 }
28437 
28438 /* inherits documentation from base class */
28439 QCPRange QCPErrorBars::getKeyRange(bool &foundRange, QCP::SignDomain inSignDomain) const
28440 {
28441  if (!mDataPlottable)
28442  {
28443  foundRange = false;
28444  return {};
28445  }
28446 
28447  QCPRange range;
28448  bool haveLower = false;
28449  bool haveUpper = false;
28450  QCPErrorBarsDataContainer::const_iterator it;
28451  for (it = mDataContainer->constBegin(); it != mDataContainer->constEnd(); ++it)
28452  {
28453  if (mErrorType == etValueError)
28454  {
28455  // error bar doesn't extend in key dimension (except whisker but we ignore that here), so only use data point center
28456  const double current = mDataPlottable->interface1D()->dataMainKey(int(it-mDataContainer->constBegin()));
28457  if (qIsNaN(current)) continue;
28458  if (inSignDomain == QCP::sdBoth || (inSignDomain == QCP::sdNegative && current < 0) || (inSignDomain == QCP::sdPositive && current > 0))
28459  {
28460  if (current < range.lower || !haveLower)
28461  {
28462  range.lower = current;
28463  haveLower = true;
28464  }
28465  if (current > range.upper || !haveUpper)
28466  {
28467  range.upper = current;
28468  haveUpper = true;
28469  }
28470  }
28471  } else // mErrorType == etKeyError
28472  {
28473  const double dataKey = mDataPlottable->interface1D()->dataMainKey(int(it-mDataContainer->constBegin()));
28474  if (qIsNaN(dataKey)) continue;
28475  // plus error:
28476  double current = dataKey + (qIsNaN(it->errorPlus) ? 0 : it->errorPlus);
28477  if (inSignDomain == QCP::sdBoth || (inSignDomain == QCP::sdNegative && current < 0) || (inSignDomain == QCP::sdPositive && current > 0))
28478  {
28479  if (current > range.upper || !haveUpper)
28480  {
28481  range.upper = current;
28482  haveUpper = true;
28483  }
28484  }
28485  // minus error:
28486  current = dataKey - (qIsNaN(it->errorMinus) ? 0 : it->errorMinus);
28487  if (inSignDomain == QCP::sdBoth || (inSignDomain == QCP::sdNegative && current < 0) || (inSignDomain == QCP::sdPositive && current > 0))
28488  {
28489  if (current < range.lower || !haveLower)
28490  {
28491  range.lower = current;
28492  haveLower = true;
28493  }
28494  }
28495  }
28496  }
28497 
28498  if (haveUpper && !haveLower)
28499  {
28500  range.lower = range.upper;
28501  haveLower = true;
28502  } else if (haveLower && !haveUpper)
28503  {
28504  range.upper = range.lower;
28505  haveUpper = true;
28506  }
28507 
28508  foundRange = haveLower && haveUpper;
28509  return range;
28510 }
28511 
28512 /* inherits documentation from base class */
28513 QCPRange QCPErrorBars::getValueRange(bool &foundRange, QCP::SignDomain inSignDomain, const QCPRange &inKeyRange) const
28514 {
28515  if (!mDataPlottable)
28516  {
28517  foundRange = false;
28518  return {};
28519  }
28520 
28521  QCPRange range;
28522  const bool restrictKeyRange = inKeyRange != QCPRange();
28523  bool haveLower = false;
28524  bool haveUpper = false;
28525  QCPErrorBarsDataContainer::const_iterator itBegin = mDataContainer->constBegin();
28526  QCPErrorBarsDataContainer::const_iterator itEnd = mDataContainer->constEnd();
28527  if (mDataPlottable->interface1D()->sortKeyIsMainKey() && restrictKeyRange)
28528  {
28529  itBegin = mDataContainer->constBegin()+findBegin(inKeyRange.lower, false);
28530  itEnd = mDataContainer->constBegin()+findEnd(inKeyRange.upper, false);
28531  }
28532  for (QCPErrorBarsDataContainer::const_iterator it = itBegin; it != itEnd; ++it)
28533  {
28534  if (restrictKeyRange)
28535  {
28536  const double dataKey = mDataPlottable->interface1D()->dataMainKey(int(it-mDataContainer->constBegin()));
28537  if (dataKey < inKeyRange.lower || dataKey > inKeyRange.upper)
28538  continue;
28539  }
28540  if (mErrorType == etValueError)
28541  {
28542  const double dataValue = mDataPlottable->interface1D()->dataMainValue(int(it-mDataContainer->constBegin()));
28543  if (qIsNaN(dataValue)) continue;
28544  // plus error:
28545  double current = dataValue + (qIsNaN(it->errorPlus) ? 0 : it->errorPlus);
28546  if (inSignDomain == QCP::sdBoth || (inSignDomain == QCP::sdNegative && current < 0) || (inSignDomain == QCP::sdPositive && current > 0))
28547  {
28548  if (current > range.upper || !haveUpper)
28549  {
28550  range.upper = current;
28551  haveUpper = true;
28552  }
28553  }
28554  // minus error:
28555  current = dataValue - (qIsNaN(it->errorMinus) ? 0 : it->errorMinus);
28556  if (inSignDomain == QCP::sdBoth || (inSignDomain == QCP::sdNegative && current < 0) || (inSignDomain == QCP::sdPositive && current > 0))
28557  {
28558  if (current < range.lower || !haveLower)
28559  {
28560  range.lower = current;
28561  haveLower = true;
28562  }
28563  }
28564  } else // mErrorType == etKeyError
28565  {
28566  // error bar doesn't extend in value dimension (except whisker but we ignore that here), so only use data point center
28567  const double current = mDataPlottable->interface1D()->dataMainValue(int(it-mDataContainer->constBegin()));
28568  if (qIsNaN(current)) continue;
28569  if (inSignDomain == QCP::sdBoth || (inSignDomain == QCP::sdNegative && current < 0) || (inSignDomain == QCP::sdPositive && current > 0))
28570  {
28571  if (current < range.lower || !haveLower)
28572  {
28573  range.lower = current;
28574  haveLower = true;
28575  }
28576  if (current > range.upper || !haveUpper)
28577  {
28578  range.upper = current;
28579  haveUpper = true;
28580  }
28581  }
28582  }
28583  }
28584 
28585  if (haveUpper && !haveLower)
28586  {
28587  range.lower = range.upper;
28588  haveLower = true;
28589  } else if (haveLower && !haveUpper)
28590  {
28591  range.upper = range.lower;
28592  haveUpper = true;
28593  }
28594 
28595  foundRange = haveLower && haveUpper;
28596  return range;
28597 }
28598 
28610 void QCPErrorBars::getErrorBarLines(QCPErrorBarsDataContainer::const_iterator it, QVector<QLineF> &backbones, QVector<QLineF> &whiskers) const
28611 {
28612  if (!mDataPlottable) return;
28613 
28614  int index = int(it-mDataContainer->constBegin());
28615  QPointF centerPixel = mDataPlottable->interface1D()->dataPixelPosition(index);
28616  if (qIsNaN(centerPixel.x()) || qIsNaN(centerPixel.y()))
28617  return;
28618  QCPAxis *errorAxis = mErrorType == etValueError ? mValueAxis.data() : mKeyAxis.data();
28619  QCPAxis *orthoAxis = mErrorType == etValueError ? mKeyAxis.data() : mValueAxis.data();
28620  const double centerErrorAxisPixel = errorAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal ? centerPixel.x() : centerPixel.y();
28621  const double centerOrthoAxisPixel = orthoAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal ? centerPixel.x() : centerPixel.y();
28622  const double centerErrorAxisCoord = errorAxis->pixelToCoord(centerErrorAxisPixel); // depending on plottable, this might be different from just mDataPlottable->interface1D()->dataMainKey/Value
28623  const double symbolGap = mSymbolGap*0.5*errorAxis->pixelOrientation();
28624  // plus error:
28625  double errorStart, errorEnd;
28626  if (!qIsNaN(it->errorPlus))
28627  {
28628  errorStart = centerErrorAxisPixel+symbolGap;
28629  errorEnd = errorAxis->coordToPixel(centerErrorAxisCoord+it->errorPlus);
28630  if (errorAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
28631  {
28632  if ((errorStart > errorEnd) != errorAxis->rangeReversed())
28633  backbones.append(QLineF(centerOrthoAxisPixel, errorStart, centerOrthoAxisPixel, errorEnd));
28634  whiskers.append(QLineF(centerOrthoAxisPixel-mWhiskerWidth*0.5, errorEnd, centerOrthoAxisPixel+mWhiskerWidth*0.5, errorEnd));
28635  } else
28636  {
28637  if ((errorStart < errorEnd) != errorAxis->rangeReversed())
28638  backbones.append(QLineF(errorStart, centerOrthoAxisPixel, errorEnd, centerOrthoAxisPixel));
28639  whiskers.append(QLineF(errorEnd, centerOrthoAxisPixel-mWhiskerWidth*0.5, errorEnd, centerOrthoAxisPixel+mWhiskerWidth*0.5));
28640  }
28641  }
28642  // minus error:
28643  if (!qIsNaN(it->errorMinus))
28644  {
28645  errorStart = centerErrorAxisPixel-symbolGap;
28646  errorEnd = errorAxis->coordToPixel(centerErrorAxisCoord-it->errorMinus);
28647  if (errorAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
28648  {
28649  if ((errorStart < errorEnd) != errorAxis->rangeReversed())
28650  backbones.append(QLineF(centerOrthoAxisPixel, errorStart, centerOrthoAxisPixel, errorEnd));
28651  whiskers.append(QLineF(centerOrthoAxisPixel-mWhiskerWidth*0.5, errorEnd, centerOrthoAxisPixel+mWhiskerWidth*0.5, errorEnd));
28652  } else
28653  {
28654  if ((errorStart > errorEnd) != errorAxis->rangeReversed())
28655  backbones.append(QLineF(errorStart, centerOrthoAxisPixel, errorEnd, centerOrthoAxisPixel));
28656  whiskers.append(QLineF(errorEnd, centerOrthoAxisPixel-mWhiskerWidth*0.5, errorEnd, centerOrthoAxisPixel+mWhiskerWidth*0.5));
28657  }
28658  }
28659 }
28660 
28679 void QCPErrorBars::getVisibleDataBounds(QCPErrorBarsDataContainer::const_iterator &begin, QCPErrorBarsDataContainer::const_iterator &end, const QCPDataRange &rangeRestriction) const
28680 {
28681  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
28682  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
28683  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis)
28684  {
28685  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis";
28686  end = mDataContainer->constEnd();
28687  begin = end;
28688  return;
28689  }
28690  if (!mDataPlottable || rangeRestriction.isEmpty())
28691  {
28692  end = mDataContainer->constEnd();
28693  begin = end;
28694  return;
28695  }
28696  if (!mDataPlottable->interface1D()->sortKeyIsMainKey())
28697  {
28698  // if the sort key isn't the main key, it's not possible to find a contiguous range of visible
28699  // data points, so this method then only applies the range restriction and otherwise returns
28700  // the full data range. Visibility checks must be done on a per-datapoin-basis during drawing
28701  QCPDataRange dataRange(0, mDataContainer->size());
28702  dataRange = dataRange.bounded(rangeRestriction);
28703  begin = mDataContainer->constBegin()+dataRange.begin();
28704  end = mDataContainer->constBegin()+dataRange.end();
28705  return;
28706  }
28707 
28708  // get visible data range via interface from data plottable, and then restrict to available error data points:
28709  const int n = qMin(mDataContainer->size(), mDataPlottable->interface1D()->dataCount());
28710  int beginIndex = mDataPlottable->interface1D()->findBegin(keyAxis->range().lower);
28711  int endIndex = mDataPlottable->interface1D()->findEnd(keyAxis->range().upper);
28712  int i = beginIndex;
28713  while (i > 0 && i < n && i > rangeRestriction.begin())
28714  {
28715  if (errorBarVisible(i))
28716  beginIndex = i;
28717  --i;
28718  }
28719  i = endIndex;
28720  while (i >= 0 && i < n && i < rangeRestriction.end())
28721  {
28722  if (errorBarVisible(i))
28723  endIndex = i+1;
28724  ++i;
28725  }
28726  QCPDataRange dataRange(beginIndex, endIndex);
28727  dataRange = dataRange.bounded(rangeRestriction.bounded(QCPDataRange(0, mDataContainer->size())));
28728  begin = mDataContainer->constBegin()+dataRange.begin();
28729  end = mDataContainer->constBegin()+dataRange.end();
28730 }
28731 
28738 double QCPErrorBars::pointDistance(const QPointF &pixelPoint, QCPErrorBarsDataContainer::const_iterator &closestData) const
28739 {
28740  closestData = mDataContainer->constEnd();
28741  if (!mDataPlottable || mDataContainer->isEmpty())
28742  return -1.0;
28743  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis)
28744  {
28745  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis";
28746  return -1.0;
28747  }
28748 
28749  QCPErrorBarsDataContainer::const_iterator begin, end;
28750  getVisibleDataBounds(begin, end, QCPDataRange(0, dataCount()));
28751 
28752  // calculate minimum distances to error backbones (whiskers are ignored for speed) and find closestData iterator:
28753  double minDistSqr = (std::numeric_limits<double>::max)();
28754  QVector<QLineF> backbones, whiskers;
28755  for (QCPErrorBarsDataContainer::const_iterator it=begin; it!=end; ++it)
28756  {
28757  getErrorBarLines(it, backbones, whiskers);
28758  foreach (const QLineF &backbone, backbones)
28759  {
28760  const double currentDistSqr = QCPVector2D(pixelPoint).distanceSquaredToLine(backbone);
28761  if (currentDistSqr < minDistSqr)
28762  {
28763  minDistSqr = currentDistSqr;
28764  closestData = it;
28765  }
28766  }
28767  }
28768  return qSqrt(minDistSqr);
28769 }
28770 
28778 void QCPErrorBars::getDataSegments(QList<QCPDataRange> &selectedSegments, QList<QCPDataRange> &unselectedSegments) const
28779 {
28780  selectedSegments.clear();
28781  unselectedSegments.clear();
28782  if (mSelectable == QCP::stWhole) // stWhole selection type draws the entire plottable with selected style if mSelection isn't empty
28783  {
28784  if (selected())
28785  selectedSegments << QCPDataRange(0, dataCount());
28786  else
28787  unselectedSegments << QCPDataRange(0, dataCount());
28788  } else
28789  {
28790  QCPDataSelection sel(selection());
28791  sel.simplify();
28792  selectedSegments = sel.dataRanges();
28793  unselectedSegments = sel.inverse(QCPDataRange(0, dataCount())).dataRanges();
28794  }
28795 }
28796 
28806 bool QCPErrorBars::errorBarVisible(int index) const
28807 {
28808  QPointF centerPixel = mDataPlottable->interface1D()->dataPixelPosition(index);
28809  const double centerKeyPixel = mKeyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal ? centerPixel.x() : centerPixel.y();
28810  if (qIsNaN(centerKeyPixel))
28811  return false;
28812 
28813  double keyMin, keyMax;
28814  if (mErrorType == etKeyError)
28815  {
28816  const double centerKey = mKeyAxis->pixelToCoord(centerKeyPixel);
28817  const double errorPlus = mDataContainer->at(index).errorPlus;
28818  const double errorMinus = mDataContainer->at(index).errorMinus;
28819  keyMax = centerKey+(qIsNaN(errorPlus) ? 0 : errorPlus);
28820  keyMin = centerKey-(qIsNaN(errorMinus) ? 0 : errorMinus);
28821  } else // mErrorType == etValueError
28822  {
28823  keyMax = mKeyAxis->pixelToCoord(centerKeyPixel+mWhiskerWidth*0.5*mKeyAxis->pixelOrientation());
28824  keyMin = mKeyAxis->pixelToCoord(centerKeyPixel-mWhiskerWidth*0.5*mKeyAxis->pixelOrientation());
28825  }
28826  return ((keyMax > mKeyAxis->range().lower) && (keyMin < mKeyAxis->range().upper));
28827 }
28828 
28836 bool QCPErrorBars::rectIntersectsLine(const QRectF &pixelRect, const QLineF &line) const
28837 {
28838  if (pixelRect.left() > line.x1() && pixelRect.left() > line.x2())
28839  return false;
28840  else if (pixelRect.right() < line.x1() && pixelRect.right() < line.x2())
28841  return false;
28842  else if (pixelRect.top() > line.y1() && pixelRect.top() > line.y2())
28843  return false;
28844  else if (pixelRect.bottom() < line.y1() && pixelRect.bottom() < line.y2())
28845  return false;
28846  else
28847  return true;
28848 }
28849 /* end of 'src/plottables/plottable-errorbar.cpp' */
28850

28853 /* modified 2022-11-06T12:45:56, size 7596 */

28873 QCPItemStraightLine::QCPItemStraightLine(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
28874  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
28875  point1(createPosition(QLatin1String("point1"))),
28876  point2(createPosition(QLatin1String("point2")))
28877 {
28878  point1->setCoords(0, 0);
28879  point2->setCoords(1, 1);
28880 
28881  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
28882  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue,2));
28883 }

28907 }
28908 
28909 /* inherits documentation from base class */
28910 double QCPItemStraightLine::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
28911 {
28912  Q_UNUSED(details)
28913  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
28914  return -1;
28915 
28916  return QCPVector2D(pos).distanceToStraightLine(point1->pixelPosition(), point2->pixelPosition()-point1->pixelPosition());
28917 }
28918 
28919 /* inherits documentation from base class */
28920 void QCPItemStraightLine::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
28921 {
28922  QCPVector2D start(point1->pixelPosition());
28923  QCPVector2D end(point2->pixelPosition());
28924  // get visible segment of straight line inside clipRect:
28925  int clipPad = qCeil(mainPen().widthF());
28926  QLineF line = getRectClippedStraightLine(start, end-start, clipRect().adjusted(-clipPad, -clipPad, clipPad, clipPad));
28927  // paint visible segment, if existent:
28928  if (!line.isNull())
28929  {
28930  painter->setPen(mainPen());
28931  painter->drawLine(line);
28932  }
28933 }
28934 
28942 QLineF QCPItemStraightLine::getRectClippedStraightLine(const QCPVector2D &base, const QCPVector2D &vec, const QRect &rect) const
28943 {
28944  double bx, by;
28945  double gamma;
28946  QLineF result;
28947  if (vec.x() == 0 && vec.y() == 0)
28948  return result;
28949  if (qFuzzyIsNull(vec.x())) // line is vertical
28950  {
28951  // check top of rect:
28952  bx = rect.left();
28953  by = rect.top();
28954  gamma = base.x()-bx + (by-base.y())*vec.x()/vec.y();
28955  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.width())
28956  result.setLine(bx+gamma, rect.top(), bx+gamma, rect.bottom()); // no need to check bottom because we know line is vertical
28957  } else if (qFuzzyIsNull(vec.y())) // line is horizontal
28958  {
28959  // check left of rect:
28960  bx = rect.left();
28961  by = rect.top();
28962  gamma = base.y()-by + (bx-base.x())*vec.y()/vec.x();
28963  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.height())
28964  result.setLine(rect.left(), by+gamma, rect.right(), by+gamma); // no need to check right because we know line is horizontal
28965  } else // line is skewed
28966  {
28967  QList<QCPVector2D> pointVectors;
28968  // check top of rect:
28969  bx = rect.left();
28970  by = rect.top();
28971  gamma = base.x()-bx + (by-base.y())*vec.x()/vec.y();
28972  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.width())
28973  pointVectors.append(QCPVector2D(bx+gamma, by));
28974  // check bottom of rect:
28975  bx = rect.left();
28976  by = rect.bottom();
28977  gamma = base.x()-bx + (by-base.y())*vec.x()/vec.y();
28978  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.width())
28979  pointVectors.append(QCPVector2D(bx+gamma, by));
28980  // check left of rect:
28981  bx = rect.left();
28982  by = rect.top();
28983  gamma = base.y()-by + (bx-base.x())*vec.y()/vec.x();
28984  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.height())
28985  pointVectors.append(QCPVector2D(bx, by+gamma));
28986  // check right of rect:
28987  bx = rect.right();
28988  by = rect.top();
28989  gamma = base.y()-by + (bx-base.x())*vec.y()/vec.x();
28990  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.height())
28991  pointVectors.append(QCPVector2D(bx, by+gamma));
28992 
28993  // evaluate points:
28994  if (pointVectors.size() == 2)
28995  {
28996  result.setPoints(pointVectors.at(0).toPointF(), pointVectors.at(1).toPointF());
28997  } else if (pointVectors.size() > 2)
28998  {
28999  // line probably goes through corner of rect, and we got two points there. single out the point pair with greatest distance:
29000  double distSqrMax = 0;
29001  QCPVector2D pv1, pv2;
29002  for (int i=0; i<pointVectors.size()-1; ++i)
29003  {
29004  for (int k=i+1; k<pointVectors.size(); ++k)
29005  {
29006  double distSqr = (pointVectors.at(i)-pointVectors.at(k)).lengthSquared();
29007  if (distSqr > distSqrMax)
29008  {
29009  pv1 = pointVectors.at(i);
29010  pv2 = pointVectors.at(k);
29011  distSqrMax = distSqr;
29012  }
29013  }
29014  }
29015  result.setPoints(pv1.toPointF(), pv2.toPointF());
29016  }
29017  }
29018  return result;
29019 }
29020 
29026 QPen QCPItemStraightLine::mainPen() const
29027 {
29028  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
29029 }
29030 /* end of 'src/items/item-straightline.cpp' */
29031

29034 /* modified 2022-11-06T12:45:56, size 8525 */
29035

29056 QCPItemLine::QCPItemLine(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
29057  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
29058  start(createPosition(QLatin1String("start"))),
29059  end(createPosition(QLatin1String("end")))
29060 {
29061  start->setCoords(0, 0);
29062  end->setCoords(1, 1);
29063 
29064  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
29065  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue,2));
29066 }

29118 /* inherits documentation from base class */
29119 double QCPItemLine::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
29120 {
29121  Q_UNUSED(details)
29122  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
29123  return -1;
29124 
29125  return qSqrt(QCPVector2D(pos).distanceSquaredToLine(start->pixelPosition(), end->pixelPosition()));
29126 }
29127 
29128 /* inherits documentation from base class */
29129 void QCPItemLine::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
29130 {
29131  QCPVector2D startVec(start->pixelPosition());
29132  QCPVector2D endVec(end->pixelPosition());
29133  if (qFuzzyIsNull((startVec-endVec).lengthSquared()))
29134  return;
29135  // get visible segment of straight line inside clipRect:
29136  int clipPad = int(qMax(mHead.boundingDistance(), mTail.boundingDistance()));
29137  clipPad = qMax(clipPad, qCeil(mainPen().widthF()));
29138  QLineF line = getRectClippedLine(startVec, endVec, clipRect().adjusted(-clipPad, -clipPad, clipPad, clipPad));
29139  // paint visible segment, if existent:
29140  if (!line.isNull())
29141  {
29142  painter->setPen(mainPen());
29143  painter->drawLine(line);
29144  painter->setBrush(Qt::SolidPattern);
29145  if (mTail.style() != QCPLineEnding::esNone)
29146  mTail.draw(painter, startVec, startVec-endVec);
29147  if (mHead.style() != QCPLineEnding::esNone)
29148  mHead.draw(painter, endVec, endVec-startVec);
29149  }
29150 }
29151 
29159 QLineF QCPItemLine::getRectClippedLine(const QCPVector2D &start, const QCPVector2D &end, const QRect &rect) const
29160 {
29161  bool containsStart = rect.contains(qRound(start.x()), qRound(start.y()));
29162  bool containsEnd = rect.contains(qRound(end.x()), qRound(end.y()));
29163  if (containsStart && containsEnd)
29164  return {start.toPointF(), end.toPointF()};
29165 
29166  QCPVector2D base = start;
29167  QCPVector2D vec = end-start;
29168  double bx, by;
29169  double gamma, mu;
29170  QLineF result;
29171  QList<QCPVector2D> pointVectors;
29172 
29173  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(vec.y())) // line is not horizontal
29174  {
29175  // check top of rect:
29176  bx = rect.left();
29177  by = rect.top();
29178  mu = (by-base.y())/vec.y();
29179  if (mu >= 0 && mu <= 1)
29180  {
29181  gamma = base.x()-bx + mu*vec.x();
29182  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.width())
29183  pointVectors.append(QCPVector2D(bx+gamma, by));
29184  }
29185  // check bottom of rect:
29186  bx = rect.left();
29187  by = rect.bottom();
29188  mu = (by-base.y())/vec.y();
29189  if (mu >= 0 && mu <= 1)
29190  {
29191  gamma = base.x()-bx + mu*vec.x();
29192  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.width())
29193  pointVectors.append(QCPVector2D(bx+gamma, by));
29194  }
29195  }
29196  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(vec.x())) // line is not vertical
29197  {
29198  // check left of rect:
29199  bx = rect.left();
29200  by = rect.top();
29201  mu = (bx-base.x())/vec.x();
29202  if (mu >= 0 && mu <= 1)
29203  {
29204  gamma = base.y()-by + mu*vec.y();
29205  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.height())
29206  pointVectors.append(QCPVector2D(bx, by+gamma));
29207  }
29208  // check right of rect:
29209  bx = rect.right();
29210  by = rect.top();
29211  mu = (bx-base.x())/vec.x();
29212  if (mu >= 0 && mu <= 1)
29213  {
29214  gamma = base.y()-by + mu*vec.y();
29215  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.height())
29216  pointVectors.append(QCPVector2D(bx, by+gamma));
29217  }
29218  }
29219 
29220  if (containsStart)
29221  pointVectors.append(start);
29222  if (containsEnd)
29223  pointVectors.append(end);
29224 
29225  // evaluate points:
29226  if (pointVectors.size() == 2)
29227  {
29228  result.setPoints(pointVectors.at(0).toPointF(), pointVectors.at(1).toPointF());
29229  } else if (pointVectors.size() > 2)
29230  {
29231  // line probably goes through corner of rect, and we got two points there. single out the point pair with greatest distance:
29232  double distSqrMax = 0;
29233  QCPVector2D pv1, pv2;
29234  for (int i=0; i<pointVectors.size()-1; ++i)
29235  {
29236  for (int k=i+1; k<pointVectors.size(); ++k)
29237  {
29238  double distSqr = (pointVectors.at(i)-pointVectors.at(k)).lengthSquared();
29239  if (distSqr > distSqrMax)
29240  {
29241  pv1 = pointVectors.at(i);
29242  pv2 = pointVectors.at(k);
29243  distSqrMax = distSqr;
29244  }
29245  }
29246  }
29247  result.setPoints(pv1.toPointF(), pv2.toPointF());
29248  }
29249  return result;
29250 }
29251 
29257 QPen QCPItemLine::mainPen() const
29258 {
29259  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
29260 }
29261 /* end of 'src/items/item-line.cpp' */
29262

29294 QCPItemCurve::QCPItemCurve(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
29295  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
29296  start(createPosition(QLatin1String("start"))),
29297  startDir(createPosition(QLatin1String("startDir"))),
29298  endDir(createPosition(QLatin1String("endDir"))),
29299  end(createPosition(QLatin1String("end")))
29300 {
29301  start->setCoords(0, 0);
29302  startDir->setCoords(0.5, 0);
29303  endDir->setCoords(0, 0.5);
29304  end->setCoords(1, 1);
29305 
29306  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
29307  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue,2));
29308 }

29359 
29360 /* inherits documentation from base class */
29361 double QCPItemCurve::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
29362 {
29363  Q_UNUSED(details)
29364  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
29365  return -1;
29366 
29367  QPointF startVec(start->pixelPosition());
29368  QPointF startDirVec(startDir->pixelPosition());
29369  QPointF endDirVec(endDir->pixelPosition());
29370  QPointF endVec(end->pixelPosition());
29371 
29372  QPainterPath cubicPath(startVec);
29373  cubicPath.cubicTo(startDirVec, endDirVec, endVec);
29374 
29375  QList<QPolygonF> polygons = cubicPath.toSubpathPolygons();
29376  if (polygons.isEmpty())
29377  return -1;
29378  const QPolygonF polygon = polygons.first();
29379  QCPVector2D p(pos);
29380  double minDistSqr = (std::numeric_limits<double>::max)();
29381  for (int i=1; i<polygon.size(); ++i)
29382  {
29383  double distSqr = p.distanceSquaredToLine(polygon.at(i-1), polygon.at(i));
29384  if (distSqr < minDistSqr)
29385  minDistSqr = distSqr;
29386  }
29387  return qSqrt(minDistSqr);
29388 }
29389 
29390 /* inherits documentation from base class */
29391 void QCPItemCurve::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
29392 {
29393  QCPVector2D startVec(start->pixelPosition());
29394  QCPVector2D startDirVec(startDir->pixelPosition());
29395  QCPVector2D endDirVec(endDir->pixelPosition());
29396  QCPVector2D endVec(end->pixelPosition());
29397  if ((endVec-startVec).length() > 1e10) // too large curves cause crash
29398  return;
29399 
29400  QPainterPath cubicPath(startVec.toPointF());
29401  cubicPath.cubicTo(startDirVec.toPointF(), endDirVec.toPointF(), endVec.toPointF());
29402 
29403  // paint visible segment, if existent:
29404  const int clipEnlarge = qCeil(mainPen().widthF());
29405  QRect clip = clipRect().adjusted(-clipEnlarge, -clipEnlarge, clipEnlarge, clipEnlarge);
29406  QRect cubicRect = cubicPath.controlPointRect().toRect();
29407  if (cubicRect.isEmpty()) // may happen when start and end exactly on same x or y position
29408  cubicRect.adjust(0, 0, 1, 1);
29409  if (clip.intersects(cubicRect))
29410  {
29411  painter->setPen(mainPen());
29412  painter->drawPath(cubicPath);
29413  painter->setBrush(Qt::SolidPattern);
29414  if (mTail.style() != QCPLineEnding::esNone)
29415  mTail.draw(painter, startVec, M_PI-cubicPath.angleAtPercent(0)/180.0*M_PI);
29416  if (mHead.style() != QCPLineEnding::esNone)
29417  mHead.draw(painter, endVec, -cubicPath.angleAtPercent(1)/180.0*M_PI);
29418  }
29419 }
29420 
29426 QPen QCPItemCurve::mainPen() const
29427 {
29428  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
29429 }
29430 /* end of 'src/items/item-curve.cpp' */
29431

29434 /* modified 2022-11-06T12:45:56, size 6472 */
29435 
29439 
29454 QCPItemRect::QCPItemRect(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
29455  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
29456  topLeft(createPosition(QLatin1String("topLeft"))),
29457  bottomRight(createPosition(QLatin1String("bottomRight"))),
29458  top(createAnchor(QLatin1String("top"), aiTop)),
29459  topRight(createAnchor(QLatin1String("topRight"), aiTopRight)),
29460  right(createAnchor(QLatin1String("right"), aiRight)),
29461  bottom(createAnchor(QLatin1String("bottom"), aiBottom)),
29462  bottomLeft(createAnchor(QLatin1String("bottomLeft"), aiBottomLeft)),
29463  left(createAnchor(QLatin1String("left"), aiLeft))
29464 {
29465  topLeft->setCoords(0, 1);
29466  bottomRight->setCoords(1, 0);
29467 
29468  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
29469  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue,2));
29470  setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
29471  setSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
29472 }

29475 {
29476 }

29484 {
29485  mPen = pen;
29486 }

29495  mSelectedPen = pen;
29496 }

29505 {
29506  mBrush = brush;
29507 }

29516 {
29517  mSelectedBrush = brush;
29518 }
29519 
29520 /* inherits documentation from base class */
29521 double QCPItemRect::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
29522 {
29523  Q_UNUSED(details)
29524  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
29525  return -1;
29526 
29527  QRectF rect = QRectF(topLeft->pixelPosition(), bottomRight->pixelPosition()).normalized();
29528  bool filledRect = mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush && mBrush.color().alpha() != 0;
29529  return rectDistance(rect, pos, filledRect);
29530 }
29531 
29532 /* inherits documentation from base class */
29533 void QCPItemRect::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
29534 {
29535  QPointF p1 = topLeft->pixelPosition();
29536  QPointF p2 = bottomRight->pixelPosition();
29537  if (p1.toPoint() == p2.toPoint())
29538  return;
29539  QRectF rect = QRectF(p1, p2).normalized();
29540  double clipPad = mainPen().widthF();
29541  QRectF boundingRect = rect.adjusted(-clipPad, -clipPad, clipPad, clipPad);
29542  if (boundingRect.intersects(clipRect())) // only draw if bounding rect of rect item is visible in cliprect
29543  {
29544  painter->setPen(mainPen());
29545  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
29546  painter->drawRect(rect);
29547  }
29548 }
29549 
29550 /* inherits documentation from base class */
29551 QPointF QCPItemRect::anchorPixelPosition(int anchorId) const
29552 {
29553  QRectF rect = QRectF(topLeft->pixelPosition(), bottomRight->pixelPosition());
29554  switch (anchorId)
29555  {
29556  case aiTop: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.topRight())*0.5;
29557  case aiTopRight: return rect.topRight();
29558  case aiRight: return (rect.topRight()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
29559  case aiBottom: return (rect.bottomLeft()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
29560  case aiBottomLeft: return rect.bottomLeft();
29561  case aiLeft: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.bottomLeft())*0.5;
29562  }
29563 
29564  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid anchorId" << anchorId;
29565  return {};
29566 }
29567

29574 {
29575  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
29576 }

29584 {
29585  return mSelected ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
29586 }

29617 QCPItemText::QCPItemText(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
29618  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
29619  position(createPosition(QLatin1String("position"))),
29620  topLeft(createAnchor(QLatin1String("topLeft"), aiTopLeft)),
29621  top(createAnchor(QLatin1String("top"), aiTop)),
29622  topRight(createAnchor(QLatin1String("topRight"), aiTopRight)),
29623  right(createAnchor(QLatin1String("right"), aiRight)),
29624  bottomRight(createAnchor(QLatin1String("bottomRight"), aiBottomRight)),
29625  bottom(createAnchor(QLatin1String("bottom"), aiBottom)),
29626  bottomLeft(createAnchor(QLatin1String("bottomLeft"), aiBottomLeft)),
29627  left(createAnchor(QLatin1String("left"), aiLeft)),
29628  mText(QLatin1String("text")),
29629  mPositionAlignment(Qt::AlignCenter),
29630  mTextAlignment(Qt::AlignTop|Qt::AlignHCenter),
29631  mRotation(0)
29632 {
29633  position->setCoords(0, 0);
29634 
29635  setPen(Qt::NoPen);
29636  setSelectedPen(Qt::NoPen);
29637  setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
29638  setSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
29639  setColor(Qt::black);
29640  setSelectedColor(Qt::blue);
29641 }

29776 void QCPItemText::setPadding(const QMargins &padding)

29779 }
29780 
29781 /* inherits documentation from base class */
29782 double QCPItemText::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
29783 {
29784  Q_UNUSED(details)
29785  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
29786  return -1;
29787 
29788  // The rect may be rotated, so we transform the actual clicked pos to the rotated
29789  // coordinate system, so we can use the normal rectDistance function for non-rotated rects:
29790  QPointF positionPixels(position->pixelPosition());
29791  QTransform inputTransform;
29792  inputTransform.translate(positionPixels.x(), positionPixels.y());
29793  inputTransform.rotate(-mRotation);
29794  inputTransform.translate(-positionPixels.x(), -positionPixels.y());
29795  QPointF rotatedPos = inputTransform.map(pos);
29796  QFontMetrics fontMetrics(mFont);
29797  QRect textRect = fontMetrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip|mTextAlignment, mText);
29798  QRect textBoxRect = textRect.adjusted(-mPadding.left(), -mPadding.top(), mPadding.right(), mPadding.bottom());
29799  QPointF textPos = getTextDrawPoint(positionPixels, textBoxRect, mPositionAlignment);
29800  textBoxRect.moveTopLeft(textPos.toPoint());
29801 
29802  return rectDistance(textBoxRect, rotatedPos, true);
29803 }
29804 
29805 /* inherits documentation from base class */
29806 void QCPItemText::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
29807 {
29808  QPointF pos(position->pixelPosition());
29809  QTransform transform = painter->transform();
29810  transform.translate(pos.x(), pos.y());
29811  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(mRotation))
29812  transform.rotate(mRotation);
29813  painter->setFont(mainFont());
29814  QRect textRect = painter->fontMetrics().boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip|mTextAlignment, mText);
29815  QRect textBoxRect = textRect.adjusted(-mPadding.left(), -mPadding.top(), mPadding.right(), mPadding.bottom());
29816  QPointF textPos = getTextDrawPoint(QPointF(0, 0), textBoxRect, mPositionAlignment); // 0, 0 because the transform does the translation
29817  textRect.moveTopLeft(textPos.toPoint()+QPoint(mPadding.left(), mPadding.top()));
29818  textBoxRect.moveTopLeft(textPos.toPoint());
29819  int clipPad = qCeil(mainPen().widthF());
29820  QRect boundingRect = textBoxRect.adjusted(-clipPad, -clipPad, clipPad, clipPad);
29821  if (transform.mapRect(boundingRect).intersects(painter->transform().mapRect(clipRect())))
29822  {
29823  painter->setTransform(transform);
29824  if ((mainBrush().style() != Qt::NoBrush && mainBrush().color().alpha() != 0) ||
29825  (mainPen().style() != Qt::NoPen && mainPen().color().alpha() != 0))
29826  {
29827  painter->setPen(mainPen());
29828  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
29829  painter->drawRect(textBoxRect);
29830  }
29831  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
29832  painter->setPen(QPen(mainColor()));
29833  painter->drawText(textRect, Qt::TextDontClip|mTextAlignment, mText);
29834  }
29835 }
29836 
29837 /* inherits documentation from base class */
29838 QPointF QCPItemText::anchorPixelPosition(int anchorId) const
29839 {
29840  // get actual rect points (pretty much copied from draw function):
29841  QPointF pos(position->pixelPosition());
29842  QTransform transform;
29843  transform.translate(pos.x(), pos.y());
29844  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(mRotation))
29845  transform.rotate(mRotation);
29846  QFontMetrics fontMetrics(mainFont());
29847  QRect textRect = fontMetrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip|mTextAlignment, mText);
29848  QRectF textBoxRect = textRect.adjusted(-mPadding.left(), -mPadding.top(), mPadding.right(), mPadding.bottom());
29849  QPointF textPos = getTextDrawPoint(QPointF(0, 0), textBoxRect, mPositionAlignment); // 0, 0 because the transform does the translation
29850  textBoxRect.moveTopLeft(textPos.toPoint());
29851  QPolygonF rectPoly = transform.map(QPolygonF(textBoxRect));
29852 
29853  switch (anchorId)
29854  {
29855  case aiTopLeft: return rectPoly.at(0);
29856  case aiTop: return (rectPoly.at(0)+rectPoly.at(1))*0.5;
29857  case aiTopRight: return rectPoly.at(1);
29858  case aiRight: return (rectPoly.at(1)+rectPoly.at(2))*0.5;
29859  case aiBottomRight: return rectPoly.at(2);
29860  case aiBottom: return (rectPoly.at(2)+rectPoly.at(3))*0.5;
29861  case aiBottomLeft: return rectPoly.at(3);
29862  case aiLeft: return (rectPoly.at(3)+rectPoly.at(0))*0.5;
29863  }
29864 
29865  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid anchorId" << anchorId;
29866  return {};
29867 }
29868 
29879 QPointF QCPItemText::getTextDrawPoint(const QPointF &pos, const QRectF &rect, Qt::Alignment positionAlignment) const
29880 {
29881  if (positionAlignment == 0 || positionAlignment == (Qt::AlignLeft|Qt::AlignTop))
29882  return pos;
29883 
29884  QPointF result = pos; // start at top left
29885  if (positionAlignment.testFlag(Qt::AlignHCenter))
29886  result.rx() -= rect.width()/2.0;
29887  else if (positionAlignment.testFlag(Qt::AlignRight))
29888  result.rx() -= rect.width();
29889  if (positionAlignment.testFlag(Qt::AlignVCenter))
29890  result.ry() -= rect.height()/2.0;
29891  else if (positionAlignment.testFlag(Qt::AlignBottom))
29892  result.ry() -= rect.height();
29893  return result;
29894 }
29895

29902 {
29903  return mSelected ? mSelectedFont : mFont;
29904 }

29912 {
29913  return mSelected ? mSelectedColor : mColor;
29914 }

29921 QPen QCPItemText::mainPen() const
29922 {
29923  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
29924 }

29931 QBrush QCPItemText::mainBrush() const
29932 {
29933  return mSelected ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
29934 }

29944 
29959 QCPItemEllipse::QCPItemEllipse(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
29960  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
29961  topLeft(createPosition(QLatin1String("topLeft"))),
29962  bottomRight(createPosition(QLatin1String("bottomRight"))),
29963  topLeftRim(createAnchor(QLatin1String("topLeftRim"), aiTopLeftRim)),
29964  top(createAnchor(QLatin1String("top"), aiTop)),
29965  topRightRim(createAnchor(QLatin1String("topRightRim"), aiTopRightRim)),
29966  right(createAnchor(QLatin1String("right"), aiRight)),
29967  bottomRightRim(createAnchor(QLatin1String("bottomRightRim"), aiBottomRightRim)),
29968  bottom(createAnchor(QLatin1String("bottom"), aiBottom)),
29969  bottomLeftRim(createAnchor(QLatin1String("bottomLeftRim"), aiBottomLeftRim)),
29970  left(createAnchor(QLatin1String("left"), aiLeft)),
29971  center(createAnchor(QLatin1String("center"), aiCenter))
29972 {
29973  topLeft->setCoords(0, 1);
29974  bottomRight->setCoords(1, 0);
29975 
29976  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
29977  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
29978  setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
29979  setSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
29980 }
29981 
29982 QCPItemEllipse::~QCPItemEllipse()
29983 {
29984 }
29985 
29991 void QCPItemEllipse::setPen(const QPen &pen)
29992 {
29993  mPen = pen;
29994 }
29995 
30001 void QCPItemEllipse::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
30002 {
30003  mSelectedPen = pen;
30004 }
30005 
30012 void QCPItemEllipse::setBrush(const QBrush &brush)
30013 {
30014  mBrush = brush;
30015 }
30016 
30023 void QCPItemEllipse::setSelectedBrush(const QBrush &brush)
30024 {
30025  mSelectedBrush = brush;
30026 }
30027 
30028 /* inherits documentation from base class */
30029 double QCPItemEllipse::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
30030 {
30031  Q_UNUSED(details)
30032  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
30033  return -1;
30034 
30035  QPointF p1 = topLeft->pixelPosition();
30036  QPointF p2 = bottomRight->pixelPosition();
30037  QPointF center((p1+p2)/2.0);
30038  double a = qAbs(p1.x()-p2.x())/2.0;
30039  double b = qAbs(p1.y()-p2.y())/2.0;
30040  double x = pos.x()-center.x();
30041  double y = pos.y()-center.y();
30042 
30043  // distance to border:
30044  double c = 1.0/qSqrt(x*x/(a*a)+y*y/(b*b));
30045  double result = qAbs(c-1)*qSqrt(x*x+y*y);
30046  // filled ellipse, allow click inside to count as hit:
30047  if (result > mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99 && mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush && mBrush.color().alpha() != 0)
30048  {
30049  if (x*x/(a*a) + y*y/(b*b) <= 1)
30050  result = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
30051  }
30052  return result;
30053 }
30054 
30055 /* inherits documentation from base class */
30056 void QCPItemEllipse::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
30057 {
30058  QPointF p1 = topLeft->pixelPosition();
30059  QPointF p2 = bottomRight->pixelPosition();
30060  if (p1.toPoint() == p2.toPoint())
30061  return;
30062  QRectF ellipseRect = QRectF(p1, p2).normalized();
30063  const int clipEnlarge = qCeil(mainPen().widthF());
30064  QRect clip = clipRect().adjusted(-clipEnlarge, -clipEnlarge, clipEnlarge, clipEnlarge);
30065  if (ellipseRect.intersects(clip)) // only draw if bounding rect of ellipse is visible in cliprect
30066  {
30067  painter->setPen(mainPen());
30068  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
30069 #ifdef __EXCEPTIONS
30070  try // drawEllipse sometimes throws exceptions if ellipse is too big
30071  {
30072 #endif
30073  painter->drawEllipse(ellipseRect);
30074 #ifdef __EXCEPTIONS
30075  } catch (...)
30076  {
30077  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Item too large for memory, setting invisible";
30078  setVisible(false);
30079  }
30080 #endif
30081  }
30082 }
30083 
30084 /* inherits documentation from base class */
30085 QPointF QCPItemEllipse::anchorPixelPosition(int anchorId) const
30086 {
30087  QRectF rect = QRectF(topLeft->pixelPosition(), bottomRight->pixelPosition());
30088  switch (anchorId)
30089  {
30090  case aiTopLeftRim: return rect.center()+(rect.topLeft()-rect.center())*1/qSqrt(2);
30091  case aiTop: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.topRight())*0.5;
30092  case aiTopRightRim: return rect.center()+(rect.topRight()-rect.center())*1/qSqrt(2);
30093  case aiRight: return (rect.topRight()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
30094  case aiBottomRightRim: return rect.center()+(rect.bottomRight()-rect.center())*1/qSqrt(2);
30095  case aiBottom: return (rect.bottomLeft()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
30096  case aiBottomLeftRim: return rect.center()+(rect.bottomLeft()-rect.center())*1/qSqrt(2);
30097  case aiLeft: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.bottomLeft())*0.5;
30098  case aiCenter: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
30099  }
30100 
30101  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid anchorId" << anchorId;
30102  return {};
30103 }
30104 
30110 QPen QCPItemEllipse::mainPen() const
30111 {
30112  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
30113 }
30114 
30120 QBrush QCPItemEllipse::mainBrush() const
30121 {
30122  return mSelected ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
30123 }
30124 /* end of 'src/items/item-ellipse.cpp' */

30154 QCPItemPixmap::QCPItemPixmap(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
30155  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
30156  topLeft(createPosition(QLatin1String("topLeft"))),
30157  bottomRight(createPosition(QLatin1String("bottomRight"))),
30158  top(createAnchor(QLatin1String("top"), aiTop)),
30159  topRight(createAnchor(QLatin1String("topRight"), aiTopRight)),
30160  right(createAnchor(QLatin1String("right"), aiRight)),
30161  bottom(createAnchor(QLatin1String("bottom"), aiBottom)),
30162  bottomLeft(createAnchor(QLatin1String("bottomLeft"), aiBottomLeft)),
30163  left(createAnchor(QLatin1String("left"), aiLeft)),
30164  mScaled(false),
30165  mScaledPixmapInvalidated(true),
30166  mAspectRatioMode(Qt::KeepAspectRatio),
30167  mTransformationMode(Qt::SmoothTransformation)
30168 {

30170  bottomRight->setCoords(1, 0);
30171 
30172  setPen(Qt::NoPen);
30173  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue));
30174 }
30175 
30176 QCPItemPixmap::~QCPItemPixmap()

30179 
30183 void QCPItemPixmap::setPixmap(const QPixmap &pixmap)
30184 {
30185  mPixmap = pixmap;
30186  mScaledPixmapInvalidated = true;
30187  if (mPixmap.isNull())
30188  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "pixmap is null";
30189 }
30190 
30195 void QCPItemPixmap::setScaled(bool scaled, Qt::AspectRatioMode aspectRatioMode, Qt::TransformationMode transformationMode)
30196 {
30197  mScaled = scaled;
30198  mAspectRatioMode = aspectRatioMode;
30199  mTransformationMode = transformationMode;
30200  mScaledPixmapInvalidated = true;
30201 }
30202 
30208 void QCPItemPixmap::setPen(const QPen &pen)
30209 {
30210  mPen = pen;
30211 }
30212 
30218 void QCPItemPixmap::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
30219 {
30220  mSelectedPen = pen;
30221 }
30222 
30223 /* inherits documentation from base class */
30224 double QCPItemPixmap::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
30225 {
30226  Q_UNUSED(details)
30227  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
30228  return -1;
30229 
30230  return rectDistance(getFinalRect(), pos, true);
30231 }
30232 
30233 /* inherits documentation from base class */
30234 void QCPItemPixmap::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
30235 {
30236  bool flipHorz = false;
30237  bool flipVert = false;
30238  QRect rect = getFinalRect(&flipHorz, &flipVert);
30239  int clipPad = mainPen().style() == Qt::NoPen ? 0 : qCeil(mainPen().widthF());
30240  QRect boundingRect = rect.adjusted(-clipPad, -clipPad, clipPad, clipPad);
30241  if (boundingRect.intersects(clipRect()))
30242  {
30243  updateScaledPixmap(rect, flipHorz, flipVert);
30244  painter->drawPixmap(rect.topLeft(), mScaled ? mScaledPixmap : mPixmap);
30245  QPen pen = mainPen();
30246  if (pen.style() != Qt::NoPen)
30247  {
30248  painter->setPen(pen);
30249  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
30250  painter->drawRect(rect);
30251  }
30252  }
30253 }
30254 
30255 /* inherits documentation from base class */
30256 QPointF QCPItemPixmap::anchorPixelPosition(int anchorId) const
30257 {
30258  bool flipHorz = false;
30259  bool flipVert = false;
30260  QRect rect = getFinalRect(&flipHorz, &flipVert);
30261  // we actually want denormal rects (negative width/height) here, so restore
30262  // the flipped state:
30263  if (flipHorz)
30264  rect.adjust(rect.width(), 0, -rect.width(), 0);
30265  if (flipVert)
30266  rect.adjust(0, rect.height(), 0, -rect.height());
30267 
30268  switch (anchorId)
30269  {
30270  case aiTop: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.topRight())*0.5;
30271  case aiTopRight: return rect.topRight();
30272  case aiRight: return (rect.topRight()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
30273  case aiBottom: return (rect.bottomLeft()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
30274  case aiBottomLeft: return rect.bottomLeft();
30275  case aiLeft: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.bottomLeft())*0.5;
30276  }
30277 
30278  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid anchorId" << anchorId;
30279  return {};
30280 }
30281 
30295 void QCPItemPixmap::updateScaledPixmap(QRect finalRect, bool flipHorz, bool flipVert)
30296 {
30297  if (mPixmap.isNull())
30298  return;
30299 
30300  if (mScaled)
30301  {
30302 #ifdef QCP_DEVICEPIXELRATIO_SUPPORTED
30303  double devicePixelRatio = mPixmap.devicePixelRatio();
30304 #else
30305  double devicePixelRatio = 1.0;
30306 #endif
30307  if (finalRect.isNull())
30308  finalRect = getFinalRect(&flipHorz, &flipVert);
30309  if (mScaledPixmapInvalidated || finalRect.size() != mScaledPixmap.size()/devicePixelRatio)
30310  {
30311  mScaledPixmap = mPixmap.scaled(finalRect.size()*devicePixelRatio, mAspectRatioMode, mTransformationMode);
30312  if (flipHorz || flipVert)
30313  mScaledPixmap = QPixmap::fromImage(mScaledPixmap.toImage().mirrored(flipHorz, flipVert));
30314 #ifdef QCP_DEVICEPIXELRATIO_SUPPORTED
30315  mScaledPixmap.setDevicePixelRatio(devicePixelRatio);
30316 #endif
30317  }
30318  } else if (!mScaledPixmap.isNull())
30319  mScaledPixmap = QPixmap();
30320  mScaledPixmapInvalidated = false;
30321 }
30322 
30337 QRect QCPItemPixmap::getFinalRect(bool *flippedHorz, bool *flippedVert) const
30338 {
30339  QRect result;
30340  bool flipHorz = false;
30341  bool flipVert = false;
30342  QPoint p1 = topLeft->pixelPosition().toPoint();
30343  QPoint p2 = bottomRight->pixelPosition().toPoint();
30344  if (p1 == p2)
30345  return {p1, QSize(0, 0)};
30346  if (mScaled)
30347  {
30348  QSize newSize = QSize(p2.x()-p1.x(), p2.y()-p1.y());
30349  QPoint topLeft = p1;
30350  if (newSize.width() < 0)
30351  {
30352  flipHorz = true;
30353  newSize.rwidth() *= -1;
30354  topLeft.setX(p2.x());
30355  }
30356  if (newSize.height() < 0)
30357  {
30358  flipVert = true;
30359  newSize.rheight() *= -1;
30360  topLeft.setY(p2.y());
30361  }
30362  QSize scaledSize = mPixmap.size();
30363 #ifdef QCP_DEVICEPIXELRATIO_SUPPORTED
30364  scaledSize /= mPixmap.devicePixelRatio();
30365  scaledSize.scale(newSize*mPixmap.devicePixelRatio(), mAspectRatioMode);
30366 #else
30367  scaledSize.scale(newSize, mAspectRatioMode);
30368 #endif
30369  result = QRect(topLeft, scaledSize);
30370  } else
30371  {
30372 #ifdef QCP_DEVICEPIXELRATIO_SUPPORTED
30373  result = QRect(p1, mPixmap.size()/mPixmap.devicePixelRatio());
30374 #else
30375  result = QRect(p1, mPixmap.size());
30376 #endif
30377  }
30378  if (flippedHorz)
30379  *flippedHorz = flipHorz;
30380  if (flippedVert)
30381  *flippedVert = flipVert;
30382  return result;
30383 }
30384 
30390 QPen QCPItemPixmap::mainPen() const
30391 {
30392  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
30393 }
30394 /* end of 'src/items/item-pixmap.cpp' */
30395 
30396 
30397 /* including file 'src/items/item-tracer.cpp' */
30398 /* modified 2022-11-06T12:45:56, size 14645 */
30399 
30403 
30440 QCPItemTracer::QCPItemTracer(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
30441  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
30442  position(createPosition(QLatin1String("position"))),
30443  mSize(6),
30444  mStyle(tsCrosshair),
30445  mGraph(nullptr),
30446  mGraphKey(0),
30447  mInterpolating(false)
30448 {
30449  position->setCoords(0, 0);
30450 
30451  setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
30452  setSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
30453  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
30454  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
30455 }
30456 
30457 QCPItemTracer::~QCPItemTracer()
30458 {
30459 }
30460

30476 void QCPItemTracer::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)

30508 }

30516 void QCPItemTracer::setStyle(QCPItemTracer::TracerStyle style)
30517 {
30518  mStyle = style;
30519 }
30520 
30531 void QCPItemTracer::setGraph(QCPGraph *graph)
30532 {
30533  if (graph)
30534  {
30535  if (graph->parentPlot() == mParentPlot)
30536  {
30537  position->setType(QCPItemPosition::ptPlotCoords);
30538  position->setAxes(graph->keyAxis(), graph->valueAxis());
30539  mGraph = graph;
30540  updatePosition();
30541  } else
30542  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "graph isn't in same QCustomPlot instance as this item";
30543  } else
30544  {
30545  mGraph = nullptr;
30546  }
30547 }
30548 
30558 void QCPItemTracer::setGraphKey(double key)
30559 {
30560  mGraphKey = key;
30561 }
30562 
30574 void QCPItemTracer::setInterpolating(bool enabled)
30575 {
30576  mInterpolating = enabled;
30577 }
30578 
30579 /* inherits documentation from base class */
30580 double QCPItemTracer::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
30581 {
30582  Q_UNUSED(details)
30583  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
30584  return -1;
30585 
30586  QPointF center(position->pixelPosition());
30587  double w = mSize/2.0;
30588  QRect clip = clipRect();
30589  switch (mStyle)
30590  {
30591  case tsNone: return -1;
30592  case tsPlus:
30593  {
30594  if (clipRect().intersects(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
30595  return qSqrt(qMin(QCPVector2D(pos).distanceSquaredToLine(center+QPointF(-w, 0), center+QPointF(w, 0)),
30596  QCPVector2D(pos).distanceSquaredToLine(center+QPointF(0, -w), center+QPointF(0, w))));
30597  break;
30598  }
30599  case tsCrosshair:
30600  {
30601  return qSqrt(qMin(QCPVector2D(pos).distanceSquaredToLine(QCPVector2D(clip.left(), center.y()), QCPVector2D(clip.right(), center.y())),
30602  QCPVector2D(pos).distanceSquaredToLine(QCPVector2D(center.x(), clip.top()), QCPVector2D(center.x(), clip.bottom()))));
30603  }
30604  case tsCircle:
30605  {
30606  if (clip.intersects(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
30607  {
30608  // distance to border:
30609  double centerDist = QCPVector2D(center-pos).length();
30610  double circleLine = w;
30611  double result = qAbs(centerDist-circleLine);
30612  // filled ellipse, allow click inside to count as hit:
30613  if (result > mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99 && mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush && mBrush.color().alpha() != 0)
30614  {
30615  if (centerDist <= circleLine)
30616  result = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
30617  }
30618  return result;
30619  }
30620  break;
30621  }
30622  case tsSquare:
30623  {
30624  if (clip.intersects(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
30625  {
30626  QRectF rect = QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w));
30627  bool filledRect = mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush && mBrush.color().alpha() != 0;
30628  return rectDistance(rect, pos, filledRect);
30629  }
30630  break;
30631  }
30632  }
30633  return -1;
30634 }
30635 
30636 /* inherits documentation from base class */
30637 void QCPItemTracer::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
30638 {
30639  updatePosition();
30640  if (mStyle == tsNone)
30641  return;
30642 
30643  painter->setPen(mainPen());
30644  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
30645  QPointF center(position->pixelPosition());
30646  double w = mSize/2.0;
30647  QRect clip = clipRect();
30648  switch (mStyle)
30649  {
30650  case tsNone: return;
30651  case tsPlus:
30652  {
30653  if (clip.intersects(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
30654  {
30655  painter->drawLine(QLineF(center+QPointF(-w, 0), center+QPointF(w, 0)));
30656  painter->drawLine(QLineF(center+QPointF(0, -w), center+QPointF(0, w)));
30657  }
30658  break;
30659  }
30660  case tsCrosshair:
30661  {
30662  if (center.y() > clip.top() && center.y() < clip.bottom())
30663  painter->drawLine(QLineF(clip.left(), center.y(), clip.right(), center.y()));
30664  if (center.x() > clip.left() && center.x() < clip.right())
30665  painter->drawLine(QLineF(center.x(), clip.top(), center.x(), clip.bottom()));
30666  break;
30667  }
30668  case tsCircle:
30669  {
30670  if (clip.intersects(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
30671  painter->drawEllipse(center, w, w);
30672  break;
30673  }
30674  case tsSquare:
30675  {
30676  if (clip.intersects(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
30677  painter->drawRect(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)));
30678  break;
30679  }
30680  }
30681 }
30682 
30695 void QCPItemTracer::updatePosition()
30696 {
30697  if (mGraph)
30698  {
30699  if (mParentPlot->hasPlottable(mGraph))
30700  {
30701  if (mGraph->data()->size() > 1)
30702  {
30703  QCPGraphDataContainer::const_iterator first = mGraph->data()->constBegin();
30704  QCPGraphDataContainer::const_iterator last = mGraph->data()->constEnd()-1;
30705  if (mGraphKey <= first->key)
30706  position->setCoords(first->key, first->value);
30707  else if (mGraphKey >= last->key)
30708  position->setCoords(last->key, last->value);
30709  else
30710  {
30711  QCPGraphDataContainer::const_iterator it = mGraph->data()->findBegin(mGraphKey);
30712  if (it != mGraph->data()->constEnd()) // mGraphKey is not exactly on last iterator, but somewhere between iterators
30713  {
30714  QCPGraphDataContainer::const_iterator prevIt = it;
30715  ++it; // won't advance to constEnd because we handled that case (mGraphKey >= last->key) before
30716  if (mInterpolating)
30717  {
30718  // interpolate between iterators around mGraphKey:
30719  double slope = 0;
30720  if (!qFuzzyCompare(double(it->key), double(prevIt->key)))
30721  slope = (it->value-prevIt->value)/(it->key-prevIt->key);
30722  position->setCoords(mGraphKey, (mGraphKey-prevIt->key)*slope+prevIt->value);
30723  } else
30724  {
30725  // find iterator with key closest to mGraphKey:
30726  if (mGraphKey < (prevIt->key+it->key)*0.5)
30727  position->setCoords(prevIt->key, prevIt->value);
30728  else
30729  position->setCoords(it->key, it->value);
30730  }
30731  } else // mGraphKey is exactly on last iterator (should actually be caught when comparing first/last keys, but this is a failsafe for fp uncertainty)
30732  position->setCoords(it->key, it->value);
30733  }
30734  } else if (mGraph->data()->size() == 1)
30735  {
30736  QCPGraphDataContainer::const_iterator it = mGraph->data()->constBegin();
30737  position->setCoords(it->key, it->value);
30738  } else
30739  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "graph has no data";
30740  } else
30741  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "graph not contained in QCustomPlot instance (anymore)";
30742  }
30743 }
30744 
30750 QPen QCPItemTracer::mainPen() const
30751 {
30752  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
30753 }
30754 
30760 QBrush QCPItemTracer::mainBrush() const
30761 {
30762  return mSelected ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
30763 }
30764 /* end of 'src/items/item-tracer.cpp' */
30765 
30766 
30767 /* including file 'src/items/item-bracket.cpp' */
30768 /* modified 2022-11-06T12:45:56, size 10705 */
30769 
30773 
30800 QCPItemBracket::QCPItemBracket(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
30801  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
30802  left(createPosition(QLatin1String("left"))),
30803  right(createPosition(QLatin1String("right"))),
30804  center(createAnchor(QLatin1String("center"), aiCenter)),
30805  mLength(8),
30806  mStyle(bsCalligraphic)
30807 {
30808  left->setCoords(0, 0);
30809  right->setCoords(1, 1);
30810 
30811  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
30812  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
30813 }
30814 
30815 QCPItemBracket::~QCPItemBracket()
30816 {
30817 }
30818 
30828 void QCPItemBracket::setPen(const QPen &pen)
30829 {
30830  mPen = pen;
30831 }
30832 
30838 void QCPItemBracket::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
30839 {
30840  mSelectedPen = pen;
30841 }
30842 
30851 void QCPItemBracket::setLength(double length)
30852 {
30853  mLength = length;
30854 }
30855 
30861 void QCPItemBracket::setStyle(QCPItemBracket::BracketStyle style)
30862 {
30863  mStyle = style;
30864 }
30865 
30866 /* inherits documentation from base class */
30867 double QCPItemBracket::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
30868 {
30869  Q_UNUSED(details)
30870  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
30871  return -1;
30872 
30873  QCPVector2D p(pos);
30874  QCPVector2D leftVec(left->pixelPosition());
30875  QCPVector2D rightVec(right->pixelPosition());
30876  if (leftVec.toPoint() == rightVec.toPoint())
30877  return -1;
30878 
30879  QCPVector2D widthVec = (rightVec-leftVec)*0.5;
30880  QCPVector2D lengthVec = widthVec.perpendicular().normalized()*mLength;
30881  QCPVector2D centerVec = (rightVec+leftVec)*0.5-lengthVec;
30882 
30883  switch (mStyle)
30884  {
30885  case QCPItemBracket::bsSquare:
30886  case QCPItemBracket::bsRound:
30887  {
30888  double a = p.distanceSquaredToLine(centerVec-widthVec, centerVec+widthVec);
30889  double b = p.distanceSquaredToLine(centerVec-widthVec+lengthVec, centerVec-widthVec);
30890  double c = p.distanceSquaredToLine(centerVec+widthVec+lengthVec, centerVec+widthVec);
30891  return qSqrt(qMin(qMin(a, b), c));
30892  }
30893  case QCPItemBracket::bsCurly:
30894  case QCPItemBracket::bsCalligraphic:
30895  {
30896  double a = p.distanceSquaredToLine(centerVec-widthVec*0.75+lengthVec*0.15, centerVec+lengthVec*0.3);
30897  double b = p.distanceSquaredToLine(centerVec-widthVec+lengthVec*0.7, centerVec-widthVec*0.75+lengthVec*0.15);
30898  double c = p.distanceSquaredToLine(centerVec+widthVec*0.75+lengthVec*0.15, centerVec+lengthVec*0.3);
30899  double d = p.distanceSquaredToLine(centerVec+widthVec+lengthVec*0.7, centerVec+widthVec*0.75+lengthVec*0.15);
30900  return qSqrt(qMin(qMin(a, b), qMin(c, d)));
30901  }
30902  }
30903  return -1;
30904 }
30905 
30906 /* inherits documentation from base class */
30907 void QCPItemBracket::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
30908 {
30909  QCPVector2D leftVec(left->pixelPosition());
30910  QCPVector2D rightVec(right->pixelPosition());
30911  if (leftVec.toPoint() == rightVec.toPoint())
30912  return;
30913 
30914  QCPVector2D widthVec = (rightVec-leftVec)*0.5;
30915  QCPVector2D lengthVec = widthVec.perpendicular().normalized()*mLength;
30916  QCPVector2D centerVec = (rightVec+leftVec)*0.5-lengthVec;
30917 
30918  QPolygon boundingPoly;
30919  boundingPoly << leftVec.toPoint() << rightVec.toPoint()
30920  << (rightVec-lengthVec).toPoint() << (leftVec-lengthVec).toPoint();
30921  const int clipEnlarge = qCeil(mainPen().widthF());
30922  QRect clip = clipRect().adjusted(-clipEnlarge, -clipEnlarge, clipEnlarge, clipEnlarge);
30923  if (clip.intersects(boundingPoly.boundingRect()))
30924  {
30925  painter->setPen(mainPen());
30926  switch (mStyle)
30927  {
30928  case bsSquare:
30929  {
30930  painter->drawLine((centerVec+widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec).toPointF());
30931  painter->drawLine((centerVec+widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec+widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
30932  painter->drawLine((centerVec-widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
30933  break;
30934  }
30935  case bsRound:
30936  {
30937  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
30938  QPainterPath path;
30939  path.moveTo((centerVec+widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
30940  path.cubicTo((centerVec+widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec+widthVec).toPointF(), centerVec.toPointF());
30941  path.cubicTo((centerVec-widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
30942  painter->drawPath(path);
30943  break;
30944  }
30945  case bsCurly:
30946  {
30947  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
30948  QPainterPath path;
30949  path.moveTo((centerVec+widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
30950  path.cubicTo((centerVec+widthVec-lengthVec*0.8).toPointF(), (centerVec+0.4*widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF(), centerVec.toPointF());
30951  path.cubicTo((centerVec-0.4*widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec-lengthVec*0.8).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
30952  painter->drawPath(path);
30953  break;
30954  }
30955  case bsCalligraphic:
30956  {
30957  painter->setPen(Qt::NoPen);
30958  painter->setBrush(QBrush(mainPen().color()));
30959  QPainterPath path;
30960  path.moveTo((centerVec+widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
30961 
30962  path.cubicTo((centerVec+widthVec-lengthVec*0.8).toPointF(), (centerVec+0.4*widthVec+0.8*lengthVec).toPointF(), centerVec.toPointF());
30963  path.cubicTo((centerVec-0.4*widthVec+0.8*lengthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec-lengthVec*0.8).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
30964 
30965  path.cubicTo((centerVec-widthVec-lengthVec*0.5).toPointF(), (centerVec-0.2*widthVec+1.2*lengthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec+lengthVec*0.2).toPointF());
30966  path.cubicTo((centerVec+0.2*widthVec+1.2*lengthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec+widthVec-lengthVec*0.5).toPointF(), (centerVec+widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
30967 
30968  painter->drawPath(path);
30969  break;
30970  }
30971  }
30972  }
30973 }
30974 
30975 /* inherits documentation from base class */
30976 QPointF QCPItemBracket::anchorPixelPosition(int anchorId) const
30977 {
30978  QCPVector2D leftVec(left->pixelPosition());
30979  QCPVector2D rightVec(right->pixelPosition());
30980  if (leftVec.toPoint() == rightVec.toPoint())
30981  return leftVec.toPointF();
30982 
30983  QCPVector2D widthVec = (rightVec-leftVec)*0.5;
30984  QCPVector2D lengthVec = widthVec.perpendicular().normalized()*mLength;
30985  QCPVector2D centerVec = (rightVec+leftVec)*0.5-lengthVec;
30986 
30987  switch (anchorId)
30988  {
30989  case aiCenter:
30990  return centerVec.toPointF();
30991  }
30992  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid anchorId" << anchorId;
30993  return {};
30994 }
30995 
31001 QPen QCPItemBracket::mainPen() const
31002 {
31003  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
31004 }
31005 /* end of 'src/items/item-bracket.cpp' */

31097 QCPPolarAxisRadial::QCPPolarAxisRadial(QCPPolarAxisAngular *parent) :
31098  QCPLayerable(parent->parentPlot(), QString(), parent),
31099  mRangeDrag(true),
31100  mRangeZoom(true),
31101  mRangeZoomFactor(0.85),
31102  // axis base:
31103  mAngularAxis(parent),
31104  mAngle(45),
31105  mAngleReference(arAngularAxis),
31106  mSelectableParts(spAxis | spTickLabels | spAxisLabel),
31107  mSelectedParts(spNone),
31108  mBasePen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::SquareCap)),
31109  mSelectedBasePen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2)),
31110  // axis label:
31111  mLabelPadding(0),
31112  mLabel(),
31113  mLabelFont(mParentPlot->font()),
31114  mSelectedLabelFont(QFont(mLabelFont.family(), mLabelFont.pointSize(), QFont::Bold)),
31115  mLabelColor(Qt::black),
31116  mSelectedLabelColor(Qt::blue),
31117  // tick labels:
31118  // mTickLabelPadding(0), in label painter
31119  mTickLabels(true),
31120  // mTickLabelRotation(0), in label painter
31121  mTickLabelFont(mParentPlot->font()),
31122  mSelectedTickLabelFont(QFont(mTickLabelFont.family(), mTickLabelFont.pointSize(), QFont::Bold)),
31123  mTickLabelColor(Qt::black),
31124  mSelectedTickLabelColor(Qt::blue),
31125  mNumberPrecision(6),
31126  mNumberFormatChar('g'),
31127  mNumberBeautifulPowers(true),
31128  mNumberMultiplyCross(false),
31129  // ticks and subticks:
31130  mTicks(true),
31131  mSubTicks(true),
31132  mTickLengthIn(5),
31133  mTickLengthOut(0),
31134  mSubTickLengthIn(2),
31135  mSubTickLengthOut(0),
31136  mTickPen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::SquareCap)),
31137  mSelectedTickPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2)),
31138  mSubTickPen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::SquareCap)),
31139  mSelectedSubTickPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2)),
31140  // scale and range:
31141  mRange(0, 5),
31142  mRangeReversed(false),
31143  mScaleType(stLinear),
31144  // internal members:
31145  mRadius(1), // non-zero initial value, will be overwritten in ::update() according to inner rect
31146  mTicker(new QCPAxisTicker),
31147  mLabelPainter(mParentPlot)
31148 {
31149  setParent(parent);
31150  setAntialiased(true);
31151 
31152  setTickLabelPadding(5);
31153  setTickLabelRotation(0);
31154  setTickLabelMode(lmUpright);
31155  mLabelPainter.setAnchorReferenceType(QCPLabelPainterPrivate::artTangent);
31156  mLabelPainter.setAbbreviateDecimalPowers(false);
31157 }

31161 }
31162 
31163 QCPPolarAxisRadial::LabelMode QCPPolarAxisRadial::tickLabelMode() const
31164 {
31165  switch (mLabelPainter.anchorMode())
31166  {
31167  case QCPLabelPainterPrivate::amSkewedUpright: return lmUpright;
31168  case QCPLabelPainterPrivate::amSkewedRotated: return lmRotated;
31169  default: qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid mode for polar axis"; break;
31170  }
31171  return lmUpright;
31172 }

31174 /* No documentation as it is a property getter */
31175 QString QCPPolarAxisRadial::numberFormat() const
31176 {
31177  QString result;
31178  result.append(mNumberFormatChar);
31179  if (mNumberBeautifulPowers)
31180  {
31181  result.append(QLatin1Char('b'));
31182  if (mNumberMultiplyCross)
31183  result.append(QLatin1Char('c'));
31184  }
31185  return result;
31186 }

31247 void QCPPolarAxisRadial::setScaleType(QCPPolarAxisRadial::ScaleType type)
31248 {
31249  if (mScaleType != type)
31250  {
31251  mScaleType = type;
31252  if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic)
31253  setRange(mRange.sanitizedForLogScale());
31254  //mCachedMarginValid = false;
31255  emit scaleTypeChanged(mScaleType);
31256  }
31257 }
31258 
31267 void QCPPolarAxisRadial::setRange(const QCPRange &range)
31268 {
31269  if (range.lower == mRange.lower && range.upper == mRange.upper)
31270  return;
31271 
31272  if (!QCPRange::validRange(range)) return;
31273  QCPRange oldRange = mRange;
31274  if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic)
31275  {
31276  mRange = range.sanitizedForLogScale();
31277  } else
31278  {
31279  mRange = range.sanitizedForLinScale();
31280  }
31281  emit rangeChanged(mRange);
31282  emit rangeChanged(mRange, oldRange);
31283 }
31284

31296 {
31297  if (mSelectableParts != selectable)
31298  {
31299  mSelectableParts = selectable;
31300  emit selectableChanged(mSelectableParts);
31301  }
31302 }

31320 {

31322  {
31323  mSelectedParts = selected;
31324  emit selectionChanged(mSelectedParts);
31325  }
31326 }
31327 
31337 void QCPPolarAxisRadial::setRange(double lower, double upper)
31338 {
31339  if (lower == mRange.lower && upper == mRange.upper)
31340  return;
31341 
31342  if (!QCPRange::validRange(lower, upper)) return;
31343  QCPRange oldRange = mRange;
31344  mRange.lower = lower;
31345  mRange.upper = upper;
31346  if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic)
31347  {
31348  mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLogScale();
31349  } else
31350  {
31351  mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLinScale();
31352  }
31353  emit rangeChanged(mRange);
31354  emit rangeChanged(mRange, oldRange);
31355 }
31356 
31368 void QCPPolarAxisRadial::setRange(double position, double size, Qt::AlignmentFlag alignment)
31369 {
31370  if (alignment == Qt::AlignLeft)
31371  setRange(position, position+size);
31372  else if (alignment == Qt::AlignRight)
31373  setRange(position-size, position);
31374  else // alignment == Qt::AlignCenter
31375  setRange(position-size/2.0, position+size/2.0);
31376 }
31377 
31382 void QCPPolarAxisRadial::setRangeLower(double lower)
31383 {
31384  if (mRange.lower == lower)
31385  return;
31386 
31387  QCPRange oldRange = mRange;
31388  mRange.lower = lower;
31389  if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic)
31390  {
31391  mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLogScale();
31392  } else
31393  {
31394  mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLinScale();
31395  }
31396  emit rangeChanged(mRange);
31397  emit rangeChanged(mRange, oldRange);
31398 }
31399 
31404 void QCPPolarAxisRadial::setRangeUpper(double upper)
31405 {
31406  if (mRange.upper == upper)
31407  return;

31409  QCPRange oldRange = mRange;
31410  mRange.upper = upper;
31411  if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic)
31412  {
31413  mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLogScale();
31414  } else
31415  {
31416  mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLinScale();
31417  }
31418  emit rangeChanged(mRange);
31419  emit rangeChanged(mRange, oldRange);
31420 }

31554 
31585 void QCPPolarAxisRadial::setNumberFormat(const QString &formatCode)
31586 {
31587  if (formatCode.isEmpty())
31588  {
31589  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Passed formatCode is empty";
31590  return;
31591  }
31592  //mCachedMarginValid = false;
31593 
31594  // interpret first char as number format char:
31595  QString allowedFormatChars(QLatin1String("eEfgG"));
31596  if (allowedFormatChars.contains(formatCode.at(0)))
31597  {
31598  mNumberFormatChar = QLatin1Char(formatCode.at(0).toLatin1());
31599  } else
31600  {
31601  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid number format code (first char not in 'eEfgG'):" << formatCode;
31602  return;
31603  }
31604 
31605  if (formatCode.length() < 2)
31606  {
31607  mNumberBeautifulPowers = false;
31608  mNumberMultiplyCross = false;
31609  } else
31610  {
31611  // interpret second char as indicator for beautiful decimal powers:
31612  if (formatCode.at(1) == QLatin1Char('b') && (mNumberFormatChar == QLatin1Char('e') || mNumberFormatChar == QLatin1Char('g')))
31613  mNumberBeautifulPowers = true;
31614  else
31615  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid number format code (second char not 'b' or first char neither 'e' nor 'g'):" << formatCode;
31616 
31617  if (formatCode.length() < 3)
31618  {
31619  mNumberMultiplyCross = false;
31620  } else
31621  {
31622  // interpret third char as indicator for dot or cross multiplication symbol:
31623  if (formatCode.at(2) == QLatin1Char('c'))
31624  mNumberMultiplyCross = true;
31625  else if (formatCode.at(2) == QLatin1Char('d'))
31626  mNumberMultiplyCross = false;
31627  else
31628  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid number format code (third char neither 'c' nor 'd'):" << formatCode;
31629  }
31630  }
31631  mLabelPainter.setSubstituteExponent(mNumberBeautifulPowers);
31632  mLabelPainter.setMultiplicationSymbol(mNumberMultiplyCross ? QCPLabelPainterPrivate::SymbolCross : QCPLabelPainterPrivate::SymbolDot);
31633 }
31634 
31640 void QCPPolarAxisRadial::setNumberPrecision(int precision)
31641 {
31642  if (mNumberPrecision != precision)
31643  {
31644  mNumberPrecision = precision;
31645  //mCachedMarginValid = false;
31646  }
31647 }
31648
